TCName.name: SalesView
TCName.PlannedSalesColumn: select z.ar_no,NVL(y.Mon_sls,0) as Mon,NVL(y.Tue_sls,0) as Tue,NVL(y.Wed_sls,0) as Wed,NVL(y.Thu_sls,0) as Thu, NVL(y.Fri_sls,0) as Fri,NVL(y.Sat_sls,0) as Sat,NVL(y.Sun_sls,0) as Sun from (select distinct b.ar_no from ww_wlp.loc b where b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and b.zone_no='Zone' order by b.ar_no) z LEFT OUTER JOIN (select x.*,(x.Mon_sls + x.Tue_sls + x.Wed_sls + x.Thu_sls + x.Fri_sls + x.Sat_sls + x.Sun_sls) as WTD_SLS, (x.Mon_itm + x.Tue_itm + x.Wed_itm + x.Thu_itm + x.Fri_itm + x.Sat_itm + x.Sun_itm) as WTD_ITM from (select b.ar_no, NVL(sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,00,b.PLN_SLS_DPZ)),0) Mon_sls, NVL(sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,01,b.PLN_SLS_DPZ)),0) Tue_sls, NVL(sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,02,b.PLN_SLS_DPZ)),0) Wed_sls, NVL(sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,03,b.PLN_SLS_DPZ)),0) Thu_sls, NVL(sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,04,b.PLN_SLS_DPZ)),0) Fri_sls, NVL(sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,05,b.PLN_SLS_DPZ)),0) Sat_sls, NVL(sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,06,b.PLN_SLS_DPZ)),0) Sun_sls, NVL(sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,00,b.PLN_ITM_DPZ)),0) Mon_itm, NVL(sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,01,b.PLN_ITM_DPZ)),0) Tue_itm, NVL(sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,02,b.PLN_ITM_DPZ)),0) Wed_itm, NVL(sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,03,b.PLN_ITM_DPZ)),0) Thu_itm, NVL(sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,04,b.PLN_ITM_DPZ)),0) Fri_itm, NVL(sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,05,b.PLN_ITM_DPZ)),0) Sat_itm, NVL(sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,06,b.PLN_ITM_DPZ)),0) Sun_itm from (select h.ar_no,SUBSTR(h.day_of_wk,0,2) as dte_of_wk,ROUND(sum(h.PLN_SLS_DTS),0) as PLN_SLS_DPZ,ROUND(sum(h.PLN_ITM_DTS),0) as PLN_ITM_DPZ from (select * from (select e.ar_no,e.loc_nm,e.dply_seq,e.dept_nm,e.day_of_wk,sum(e.mgr_pln_sls) as PLN_SLS_DTS,sum(e.mgr_pln_itm_cnt) as PLN_ITM_DTS from (select b.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,b.loc_nm,a.dept_no,d.dept_nm,d.dply_seq,c.perd_desc,c.wk_id,a.mgr_pln_sls_dte,dy.day_of_wk, nvl(a.mgr_pln_sls,0) as mgr_pln_sls,nvl(a.mgr_pln_itm_cnt,0) as mgr_pln_itm_cnt,nvl(a.mgr_pln_cust_cnt,0) as mgr_pln_cust_cnt from ww_wlp.mgr_dly_pln a, loc b, wk c , dept d, day dy where a.loc_no=b.loc_no and a.div_no=b.div_no and b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and b.zone_no='Zone' and a.dept_no NOT IN (0,90,20) and a.mgr_pln_sls_dte between c.wk_strt and c.wk_end and c.wk_id='Week' and a.dept_no=d.dept_no and a.div_no=d.div_no and d.dply_seq is not null and d.div_no='Division' and a.mgr_pln_sls_dte=dy.day_dte and c.wk_id=dy.wk_id order by b.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,d.dply_seq,c.perd_desc,c.wk_id,a.mgr_pln_sls_dte,dy.day_of_wk) e group by e.ar_no,e.loc_nm,e.dply_seq,e.dept_nm,e.day_of_wk order by e.ar_no,e.loc_nm,e.dply_seq,e.day_of_wk) f UNION select * from (select e.ar_no,e.loc_nm,e.dply_seq,e.dept_nm,e.day_of_wk,sum(e.gnrt_sls) as GEN_SLS_DTS,sum(e.gnrt_itm) as GEN_ITM_DTS from (select b.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,b.loc_nm,a.dept_no,d.dept_nm,d.dply_seq,c.perd_desc,c.wk_id,a.fcst_dte,dy.day_of_wk, nvl(a.gnrt_sls,0) as gnrt_sls,nvl(a.gnrt_itm,0) as gnrt_itm,nvl(a.gnrt_cust,0) as gnrt_cust from ww_wlp.fcst a, loc b, wk c , dept d, day dy where a.loc_no=b.loc_no and a.div_no=b.div_no and b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and b.zone_no='Zone' and a.dept_no NOT IN (0,90,20) and a.fcst_dte between c.wk_strt and c.wk_end and c.wk_id='Week' and a.dept_no=d.dept_no and a.div_no=d.div_no and d.dply_seq is not null and d.div_no='Division' and (a.loc_no,a.dept_no,a.fcst_dte) NOT IN (select a.loc_no,a.dept_no,a.mgr_pln_sls_dte from mgr_dly_pln a, loc b, wk c where a.mgr_pln_sls_dte between c.wk_strt and c.wk_end and c.wk_id='Week' and a.loc_no=b.loc_no and a.div_no=b.div_no and b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and b.zone_no='Zone') and a.fcst_dte=dy.day_dte and c.wk_id=dy.wk_id order by b.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,d.dply_seq,c.perd_desc,c.wk_id,a.fcst_dte,dy.day_of_wk) e group by e.ar_no,e.loc_nm,e.dply_seq,e.dept_nm,e.day_of_wk order by e.ar_no,e.loc_nm,e.dply_seq,e.day_of_wk) g) h group by h.ar_no,h.day_of_wk order by h.ar_no,h.day_of_wk) b group by b.ar_no order by b.ar_no) x ) y on z.ar_no=y.ar_no order by z.ar_no
TCName.PlannedSalesTotal: select z.zone_no,NVL(y.Mon_sls,0) as Mon,NVL(y.Tue_sls,0) as Tue,NVL(y.Wed_sls,0) as Wed,NVL(y.Thu_sls,0) as Thu,NVL(y.Fri_sls,0) as Fri, NVL(y.Sat_sls,0) as Sat,NVL(y.Sun_sls,0) as Sun from (select distinct b.zone_no from ww_wlp.loc b where b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and b.zone_no='Zone' order by b.zone_no) z LEFT OUTER JOIN (select x.*,(x.Mon_sls + x.Tue_sls + x.Wed_sls + x.Thu_sls + x.Fri_sls + x.Sat_sls + x.Sun_sls) as WTD_SLS, (x.Mon_itm + x.Tue_itm + x.Wed_itm + x.Thu_itm + x.Fri_itm + x.Sat_itm + x.Sun_itm) as WTD_ITM from (select b.zone_no, NVL(sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,00,b.PLN_SLS_TOT_DPZ)),0) Mon_sls, NVL(sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,01,b.PLN_SLS_TOT_DPZ)),0) Tue_sls, NVL(sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,02,b.PLN_SLS_TOT_DPZ)),0) Wed_sls, NVL(sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,03,b.PLN_SLS_TOT_DPZ)),0) Thu_sls, NVL(sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,04,b.PLN_SLS_TOT_DPZ)),0) Fri_sls, NVL(sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,05,b.PLN_SLS_TOT_DPZ)),0) Sat_sls, NVL(sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,06,b.PLN_SLS_TOT_DPZ)),0) Sun_sls, NVL(sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,00,b.PLN_ITM_TOT_DPZ)),0) Mon_itm, NVL(sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,01,b.PLN_ITM_TOT_DPZ)),0) Tue_itm, NVL(sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,02,b.PLN_ITM_TOT_DPZ)),0) Wed_itm, NVL(sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,03,b.PLN_ITM_TOT_DPZ)),0) Thu_itm, NVL(sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,04,b.PLN_ITM_TOT_DPZ)),0) Fri_itm, NVL(sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,05,b.PLN_ITM_TOT_DPZ)),0) Sat_itm, NVL(sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,06,b.PLN_ITM_TOT_DPZ)),0) Sun_itm from (select h.zone_no,SUBSTR(h.day_of_wk,0,2) as dte_of_wk,ROUND(sum(h.PLN_SLS_DTS),0) as PLN_SLS_TOT_DPZ,ROUND(sum(h.PLN_ITM_DTS),0) as PLN_ITM_TOT_DPZ from (select * from (select e.zone_no,e.ar_no,e.loc_nm,e.dply_seq,e.dept_nm,e.day_of_wk,sum(e.mgr_pln_sls) as PLN_SLS_DTS,sum(e.mgr_pln_itm_cnt) as PLN_ITM_DTS from (select b.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,b.loc_nm,a.dept_no,d.dept_nm,d.dply_seq,c.perd_desc,c.wk_id,a.mgr_pln_sls_dte,dy.day_of_wk, nvl(a.mgr_pln_sls,0) as mgr_pln_sls,nvl(a.mgr_pln_itm_cnt,0) as mgr_pln_itm_cnt,nvl(a.mgr_pln_cust_cnt,0) as mgr_pln_cust_cnt from ww_wlp.mgr_dly_pln a, loc b, wk c , dept d, day dy where a.loc_no=b.loc_no and a.div_no=b.div_no and b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and b.zone_no='Zone' and a.dept_no NOT IN (0,90,20) and a.mgr_pln_sls_dte between c.wk_strt and c.wk_end and c.wk_id='Week' and a.dept_no=d.dept_no and a.div_no=d.div_no and d.dply_seq is not null and d.div_no='Division' and a.mgr_pln_sls_dte=dy.day_dte and c.wk_id=dy.wk_id order by b.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,d.dply_seq,c.perd_desc,c.wk_id,a.mgr_pln_sls_dte,dy.day_of_wk) e group by e.zone_no,e.ar_no,e.loc_nm,e.dply_seq,e.dept_nm,e.day_of_wk order by e.zone_no,e.ar_no,e.loc_nm,e.dply_seq,e.day_of_wk) f UNION select * from (select e.zone_no,e.ar_no,e.loc_nm,e.dply_seq,e.dept_nm,e.day_of_wk,sum(e.gnrt_sls) as GEN_SLS_DTS,sum(e.gnrt_itm) as GEN_ITM_DTS from (select b.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,b.loc_nm,a.dept_no,d.dept_nm,d.dply_seq,c.perd_desc,c.wk_id,a.fcst_dte,dy.day_of_wk, nvl(a.gnrt_sls,0) as gnrt_sls,nvl(a.gnrt_itm,0) as gnrt_itm,nvl(a.gnrt_cust,0) as gnrt_cust from ww_wlp.fcst a, loc b, wk c , dept d, day dy where a.loc_no=b.loc_no and a.div_no=b.div_no and b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and b.zone_no='Zone' and a.dept_no NOT IN (0,90,20) and a.fcst_dte between c.wk_strt and c.wk_end and c.wk_id='Week' and a.dept_no=d.dept_no and a.div_no=d.div_no and d.dply_seq is not null and d.div_no='Division' and (a.loc_no,a.dept_no,a.fcst_dte) NOT IN (select a.loc_no,a.dept_no,a.mgr_pln_sls_dte from mgr_dly_pln a, loc b, wk c where a.mgr_pln_sls_dte between c.wk_strt and c.wk_end and c.wk_id='Week' and a.loc_no=b.loc_no and a.div_no=b.div_no and b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and b.zone_no='Zone') and a.fcst_dte=dy.day_dte and c.wk_id=dy.wk_id order by b.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,d.dply_seq,c.perd_desc,c.wk_id,a.fcst_dte,dy.day_of_wk) e group by e.zone_no,e.ar_no,e.loc_nm,e.dply_seq,e.dept_nm,e.day_of_wk order by e.zone_no,e.ar_no,e.loc_nm,e.dply_seq,e.day_of_wk) g) h group by h.zone_no,h.day_of_wk order by h.zone_no,h.day_of_wk) b group by b.zone_no order by b.zone_no) x ) y on z.zone_no=y.zone_no order by z.zone_no
TCName.PlannedSalesWkToDt: select z.ar_no,NVL(ROUND(y.wtd_sls,0),0) as WTD from (select distinct b.ar_no from ww_wlp.loc b where b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and b.zone_no='Zone' order by b.ar_no) z LEFT OUTER JOIN (select x.*,(x.Mon_sls + x.Tue_sls + x.Wed_sls + x.Thu_sls + x.Fri_sls + x.Sat_sls + x.Sun_sls) as WTD_SLS, (x.Mon_itm + x.Tue_itm + x.Wed_itm + x.Thu_itm + x.Fri_itm + x.Sat_itm + x.Sun_itm) as WTD_ITM from (select b.ar_no, NVL(sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,00,b.PLN_SLS_DPZ)),0) Mon_sls, NVL(sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,01,b.PLN_SLS_DPZ)),0) Tue_sls, NVL(sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,02,b.PLN_SLS_DPZ)),0) Wed_sls, NVL(sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,03,b.PLN_SLS_DPZ)),0) Thu_sls, NVL(sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,04,b.PLN_SLS_DPZ)),0) Fri_sls, NVL(sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,05,b.PLN_SLS_DPZ)),0) Sat_sls, NVL(sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,06,b.PLN_SLS_DPZ)),0) Sun_sls, NVL(sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,00,b.PLN_ITM_DPZ)),0) Mon_itm, NVL(sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,01,b.PLN_ITM_DPZ)),0) Tue_itm, NVL(sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,02,b.PLN_ITM_DPZ)),0) Wed_itm, NVL(sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,03,b.PLN_ITM_DPZ)),0) Thu_itm, NVL(sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,04,b.PLN_ITM_DPZ)),0) Fri_itm, NVL(sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,05,b.PLN_ITM_DPZ)),0) Sat_itm, NVL(sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,06,b.PLN_ITM_DPZ)),0) Sun_itm from (select h.ar_no,SUBSTR(h.day_of_wk,0,2) as dte_of_wk,sum(h.PLN_SLS_DTS) as PLN_SLS_DPZ,sum(h.PLN_ITM_DTS) as PLN_ITM_DPZ from (select * from (select e.ar_no,e.loc_nm,e.dply_seq,e.dept_nm,e.day_of_wk,sum(e.mgr_pln_sls) as PLN_SLS_DTS,sum(e.mgr_pln_itm_cnt) as PLN_ITM_DTS from (select b.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,b.loc_nm,a.dept_no,d.dept_nm,d.dply_seq,c.perd_desc,c.wk_id,a.mgr_pln_sls_dte,dy.day_of_wk, nvl(a.mgr_pln_sls,0) as mgr_pln_sls,nvl(a.mgr_pln_itm_cnt,0) as mgr_pln_itm_cnt,nvl(a.mgr_pln_cust_cnt,0) as mgr_pln_cust_cnt from ww_wlp.mgr_dly_pln a, loc b, wk c , dept d, day dy where a.loc_no=b.loc_no and a.div_no=b.div_no and b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and b.zone_no='Zone' and a.dept_no NOT IN (0,90,20) and a.mgr_pln_sls_dte between c.wk_strt and c.wk_end and c.wk_id='Week' and a.dept_no=d.dept_no and a.div_no=d.div_no and d.dply_seq is not null and d.div_no='Division' and a.mgr_pln_sls_dte=dy.day_dte and c.wk_id=dy.wk_id order by b.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,d.dply_seq,c.perd_desc,c.wk_id,a.mgr_pln_sls_dte,dy.day_of_wk) e group by e.ar_no,e.loc_nm,e.dply_seq,e.dept_nm,e.day_of_wk order by e.ar_no,e.loc_nm,e.dply_seq,e.day_of_wk) f UNION select * from (select e.ar_no,e.loc_nm,e.dply_seq,e.dept_nm,e.day_of_wk,sum(e.gnrt_sls) as GEN_SLS_DTS,sum(e.gnrt_itm) as GEN_ITM_DTS from (select b.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,b.loc_nm,a.dept_no,d.dept_nm,d.dply_seq,c.perd_desc,c.wk_id,a.fcst_dte,dy.day_of_wk, nvl(a.gnrt_sls,0) as gnrt_sls,nvl(a.gnrt_itm,0) as gnrt_itm,nvl(a.gnrt_cust,0) as gnrt_cust from ww_wlp.fcst a, loc b, wk c , dept d, day dy where a.loc_no=b.loc_no and a.div_no=b.div_no and b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and b.zone_no='Zone' and a.dept_no NOT IN (0,90,20) and a.fcst_dte between c.wk_strt and c.wk_end and c.wk_id='Week' and a.dept_no=d.dept_no and a.div_no=d.div_no and d.dply_seq is not null and d.div_no='Division' and (a.loc_no,a.dept_no,a.fcst_dte) NOT IN (select a.loc_no,a.dept_no,a.mgr_pln_sls_dte from mgr_dly_pln a, loc b, wk c where a.mgr_pln_sls_dte between c.wk_strt and c.wk_end and c.wk_id='Week' and a.loc_no=b.loc_no and a.div_no=b.div_no and b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and b.zone_no='Zone') and a.fcst_dte=dy.day_dte and c.wk_id=dy.wk_id order by b.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,d.dply_seq,c.perd_desc,c.wk_id,a.fcst_dte,dy.day_of_wk) e group by e.ar_no,e.loc_nm,e.dply_seq,e.dept_nm,e.day_of_wk order by e.ar_no,e.loc_nm,e.dply_seq,e.day_of_wk) g) h group by h.ar_no,h.day_of_wk order by h.ar_no,h.day_of_wk) b group by b.ar_no order by b.ar_no) x ) y on z.ar_no=y.ar_no order by z.ar_no
TCName.PlannedSalesWkToDtTotal: select z.zone_no,NVL(ROUND(y.wtd_sls,0),0) as WTD from (select distinct b.zone_no from ww_wlp.loc b where b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and b.zone_no='Zone' NVL(sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,01,b.PLN_ITM_TOT_DPZ)),0) Tue_itm, NVL(sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,02,b.PLN_ITM_TOT_DPZ)),0) Wed_itm, NVL(sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,03,b.PLN_ITM_TOT_DPZ)),0) Thu_itm, NVL(sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,04,b.PLN_ITM_TOT_DPZ)),0) Fri_itm, NVL(sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,05,b.PLN_ITM_TOT_DPZ)),0) Sat_itm, NVL(sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,06,b.PLN_ITM_TOT_DPZ)),0) Sun_itm from (select nyu.Tue),2) end as Tue, case when den.Wed=0 or nyu.Wed=0 then 0 else ROUND((den.Wed - nyu.Wed),2) end as Wed, case when den.Thu=0 or nyu.Thu=0 then 0 else ROUND((den.Thu - nyu.Thu),2) end as Thu, case b.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,a.dept_no,d.dept_nm,d.dply_seq,c.perd_desc,c.wk_id,a.txn_dte,dy.day_of_wk, nvl(a.actl_sls,0) as actl_sls,nvl(a.actl_itm_cnt,0) as actl_itm_cnt,nvl(a.actl_cust_cnt,0) as actl_cust_cnt from ww_wlp.dly_sls a, loc b, wk c , dept d, day dy where a.loc_no=b.loc_no and a.div_no=b.div_no and b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and b.zone_no='Zone' and a.dept_no NOT IN (0,90,20) and a.txn_dte between c.wk_strt and c.wk_end and c.wk_id='Week' and a.dept_no=d.dept_no and a.div_no=d.div_no and d.dply_seq is not null and d.div_no='Division' and a.txn_dte=dy.day_dte and c.wk_id=dy.wk_id and a.actl_sls is NOT NULL and a.actl_sls!=0) e ) */) h group by h.zone_no,h.day_of_wk order by h.zone_no,h.day_of_wk) b group by b.zone_no order by b.zone_no) x ) z) sls on lc.zone_no=sls.zone_no order by lc.zone_no) den, (select z.zone_no,NVL(ROUND(y.wtd_sls,0),0) as WTD from (select distinct b.zone_no from ww_wlp.loc b where b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and b.zone_no='Zone' order by b.zone_no) z LEFT OUTER JOIN (select x.*,(x.Mon_sls + x.Tue_sls + x.Wed_sls + x.Thu_sls + x.Fri_sls + x.Sat_sls + x.Sun_sls) as WTD_SLS, (x.Mon_itm + x.Tue_itm + x.Wed_itm + x.Thu_itm + x.Fri_itm + x.Sat_itm + x.Sun_itm) as WTD_ITM from (select b.zone_no, NVL(sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,00,b.PLN_SLS_TOT_DPZ)),0) Mon_sls, NVL(sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,01,b.PLN_SLS_TOT_DPZ)),0) Tue_sls, NVL(sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,02,b.PLN_SLS_TOT_DPZ)),0) Wed_sls, NVL(sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,03,b.PLN_SLS_TOT_DPZ)),0) Thu_sls, NVL(sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,04,b.PLN_SLS_TOT_DPZ)),0) Fri_sls, NVL(sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,05,b.PLN_SLS_TOT_DPZ)),0) Sat_sls, NVL(sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,06,b.PLN_SLS_TOT_DPZ)),0) Sun_sls, NVL(sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,00,b.PLN_ITM_TOT_DPZ)),0) Mon_itm, NVL(sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,01,b.PLN_ITM_TOT_DPZ)),0) Tue_itm, NVL(sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,02,b.PLN_ITM_TOT_DPZ)),0) Wed_itm, NVL(sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,03,b.PLN_ITM_TOT_DPZ)),0) Thu_itm, NVL(sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,04,b.PLN_ITM_TOT_DPZ)),0) Fri_itm, NVL(sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,05,b.PLN_ITM_TOT_DPZ)),0) Sat_itm, NVL(sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,06,b.PLN_ITM_TOT_DPZ)),0) Sun_itm from (select h.zone_no,SUBSTR(h.day_of_wk,0,2) as dte_of_wk,sum(h.PLN_SLS_DTS) as PLN_SLS_TOT_DPZ,ROUND(sum(h.PLN_ITM_DTS),0) as PLN_ITM_TOT_DPZ from (select * from (select e.zone_no,e.ar_no,e.loc_nm,e.dply_seq,e.dept_nm,e.day_of_wk,sum(e.mgr_pln_sls) as PLN_SLS_DTS,sum(e.mgr_pln_itm_cnt) as PLN_ITM_DTS from (select b.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,b.loc_nm,a.dept_no,d.dept_nm,d.dply_seq,c.perd_desc,c.wk_id,a.mgr_pln_sls_dte,dy.day_of_wk, nvl(a.mgr_pln_sls,0) as mgr_pln_sls,nvl(a.mgr_pln_itm_cnt,0) as mgr_pln_itm_cnt,nvl(a.mgr_pln_cust_cnt,0) as mgr_pln_cust_cnt from ww_wlp.mgr_dly_pln a, loc b, wk c , dept d, day dy where a.loc_no=b.loc_no and a.div_no=b.div_no and b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and b.zone_no='Zone' and a.dept_no NOT IN (0,90,20) and a.mgr_pln_sls_dte between c.wk_strt and c.wk_end and c.wk_id='Week' and a.dept_no=d.dept_no and a.div_no=d.div_no and d.dply_seq is not null and d.div_no='Division' and a.mgr_pln_sls_dte=dy.day_dte and c.wk_id=dy.wk_id order by b.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,d.dply_seq,c.perd_desc,c.wk_id,a.mgr_pln_sls_dte,dy.day_of_wk) e group by e.zone_no,e.ar_no,e.loc_nm,e.dply_seq,e.dept_nm,e.day_of_wk order by e.zone_no,e.ar_no,e.loc_nm,e.dply_seq,e.day_of_wk) f UNION select * from (select e.zone_no,e.ar_no,e.loc_nm,e.dply_seq,e.dept_nm,e.day_of_wk,sum(e.gnrt_sls) as GEN_SLS_DTS,sum(e.gnrt_itm) as GEN_ITM_DTS from (select b.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,b.loc_nm,a.dept_no,d.dept_nm,d.dply_seq,c.perd_desc,c.wk_id,a.fcst_dte,dy.day_of_wk, nvl(a.gnrt_sls,0) as gnrt_sls,nvl(a.gnrt_itm,0) as gnrt_itm,nvl(a.gnrt_cust,0) as gnrt_cust from ww_wlp.fcst a, loc b, wk c , dept d, day dy where a.loc_no=b.loc_no and a.div_no=b.div_no and b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and b.zone_no='Zone' and a.dept_no NOT IN (0,90,20) and a.fcst_dte between c.wk_strt and c.wk_end and c.wk_id='Week' and a.dept_no=d.dept_no and a.div_no=d.div_no and d.dply_seq is not null and d.div_no='Division' and (a.loc_no,a.dept_no,a.fcst_dte) NOT IN (select a.loc_no,a.dept_no,a.mgr_pln_sls_dte from mgr_dly_pln a, loc b, wk c where a.mgr_pln_sls_dte between c.wk_strt and c.wk_end and c.wk_id='Week' and a.loc_no=b.loc_no and a.div_no=b.div_no and b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and b.zone_no='Zone') and a.fcst_dte=dy.day_dte and c.wk_id=dy.wk_id order by b.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,d.dply_seq,c.perd_desc,c.wk_id,a.fcst_dte,dy.day_of_wk) e group by e.zone_no,e.ar_no,e.loc_nm,e.dply_seq,e.dept_nm,e.day_of_wk order by e.zone_no,e.ar_no,e.loc_nm,e.dply_seq,e.day_of_wk) g) h group by h.zone_no,h.day_of_wk order by h.zone_no,h.day_of_wk) b group by b.zone_no order by b.zone_no) x ) y on z.zone_no=y.zone_no order by z.zone_no) nyu where nyu.zone_no = den.zone_no

TCName.name: ScheduledHoursView
TCName.PlannedHoursColumn: select lc.ar_no,NVL(wge.mon,0) as Mon,NVL(wge.tue,0) as Tue,NVL(wge.wed,0) as Wed,NVL(wge.thu,0) as Thu, NVL(wge.fri,0) as Fri,NVL(wge.sat,0) as Sat,NVL(wge.sun,0) as Sun from (select distinct b.ar_no from ww_wlp.loc b where b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and b.zone_no='Zone' order by b.ar_no) lc LEFT OUTER JOIN (select z.ar_no,z.mon,z.tue,z.wed,z.thu,z.fri,z.sat,z.sun from (select x.*,(x.Mon + x.Tue + x.Wed + x.Thu + x.Fri + x.Sat + x.Sun) as WTD from (select b.ar_no, NVL(sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,00,b.PLN_HRS_DPZ)),0) Mon, NVL(sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,01,b.PLN_HRS_DPZ)),0) Tue, NVL(sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,02,b.PLN_HRS_DPZ)),0) Wed, NVL(sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,03,b.PLN_HRS_DPZ)),0) Thu, NVL(sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,04,b.PLN_HRS_DPZ)),0) Fri, NVL(sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,05,b.PLN_HRS_DPZ)),0) Sat, NVL(sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,06,b.PLN_HRS_DPZ)),0) Sun from (select h.ar_no,SUBSTR(h.day_of_wk,0,2) as dte_of_wk,ROUND(sum(h.PLN_HRS_DTS),1) as PLN_HRS_DPZ from (select e.ar_no,e.loc_nm,e.dply_seq,e.dept_nm,e.day_of_wk,sum(e.ta_pln_wage_amt) as PLN_WGE_DTS,sum(e.ta_pln_hrs) as PLN_HRS_DTS from (select b.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,b.loc_nm,a.dept_no,d.dept_nm,d.dply_seq,c.perd_desc,c.wk_id,a.dly_wage_dte,dy.day_of_wk, nvl(a.ta_pln_wage_amt,0) as ta_pln_wage_amt,nvl(a.ta_pln_hrs,0) as ta_pln_hrs from ww_wlp.krn_schd a, loc b, wk c , dept d, day dy where a.loc_no=b.loc_no and a.div_no=b.div_no and b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and b.zone_no='Zone' and a.dept_no NOT IN (20,27,28) and a.dly_wage_dte between c.wk_strt and c.wk_end /*and trunc(sysdate-1)*/ and c.wk_id='Week' and a.dept_no=d.dept_no and a.div_no=d.div_no and d.dply_seq is not null and d.div_no='Division' and a.dly_wage_dte=dy.day_dte and c.wk_id=dy.wk_id order by b.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,d.dply_seq,c.perd_desc,c.wk_id,a.dly_wage_dte,dy.day_of_wk) e group by e.ar_no,e.loc_nm,e.dply_seq,e.dept_nm,e.day_of_wk order by e.ar_no,e.loc_nm,e.dply_seq,e.day_of_wk) h group by h.ar_no,h.day_of_wk order by h.ar_no,h.day_of_wk) b group by b.ar_no order by b.ar_no) x ) z) wge on wge.ar_no=lc.ar_no order by lc.ar_no
TCName.PlannedHoursTotal: select lc.zone_no,NVL(wge.mon,0) as Mon,NVL(wge.tue,0) as Tue,NVL(wge.wed,0) as Wed,NVL(wge.thu,0) as Thu, NVL(wge.fri,0) as Fri,NVL(wge.sat,0) as Sat,NVL(wge.sun,0) as Sun from (select distinct b.zone_no from ww_wlp.loc b where b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and b.zone_no='Zone' order by b.zone_no) lc LEFT OUTER JOIN (select z.zone_no,z.mon,z.tue,z.wed,z.thu,z.fri,z.sat,z.sun from (select x.*,(x.Mon + x.Tue + x.Wed + x.Thu + x.Fri + x.Sat + x.Sun) as WTD from (select b.zone_no, NVL(sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,00,b.PLN_HRS_TOT_DPZ)),0) Mon, NVL(sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,01,b.PLN_HRS_TOT_DPZ)),0) Tue, NVL(sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,02,b.PLN_HRS_TOT_DPZ)),0) Wed, NVL(sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,03,b.PLN_HRS_TOT_DPZ)),0) Thu, NVL(sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,04,b.PLN_HRS_TOT_DPZ)),0) Fri, NVL(sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,05,b.PLN_HRS_TOT_DPZ)),0) Sat, NVL(sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,06,b.PLN_HRS_TOT_DPZ)),0) Sun from (select h.zone_no,SUBSTR(h.day_of_wk,0,2) as dte_of_wk,ROUND(sum(h.PLN_HRS_DTS),1) as PLN_HRS_TOT_DPZ from (select e.zone_no,e.ar_no,e.loc_nm,e.dply_seq,e.dept_nm,e.day_of_wk,sum(e.ta_pln_wage_amt) as PLN_WGE_DTS,sum(e.ta_pln_hrs) as PLN_HRS_DTS from (select b.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,b.loc_nm,a.dept_no,d.dept_nm,d.dply_seq,c.perd_desc,c.wk_id,a.dly_wage_dte,dy.day_of_wk, nvl(a.ta_pln_wage_amt,0) as ta_pln_wage_amt,nvl(a.ta_pln_hrs,0) as ta_pln_hrs from ww_wlp.krn_schd a, loc b, wk c , dept d, day dy where a.loc_no=b.loc_no and a.div_no=b.div_no and b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and b.zone_no='Zone' and a.dept_no NOT IN (20,27,28) and a.dly_wage_dte between c.wk_strt and c.wk_end /*and trunc(sysdate-1)*/ and c.wk_id='Week' and a.dept_no=d.dept_no and a.div_no=d.div_no and d.dply_seq is not null and d.div_no='Division' and a.dly_wage_dte=dy.day_dte and c.wk_id=dy.wk_id order by b.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,d.dply_seq,c.perd_desc,c.wk_id,a.dly_wage_dte,dy.day_of_wk) e group by e.zone_no,e.ar_no,e.loc_nm,e.dply_seq,e.dept_nm,e.day_of_wk order by e.zone_no,e.ar_no,e.loc_nm,e.dply_seq,e.day_of_wk) h group by h.zone_no,h.day_of_wk order by h.zone_no,h.day_of_wk) b group by b.zone_no order by b.zone_no) x ) z) wge on wge.zone_no=lc.zone_no order by lc.zone_no
TCName.PlannedHoursWkToDt: select lc.ar_no,NVL(ROUND(wge.PLN_HOURS_DPZ,1),0) as PLN_HRS_DPZ from (select distinct b.ar_no from ww_wlp.loc b where b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and b.zone_no='Zone' order by b.ar_no) lc LEFT OUTER JOIN (select e.ar_no,(sum(e.ta_pln_wage_amt) + sum(e.wage_adj_amt)) as PLN_WAGE_DPZ, (sum(e.ta_pln_hrs) + sum(e.wage_adj_hrs)) as PLN_HOURS_DPZ from (select b.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,b.loc_nm,a.dept_no,d.dept_nm,d.dply_seq,c.perd_desc,c.wk_id, nvl(a.ta_pln_wage_amt,0) as ta_pln_wage_amt,nvl(a.wage_adj_amt,0) as wage_adj_amt,nvl(a.ta_pln_hrs,0) as ta_pln_hrs,nvl(a.wage_adj_hrs,0) as wage_adj_hrs from ww_wlp.wky_dept_pln a, loc b, wk c , dept d where a.loc_no=b.loc_no and a.div_no=b.div_no and b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and b.zone_no='Zone' and a.dept_no NOT IN (20,27,28) and a.wk_id=c.wk_id and c.wk_id='Week' and a.dept_no=d.dept_no and a.div_no=d.div_no and d.dply_seq is not null and d.div_no='Division' order by b.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,d.dply_seq,c.perd_desc,c.wk_id) e group by e.ar_no order by e.ar_no) wge on wge.ar_no=lc.ar_no
TCName.PlannedHoursWkToDtTotal: select lc.zone_no,NVL(ROUND(wge.PLN_HOURS_TOT_DPZ,1),0) as PLN_HRS_TOT_DPZ from (select distinct b.zone_no from ww_wlp.loc b where b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and b.zone_no='Zone' order by b.zone_no) lc LEFT OUTER JOIN (select e.zone_no,(sum(e.ta_pln_wage_amt) + sum(e.wage_adj_amt)) as PLN_WAGE_TOT_DPZ, (sum(e.ta_pln_hrs) + sum(e.wage_adj_hrs)) as PLN_HOURS_TOT_DPZ from (select b.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,b.loc_nm,a.dept_no,d.dept_nm,d.dply_seq,c.perd_desc,c.wk_id, nvl(a.ta_pln_wage_amt,0) as ta_pln_wage_amt,nvl(a.wage_adj_amt,0) as wage_adj_amt,nvl(a.ta_pln_hrs,0) as ta_pln_hrs,nvl(a.wage_adj_hrs,0) as wage_adj_hrs from ww_wlp.wky_dept_pln a, loc b, wk c , dept d where a.loc_no=b.loc_no and a.div_no=b.div_no and b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and b.zone_no='Zone' and a.dept_no NOT IN (20,27,28) and a.wk_id=c.wk_id and c.wk_id='Week' and a.dept_no=d.dept_no and a.div_no=d.div_no and d.dply_seq is not null and d.div_no='Division' order by b.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,d.dply_seq,c.perd_desc,c.wk_id) e group by e.zone_no order by e.zone_no) wge on wge.zone_no=lc.zone_no
TCName.ActualHoursColumn: select lc.ar_no,NVL(wge.mon,0) as Mon,NVL(wge.tue,0) as Tue,NVL(wge.wed,0) as Wed,NVL(wge.thu,0) as Thu, NVL(wge.fri,0) as Fri,NVL(wge.sat,0) as Sat,NVL(wge.sun,0) as Sun from (select distinct b.ar_no from ww_wlp.loc b where b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and b.zone_no='Zone' order by b.ar_no) lc LEFT OUTER JOIN (select z.ar_no,z.mon,z.tue,z.wed,z.thu,z.fri,z.sat,z.sun,z.wtd from (select x.*,(x.Mon + x.Tue + x.Wed + x.Thu + x.Fri + x.Sat + x.Sun) as WTD from (select b.ar_no, NVL(sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,00,b.ACTL_HRS_DTSG)),0) Mon, NVL(sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,01,b.ACTL_HRS_DTSG)),0) Tue, NVL(sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,02,b.ACTL_HRS_DTSG)),0) Wed, NVL(sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,03,b.ACTL_HRS_DTSG)),0) Thu, NVL(sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,04,b.ACTL_HRS_DTSG)),0) Fri, NVL(sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,05,b.ACTL_HRS_DTSG)),0) Sat, NVL(sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,06,b.ACTL_HRS_DTSG)),0) Sun from (select h.ar_no,SUBSTR(h.day_of_wk,0,2) as dte_of_wk,ROUND(sum(h.ACTL_HRS_DTS),2) as ACTL_HRS_DTSG from (select * from (select e.ar_no,e.dply_seq,e.day_of_wk,sum(e.actl_amt) as ACTL_WGE_DTS,sum(e.actl_hrs) as ACTL_HRS_DTS from (select b.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,b.loc_nm,a.dept_no,d.dept_nm,d.dply_seq,c.perd_desc,c.wk_id,a.dly_wage_dte,dy.day_of_wk, nvl(a.actl_amt,0) as actl_amt,nvl(a.actl_wrk_hrs,0) as actl_hrs from ww_wlp.actl_dly_wage_krn a, loc b, wk c , dept d, day dy where a.loc_no=b.loc_no and a.div_no=b.div_no and b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and b.zone_no='Zone' and a.dept_no NOT IN (20,27,28) and a.dly_wage_dte between c.wk_strt and c.wk_end and c.wk_id='Week' and a.dept_no=d.dept_no and a.div_no=d.div_no and d.dply_seq is not null and d.div_no='Division' and a.dly_wage_dte=dy.day_dte and c.wk_id=dy.wk_id and a.actl_wrk_hrs is NOT NULL and a.actl_wrk_hrs!=0 order by b.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,d.dply_seq,c.perd_desc,c.wk_id,a.dly_wage_dte,dy.day_of_wk) e group by e.ar_no,e.dply_seq,e.day_of_wk order by e.ar_no,e.dply_seq,e.day_of_wk) f /*UNION select * from (select e.ar_no,e.dply_seq,e.day_of_wk,sum(e.ta_pln_wage_amt) as PLN_WGE_DTS,sum(e.ta_pln_hrs) as PLN_HRS_DTS from (select b.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,b.loc_nm,a.dept_no,d.dept_nm,d.dply_seq,c.perd_desc,c.wk_id,a.dly_wage_dte,dy.day_of_wk, nvl(a.ta_pln_wage_amt,0) as ta_pln_wage_amt,nvl(a.ta_pln_hrs,0) as ta_pln_hrs from ww_wlp.krn_schd a, loc b, wk c , dept d, day dy where a.loc_no=b.loc_no and a.div_no=b.div_no and b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and b.zone_no='Zone' and a.dept_no NOT IN TCName.ActualHoursTotal: select lc.zone_no,NVL(wge.mon,0) as Mon,NVL(wge.tue,0) as Tue,NVL(wge.wed,0) as Wed,NVL(wge.thu,0) as Thu, NVL(wge.fri,0) as Fri,NVL(wge.sat,0) as Sat,NVL(wge.sun,0) as Sun (20,27,28) and a.dly_wage_dte between c.wk_strt and c.wk_end and c.wk_id='Week' and a.dept_no=d.dept_no and a.div_no=d.div_no and d.dply_seq is not null and d.div_no='Division' and (20,27,28) and a.dly_wage_dte between c.wk_strt and c.wk_end and c.wk_id='Week' and a.dept_no=d.dept_no and a.div_no=d.div_no and d.dply_seq is not null and d.div_no='Division' and c.wk_id='Week') and a.dept_no=d.dept_no and a.div_no=d.div_no and d.dply_seq is not null and d.div_no='Division') order by b.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,d.dply_seq,c.perd_desc,c.wk_id) TCName.VarianceHoursColumn: select nyu.ar_no, case when den.Mon=0 or nyu.Mon=0 then 0 else ROUND((den.Mon - nyu.Mon),1) end as Mon, case when den.Tue=0 or nyu.Tue=0 then 0 else ROUND((den.Tue - nyu.Tue),1) end as Tue, case when den.Wed=0 or nyu.Wed=0 then 0 else ROUND((den.Wed - nyu.Wed),1) end as Wed, case when den.Thu=0 or nyu.Thu=0 then 0 else ROUND((den.Thu - nyu.Thu),1) end as Thu, case when den.Fri=0 or nyu.Fri=0 then 0 else ROUND((den.Fri - nyu.Fri),1) end as Fri, case when den.Sat=0 or nyu.Sat=0 then 0 else ROUND((den.Sat - nyu.Sat),1) end as Sat, case when den.Sun=0 or nyu.Sun=0 then 0 else ROUND((den.Sun - nyu.Sun),1) end as Sun from (select lc.ar_no,NVL(wge.mon,0) as Mon,NVL(wge.tue,0) as Tue,NVL(wge.wed,0) as Wed,NVL(wge.thu,0) as Thu, NVL(wge.fri,0) as Fri,NVL(wge.sat,0) as Sat,NVL(wge.sun,0) as Sun from (select distinct b.ar_no from ww_wlp.loc b where b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and b.zone_no='Zone' order by b.ar_no) lc LEFT OUTER JOIN (select z.ar_no,z.mon,z.tue,z.wed,z.thu,z.fri,z.sat,z.sun,z.wtd from (select x.*,(x.Mon + x.Tue + x.Wed + x.Thu + x.Fri + x.Sat + x.Sun) as WTD from (select b.ar_no, NVL(sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,00,b.ACTL_HRS_DTSG)),0) Mon, NVL(sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,01,b.ACTL_HRS_DTSG)),0) Tue, NVL(sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,02,b.ACTL_HRS_DTSG)),0) Wed, NVL(sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,03,b.ACTL_HRS_DTSG)),0) Thu, NVL(sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,04,b.ACTL_HRS_DTSG)),0) Fri, NVL(sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,05,b.ACTL_HRS_DTSG)),0) Sat, NVL(sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,06,b.ACTL_HRS_DTSG)),0) Sun from (select h.ar_no,SUBSTR(h.day_of_wk,0,2) as dte_of_wk,ROUND(sum(h.ACTL_HRS_DTS),2) as ACTL_HRS_DTSG from (select * from (select e.ar_no,e.dply_seq,e.day_of_wk,sum(e.actl_amt) as ACTL_WGE_DTS,sum(e.actl_hrs) as ACTL_HRS_DTS from (select b.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,b.loc_nm,a.dept_no,d.dept_nm,d.dply_seq,c.perd_desc,c.wk_id,a.dly_wage_dte,dy.day_of_wk, nvl(a.actl_amt,0) as actl_amt,nvl(a.actl_wrk_hrs,0) as actl_hrs from ww_wlp.actl_dly_wage_krn a, loc b, wk c , dept d, day dy where a.loc_no=b.loc_no and a.div_no=b.div_no and b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and b.zone_no='Zone' and a.dept_no NOT IN TCName.VarianceHoursWkToDt: select nyu.ar_no, case when den.WTD=0 or nyu.WTD=0 then 0 else ROUND((den.WTD - nyu.WTD),1) end as WTD from (select lc.ar_no,NVL(ROUND(wge.ACTL_HOURS_DTSG,1),0) as WTD from (select distinct b.ar_no from ww_wlp.loc b where b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and b.zone_no='Zone' order by b.ar_no) lc LEFT OUTER JOIN (select * from (select h.zone_no,h.ar_no,sum(h.ACTL_WAGE_DTS) as ACTL_WAGE_DTSG,sum(h.ACTL_HOURS_DTS) as ACTL_HOURS_DTSG from (select e.zone_no,e.ar_no,e.dply_seq,sum(e.actl_amt) as ACTL_WAGE_DTS,sum(e.actl_hrs) as ACTL_HOURS_DTS from (select b.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,b.loc_nm,a.dept_no,d.dept_nm,d.dply_seq,c.perd_desc,c.wk_id,a.dly_wage_dte,dy.day_of_wk, nvl(a.actl_amt,0) as actl_amt,nvl(a.actl_wrk_hrs,0) as actl_hrs from ww_wlp.actl_dly_wage_krn a, loc b, wk c , dept d, day dy where a.loc_no=b.loc_no and a.div_no=b.div_no and b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and b.zone_no='Zone' and a.dept_no NOT IN (20,27,28) and a.dly_wage_dte between c.wk_strt and c.wk_end and c.wk_id='Week' and a.dept_no=d.dept_no and a.div_no=d.div_no and d.dply_seq is not null and d.div_no='Division' and a.dly_wage_dte=dy.day_dte and c.wk_id=dy.wk_id and a.actl_wrk_hrs is NOT NULL and a.actl_wrk_hrs!=0 order by b.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,d.dply_seq,c.perd_desc,c.wk_id,a.dly_wage_dte,dy.day_of_wk) e group by e.zone_no,e.ar_no,e.dply_seq order by e.zone_no,e.ar_no,e.dply_seq) h group by h.zone_no,h.ar_no order by h.zone_no,h.ar_no) f UNION select * from (select h.zone_no,h.ar_no,sum(h.ACTL_WAGE_DTS) as ACTL_WAGE_DTSG,sum(h.ACTL_HOURS_DTS) as ACTL_HOURS_DTSG from (select e.zone_no,e.ar_no,e.dply_seq,(sum(e.actl_wage_amt) + sum(e.actl_wage_adj_amt)) as ACTL_WAGE_DTS, (sum(e.actl_hrs) + sum(e.actl_wage_adj_hrs)) as ACTL_HOURS_DTS from (select b.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,a.dept_no,d.dept_nm,d.dply_seq,a.dly_wage_dte, nvl(a.actl_wage_amt,0) as actl_wage_amt,nvl(a.actl_wage_adj_amt,0) as actl_wage_adj_amt, nvl(a.actl_wrk_hrs,0) as actl_hrs,nvl(a.actl_wage_adj_hrs,0) as actl_wage_adj_hrs from ww_wlp.dly_wage a, loc b, dept d where a.loc_no=b.loc_no and a.div_no=b.div_no and b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and b.zone_no='Zone' and a.dept_no NOT IN (20,27,28) and a.dly_wage_dte in (select distinct max(a.dly_wage_dte) as ltst_dte from dly_wage a, wk c where dly_wage_dte between c.wk_strt and c.wk_end and c.wk_id='Week') and a.dept_no=d.dept_no and a.div_no=d.div_no and d.dply_seq is not null and d.div_no='Division' and (b.zone_no,b.ar_no) NOT IN (select distinct b.zone_no,b.ar_no from TCName.name: WagesView
TCName.PlannedWagesColumn: select lc.ar_no,NVL(wge.mon,0) as Mon,NVL(wge.tue,0) as Tue,NVL(wge.wed,0) as Wed,NVL(wge.thu,0) as Thu, NVL(wge.fri,0) as Fri,NVL(wge.sat,0) as Sat,NVL(wge.sun,0) as Sun from (select distinct b.ar_no from ww_wlp.loc b where b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and b.zone_no='Zone' order by b.ar_no) lc LEFT OUTER JOIN (select z.ar_no,z.mon,z.tue,z.wed,z.thu,z.fri,z.sat,z.sun from (select x.*,(x.Mon + x.Tue + x.Wed + x.Thu + x.Fri + x.Sat + x.Sun) as WTD from (select b.ar_no, NVL(sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,00,b.PLN_WGE_DPZ)),0) Mon, NVL(sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,01,b.PLN_WGE_DPZ)),0) Tue, NVL(sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,02,b.PLN_WGE_DPZ)),0) Wed, NVL(sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,03,b.PLN_WGE_DPZ)),0) Thu, NVL(sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,04,b.PLN_WGE_DPZ)),0) Fri, NVL(sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,05,b.PLN_WGE_DPZ)),0) Sat, NVL(sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,06,b.PLN_WGE_DPZ)),0) Sun from (select h.ar_no,SUBSTR(h.day_of_wk,0,2) as dte_of_wk,ROUND(sum(h.PLN_WGE_DTS),0) as PLN_WGE_DPZ from (select e.ar_no,e.loc_nm,e.dply_seq,e.dept_nm,e.day_of_wk,sum(e.ta_pln_wage_amt) as PLN_WGE_DTS,sum(e.ta_pln_hrs) as PLN_HRS_DTS from (select b.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,b.loc_nm,a.dept_no,d.dept_nm,d.dply_seq,c.perd_desc,c.wk_id,a.dly_wage_dte,dy.day_of_wk, nvl(a.ta_pln_wage_amt,0) as ta_pln_wage_amt,nvl(a.ta_pln_hrs,0) as ta_pln_hrs from ww_wlp.krn_schd a, loc b, wk c , dept d, day dy where a.loc_no=b.loc_no and a.div_no=b.div_no and b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and b.zone_no='Zone' and a.dept_no NOT IN (20,27,28) and a.dly_wage_dte between c.wk_strt and c.wk_end /*and trunc(sysdate-1)*/ and c.wk_id='Week' and a.dept_no=d.dept_no and a.div_no=d.div_no and d.dply_seq is not null and d.div_no='Division' and a.dly_wage_dte=dy.day_dte and c.wk_id=dy.wk_id order by b.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,d.dply_seq,c.perd_desc,c.wk_id,a.dly_wage_dte,dy.day_of_wk) e group by e.ar_no,e.loc_nm,e.dply_seq,e.dept_nm,e.day_of_wk order by e.ar_no,e.loc_nm,e.dply_seq,e.day_of_wk) h group by h.ar_no,h.day_of_wk order by h.ar_no,h.day_of_wk) b group by b.ar_no order by b.ar_no) x ) z) wge on wge.ar_no=lc.ar_no order by lc.ar_no
TCName.PlannedWagesTotal: select lc.zone_no,NVL(wge.mon,0) as Mon,NVL(wge.tue,0) as Tue,NVL(wge.wed,0) as Wed,NVL(wge.thu,0) as Thu, NVL(wge.fri,0) as Fri,NVL(wge.sat,0) as Sat,NVL(wge.sun,0) as Sun z.zone_no,z.mon,z.tue,z.wed,z.thu,z.fri,z.sat,z.sun from (select x.*,(x.Mon + x.Tue + x.Wed + x.Thu + x.Fri + x.Sat + x.Sun) as WTD from (select b.zone_no, NVL(sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,00,b.PLN_WGE_TOT_DPZ)),0) Mon, NVL(sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,01,b.PLN_WGE_TOT_DPZ)),0) Tue, NVL(sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,02,b.PLN_WGE_TOT_DPZ)),0) Wed, NVL(sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,03,b.PLN_WGE_TOT_DPZ)),0) Thu, NVL(sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,04,b.PLN_WGE_TOT_DPZ)),0) Fri, NVL(sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,05,b.PLN_WGE_TOT_DPZ)),0) Sat, e.zone_no,e.loc_nm,e.dply_seq,e.dept_nm,e.day_of_wk,sum(e.ta_pln_wage_amt) as PLN_WGE_DTS,sum(e.ta_pln_hrs) as PLN_HRS_DTS from (select b.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,b.loc_nm,a.dept_no,d.dept_nm,d.dply_seq,c.perd_desc,c.wk_id,a.dly_wage_dte,dy.day_of_wk, nvl(a.ta_pln_wage_amt,0) as ta_pln_wage_amt,nvl(a.ta_pln_hrs,0) as ta_pln_hrs from ww_wlp.krn_schd a, loc b, wk c , dept d, day dy where a.loc_no=b.loc_no and a.div_no=b.div_no and b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and b.zone_no='Zone' and a.dept_no NOT IN (20,27,28) and a.dly_wage_dte between c.wk_strt and c.wk_end /*and trunc(sysdate-1)*/ and c.wk_id='Week' and a.dept_no=d.dept_no and a.div_no=d.div_no and d.dply_seq is not null and d.div_no='Division' and a.dly_wage_dte=dy.day_dte and c.wk_id=dy.wk_id order by b.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,d.dply_seq,c.perd_desc,c.wk_id,a.dly_wage_dte,dy.day_of_wk) e group by e.zone_no,e.ar_no,e.loc_nm,e.dply_seq,e.dept_nm,e.day_of_wk order by e.zone_no,e.ar_no,e.loc_nm,e.dply_seq,e.day_of_wk) h group by h.zone_no,h.day_of_wk order by h.zone_no,h.day_of_wk) b group by TCName.PlannedWagesWkToDt: select lc.ar_no,NVL(ROUND(wge.PLN_WAGE_DPZ,0),0) as PLN_WGE_DPZ from (select distinct b.ar_no from ww_wlp.loc b where b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and b.zone_no='Zone' order by b.ar_no) lc LEFT OUTER JOIN (select e.ar_no,(sum(e.ta_pln_wage_amt) + sum(e.wage_adj_amt)) as PLN_WAGE_DPZ, (sum(e.ta_pln_hrs) + sum(e.wage_adj_hrs)) as PLN_HOURS_DPZ from (select b.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,b.loc_nm,a.dept_no,d.dept_nm,d.dply_seq,c.perd_desc,c.wk_id, nvl(a.ta_pln_wage_amt,0) as ta_pln_wage_amt,nvl(a.wage_adj_amt,0) as wage_adj_amt,nvl(a.ta_pln_hrs,0) as ta_pln_hrs,nvl(a.wage_adj_hrs,0) as wage_adj_hrs from ww_wlp.wky_dept_pln a, loc b, wk c , dept d where a.loc_no=b.loc_no and a.div_no=b.div_no and b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and b.zone_no='Zone' and a.dept_no NOT IN (20,27,28) and a.wk_id=c.wk_id and c.wk_id='Week' and a.dept_no=d.dept_no and a.div_no=d.div_no and d.dply_seq is not null and d.div_no='Division' order by b.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,d.dply_seq,c.perd_desc,c.wk_id) e group by e.ar_no order by e.ar_no) wge on wge.ar_no=lc.ar_no
TCName.PlannedWagesWkToDtTotal: select lc.zone_no,NVL(ROUND(wge.PLN_WAGE_TOT_DPZ,0),0) as PLN_WGE_TOT_DPZ from (select distinct b.zone_no from ww_wlp.loc b where b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and b.zone_no='Zone' order by b.zone_no) lc LEFT OUTER JOIN (select e.zone_no,(sum(e.ta_pln_wage_amt) + sum(e.wage_adj_amt)) as PLN_WAGE_TOT_DPZ, (sum(e.ta_pln_hrs) + sum(e.wage_adj_hrs)) as PLN_HOURS_TOT_DPZ from (select b.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,b.loc_nm,a.dept_no,d.dept_nm,d.dply_seq,c.perd_desc,c.wk_id, nvl(a.ta_pln_wage_amt,0) as ta_pln_wage_amt,nvl(a.wage_adj_amt,0) as wage_adj_amt,nvl(a.ta_pln_hrs,0) as ta_pln_hrs,nvl(a.wage_adj_hrs,0) as wage_adj_hrs from ww_wlp.wky_dept_pln a, loc b, wk c , dept d where a.loc_no=b.loc_no and a.div_no=b.div_no and b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and b.zone_no='Zone' and a.dept_no NOT IN (20,27,28) and a.wk_id=c.wk_id and c.wk_id='Week' and a.dept_no=d.dept_no and a.div_no=d.div_no and d.dply_seq is not null and d.div_no='Division' order by b.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,d.dply_seq,c.perd_desc,c.wk_id) e group by e.zone_no order by e.zone_no) wge on wge.zone_no=lc.zone_no order by lc.zone_no
TCName.ActualWagesColumn: select lc.ar_no,NVL(wge.mon,0) as Mon,NVL(wge.tue,0) as Tue,NVL(wge.wed,0) as Wed,NVL(wge.thu,0) as Thu, NVL(wge.fri,0) as Fri,NVL(wge.sat,0) as Sat,NVL(wge.sun,0) as Sun TCName.ActualWagesWkToDt: select lc.ar_no,NVL(ROUND(wge.ACTL_WGE_DTSG,0),0) as WTD from (select distinct b.ar_no from ww_wlp.loc b where b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and b.zone_no='Zone' order by b.ar_no) lc LEFT OUTER JOIN (select j.ar_no,sum(j.ACTL_WAGE_DTSG) as ACTL_WGE_DTSG,sum(j.ACTL_HOURS_DTSG) as ACTL_HRS_DTSG from (select * from (select h.ar_no,sum(h.ACTL_WAGE_DTS) as ACTL_WAGE_DTSG,sum(h.ACTL_HOURS_DTS) as ACTL_HOURS_DTSG from (select e.ar_no,e.dply_seq,sum(e.actl_amt) as ACTL_WAGE_DTS,sum(e.actl_hrs) as ACTL_HOURS_DTS from (select b.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,b.loc_nm,a.dept_no,d.dept_nm,d.dply_seq,c.perd_desc,c.wk_id,a.dly_wage_dte,dy.day_of_wk, nvl(a.actl_amt,0) as actl_amt,nvl(a.actl_hrs,0) as actl_hrs from ww_wlp.actl_dly_wage_krn a, loc b, wk c , dept d, day dy where a.loc_no=b.loc_no and a.div_no=b.div_no and b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and b.zone_no='Zone' and a.dept_no NOT IN (20,27,28) and a.dly_wage_dte between c.wk_strt and c.wk_end and c.wk_id='Week' and a.dept_no=d.dept_no and a.div_no=d.div_no and d.dply_seq is not null and d.div_no='Division' and a.dly_wage_dte=dy.day_dte and c.wk_id=dy.wk_id and a.actl_amt is NOT NULL and a.actl_amt!=0 order by b.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,d.dply_seq,c.perd_desc,c.wk_id,a.dly_wage_dte,dy.day_of_wk) e group by e.ar_no,e.dply_seq order by e.ar_no,e.dply_seq) h group by h.ar_no order by h.ar_no) as ACTL_WAGE_DTS, (sum(e.actl_hrs) + sum(e.actl_wage_adj_hrs)) as ACTL_HOURS_DTS from (select b.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,a.dept_no,d.dept_nm,d.dply_seq,a.dly_wage_dte, dept d where a.loc_no=b.loc_no and a.div_no=b.div_no and b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and b.zone_no='Zone' and a.dept_no NOT IN (20,27,28) and a.dly_wage_dte in (select distinct max(a.dly_wage_dte) as ltst_dte from dly_wage a, wk c where dly_wage_dte between c.wk_strt and c.wk_end and c.wk_id='Week') and a.dept_no=d.dept_no and a.div_no=d.div_no and d.dply_seq is not null and d.div_no='Division' and (b.ar_no) NOT IN (select distinct b.ar_no from ww_wlp.actl_dly_wage_krn a, loc b, wk c , dept d, day dy where a.loc_no=b.loc_no and a.div_no=b.div_no and b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and b.zone_no='Zone' and a.dept_no NOT IN (20,27,28) and a.dly_wage_dte between c.wk_strt and c.wk_end and c.wk_id='Week' and a.dept_no=d.dept_no and a.div_no=d.div_no and TCName.VarianceWagesColumn: select nyu.ar_no, case when den.Mon=0 or nyu.Mon=0 then 0 else ROUND((den.Mon - nyu.Mon),2) end as Mon, case when den.Tue=0 or nyu.Tue=0 then 0 else ROUND((den.Tue - nyu.Tue),2) end as Tue, case when den.Wed=0 or nyu.Wed=0 then 0 else ROUND((den.Wed - nyu.Wed),2) end as Wed, case when den.Thu=0 or nyu.Thu=0 then 0 else ROUND((den.Thu - nyu.Thu),2) end as Thu, case when den.Fri=0 or nyu.Fri=0 then 0 else ROUND((den.Fri - nyu.Fri),2) end as Fri, case when den.Sat=0 or nyu.Sat=0 then 0 else ROUND((den.Sat - nyu.Sat),2) end as Sat, case when den.Sun=0 or nyu.Sun=0 then 0 else ROUND((den.Sun - nyu.Sun),2) end as Sun from (select lc.ar_no,NVL(wge.mon,0) as Mon,NVL(wge.tue,0) as Tue,NVL(wge.wed,0) as Wed,NVL(wge.thu,0) as Thu, NVL(wge.fri,0) as Fri,NVL(wge.sat,0) as Sat,NVL(wge.sun,0) as Sun from (select distinct b.ar_no from ww_wlp.loc b where b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and b.zone_no='Zone' order by b.ar_no) lc LEFT OUTER JOIN (select z.ar_no,z.mon,z.tue,z.wed,z.thu,z.fri,z.sat,z.sun,z.wtd from (select x.*,(x.Mon + x.Tue + x.Wed + x.Thu + x.Fri + x.Sat + x.Sun) as WTD from (select b.ar_no, NVL(sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,00,b.ACTL_WGE_DTSG)),0) Mon, NVL(sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,01,b.ACTL_WGE_DTSG)),0) Tue, NVL(sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,02,b.ACTL_WGE_DTSG)),0) Wed, NVL(sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,06,b.ACTL_WGE_DTSG)),0) Sun from (select h.ar_no,SUBSTR(h.day_of_wk,0,2) as dte_of_wk,ROUND(sum(h.ACTL_WGE_DTS),0) as ACTL_WGE_DTSG from (select * from (select e.ar_no,e.dply_seq,e.day_of_wk,sum(e.actl_amt) as ACTL_WGE_DTS,sum(e.actl_hrs) as ACTL_HRS_DTS from (select b.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,b.loc_nm,a.dept_no,d.dept_nm,d.dply_seq,c.perd_desc,c.wk_id,a.dly_wage_dte,dy.day_of_wk, nvl(a.actl_amt,0) as actl_amt,nvl(a.actl_hrs,0) as actl_hrs from ww_wlp.actl_dly_wage_krn a, loc b, wk c , dept d, day dy where a.loc_no=b.loc_no and a.div_no=b.div_no and b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and b.zone_no='Zone' and a.dept_no NOT IN (20,27,28) and a.dly_wage_dte between c.wk_strt and c.wk_end and c.wk_id='Week' and a.dept_no=d.dept_no and a.div_no=d.div_no and d.dply_seq is not null and d.div_no='Division' and a.dly_wage_dte=dy.day_dte and c.wk_id=dy.wk_id and a.actl_amt is NOT NULL and a.actl_amt!=0 order by b.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,d.dply_seq,c.perd_desc,c.wk_id,a.dly_wage_dte,dy.day_of_wk) e group by e.ar_no,e.dply_seq,e.day_of_wk order by e.ar_no,e.dply_seq,e.day_of_wk) f /*UNION b.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,b.loc_nm,a.dept_no,d.dept_nm,d.dply_seq,c.perd_desc,c.wk_id,a.dly_wage_dte,dy.day_of_wk, nvl(a.ta_pln_wage_amt,0) as ta_pln_wage_amt,nvl(a.ta_pln_hrs,0) as ta_pln_hrs from ww_wlp.krn_schd a, loc b, wk c , dept d, day dy where a.loc_no=b.loc_no and a.div_no=b.div_no and b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and b.zone_no='Zone' and a.dept_no NOT IN (20,27,28) and a.dly_wage_dte between c.wk_strt /*and c.wk_end and sysdate-1 and c.wk_id='Week' and a.dept_no=d.dept_no and a.div_no=d.div_no and d.dply_seq is not null and d.div_no='Division' and a.dly_wage_dte=dy.day_dte and c.wk_id=dy.wk_id order by b.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,d.dply_seq,c.perd_desc,c.wk_id,a.dly_wage_dte,dy.day_of_wk) e group by e.ar_no,e.dply_seq,e.day_of_wk order by e.ar_no,e.dply_seq,e.day_of_wk) g where (g.ar_no,g.day_of_wk) NOT IN (select distinct e.ar_no,e.day_of_wk from (select b.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,b.loc_nm,a.dept_no,d.dept_nm,d.dply_seq,c.perd_desc,c.wk_id,a.dly_wage_dte,dy.day_of_wk, nvl(a.actl_amt,0) as actl_amt,nvl(a.actl_hrs,0) as actl_hrs from ww_wlp.actl_dly_wage_krn a, loc b, wk c , dept d, day dy where a.loc_no=b.loc_no and a.div_no=b.div_no and b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and b.zone_no='Zone' and a.dept_no NOT IN (20,27,28) and a.dly_wage_dte between c.wk_strt and c.wk_end and c.wk_id='Week' and a.dept_no=d.dept_no and a.div_no=d.div_no and d.dply_seq is not null and d.div_no='Division' and a.dly_wage_dte=dy.day_dte and c.wk_id=dy.wk_id and a.actl_amt is NOT NULL and a.actl_amt!=0 order by b.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,d.dply_seq,c.perd_desc,c.wk_id,a.dly_wage_dte,dy.day_of_wk) e) */) h group by h.ar_no,h.day_of_wk order by h.ar_no,h.day_of_wk) b group by b.ar_no order by b.ar_no) x ) z) wge on wge.ar_no=lc.ar_no order by lc.ar_no) den, (select lc.ar_no,NVL(wge.mon,0) as Mon,NVL(wge.tue,0) as Tue,NVL(wge.wed,0) as Wed,NVL(wge.thu,0) as Thu, NVL(wge.fri,0) as Fri,NVL(wge.sat,0) as Sat,NVL(wge.sun,0) as Sun from (select distinct b.ar_no from ww_wlp.loc b where b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and b.zone_no='Zone' order by b.ar_no) lc LEFT OUTER JOIN (select z.ar_no,z.mon,z.tue,z.wed,z.thu,z.fri,z.sat,z.sun from (select x.*,(x.Mon + x.Tue + x.Wed + x.Thu + x.Fri + x.Sat + x.Sun) as WTD from (select b.ar_no, NVL(sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,00,b.PLN_WGE_DPZ)),0) Mon, NVL(sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,01,b.PLN_WGE_DPZ)),0) Tue, NVL(sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,02,b.PLN_WGE_DPZ)),0) Wed, NVL(sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,03,b.PLN_WGE_DPZ)),0) Thu, NVL(sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,04,b.PLN_WGE_DPZ)),0) Fri, NVL(sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,05,b.PLN_WGE_DPZ)),0) Sat, NVL(sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,06,b.PLN_WGE_DPZ)),0) Sun from (select h.ar_no,SUBSTR(h.day_of_wk,0,2) as dte_of_wk,ROUND(sum(h.PLN_WGE_DTS),0) as PLN_WGE_DPZ from (select e.ar_no,e.loc_nm,e.dply_seq,e.dept_nm,e.day_of_wk,sum(e.ta_pln_wage_amt) as PLN_WGE_DTS,sum(e.ta_pln_hrs) as PLN_HRS_DTS from (select b.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,b.loc_nm,a.dept_no,d.dept_nm,d.dply_seq,c.perd_desc,c.wk_id,a.dly_wage_dte,dy.day_of_wk, nvl(a.ta_pln_wage_amt,0) as ta_pln_wage_amt,nvl(a.ta_pln_hrs,0) as ta_pln_hrs from ww_wlp.krn_schd a, loc b, wk c , dept d, day dy where a.loc_no=b.loc_no and a.div_no=b.div_no and b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and b.zone_no='Zone' and a.dept_no NOT IN (20,27,28) and a.dly_wage_dte between c.wk_strt and c.wk_end /*and trunc(sysdate-1)*/ and c.wk_id='Week' and a.dept_no=d.dept_no and a.div_no=d.div_no and d.dply_seq is not null and d.div_no='Division' and a.dly_wage_dte=dy.day_dte and c.wk_id=dy.wk_id order by b.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,d.dply_seq,c.perd_desc,c.wk_id,a.dly_wage_dte,dy.day_of_wk) e group by e.ar_no,e.loc_nm,e.dply_seq,e.dept_nm,e.day_of_wk order by e.ar_no,e.loc_nm,e.dply_seq,e.day_of_wk) h group by h.ar_no,h.day_of_wk order by h.ar_no,h.day_of_wk) b group by b.ar_no order by b.ar_no) x ) z) wge on wge.ar_no=lc.ar_no order by lc.ar_no) nyu where nyu.ar_no = den.ar_no
TCName.VarianceWagesTotal: select nyu.zone_no, case when den.Mon=0 or nyu.Mon=0 then 0 else ROUND((den.Mon - nyu.Mon),2) end as Mon, case when den.Tue=0 or nyu.Tue=0 then 0 else ROUND((den.Tue - (20,27,28) and a.dly_wage_dte between c.wk_strt and c.wk_end and c.wk_id='Week' and a.dept_no=d.dept_no and a.div_no=d.div_no and d.dply_seq is not null and d.div_no='Division' and e.zone_no,e.ar_no,e.dply_seq,(sum(e.actl_wage_amt) + sum(e.actl_wage_adj_amt)) as ACTL_WAGE_DTS, (sum(e.actl_hrs) + sum(e.actl_wage_adj_hrs)) as ACTL_HOURS_DTS from (select b.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,a.dept_no,d.dept_nm,d.dply_seq,a.dly_wage_dte, nvl(a.actl_wage_amt,0) as actl_wage_amt,nvl(a.actl_wage_adj_amt,0) as actl_wage_adj_amt, nvl(a.actl_hrs,0) as actl_hrs,nvl(a.actl_wage_adj_hrs,0) as actl_wage_adj_hrs from ww_wlp.dly_wage a, loc b, dept d where a.loc_no=b.loc_no and a.div_no=b.div_no and b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and b.zone_no='Zone' and a.dept_no NOT IN (20,27,28) and a.dly_wage_dte in (select distinct max(a.dly_wage_dte) as ltst_dte from dly_wage a, wk c where dly_wage_dte between c.wk_strt and c.wk_end and c.wk_id='Week') and a.dept_no=d.dept_no and a.div_no=d.div_no and d.dply_seq is not null and d.div_no='Division' and (b.zone_no,b.ar_no) NOT IN (select distinct b.zone_no,b.ar_no from ww_wlp.actl_dly_wage_krn a, loc b, wk c , dept d, day dy where a.loc_no=b.loc_no and a.div_no=b.div_no and b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and b.zone_no='Zone' and a.dept_no NOT IN (20,27,28) and a.dly_wage_dte between c.wk_strt and c.wk_end and c.wk_id='Week' and a.dept_no=d.dept_no and a.div_no=d.div_no and d.dply_seq is not null and d.div_no='Division' and a.dly_wage_dte=dy.day_dte and c.wk_id=dy.wk_id and a.actl_amt is NOT NULL and a.actl_amt!=0) order by b.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,d.dply_seq,a.dly_wage_dte) e group by e.zone_no,e.ar_no,e.dply_seq order by e.zone_no,e.ar_no,e.dply_seq) h group by h.zone_no,h.ar_no order by h.zone_no,h.ar_no) g /*UNION select * from (select e.zone_no,e.ar_no,(sum(e.ta_pln_wage_amt) + sum(e.wage_adj_amt)) as PLN_WAGE_DTSG, (sum(e.ta_pln_hrs) + sum(e.wage_adj_hrs)) as PLN_HOURS_DTSG from (select b.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,b.loc_nm,a.dept_no,d.dept_nm,d.dply_seq,c.perd_desc,c.wk_id, nvl(a.ta_pln_wage_amt,0) as ta_pln_wage_amt,nvl(a.wage_adj_amt,0) as wage_adj_amt,nvl(a.ta_pln_hrs,0) as ta_pln_hrs,nvl(a.wage_adj_hrs,0) as wage_adj_hrs from ww_wlp.wky_dept_pln a, loc b, wk c , dept d where a.loc_no=b.loc_no and a.div_no=b.div_no and b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and b.zone_no='Zone' and a.dept_no NOT IN (20,27,28) and a.wk_id=c.wk_id and c.wk_id='Week' and a.dept_no=d.dept_no and a.div_no=d.div_no and d.dply_seq is not null and d.div_no='Division' and (b.zone_no,b.ar_no) NOT IN (select distinct b.zone_no,b.ar_no from ww_wlp.actl_dly_wage_krn a, loc b, wk c , dept d, day dy where a.loc_no=b.loc_no and a.div_no=b.div_no and b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and b.zone_no='Zone' and a.dept_no NOT IN (20,27,28) and a.dly_wage_dte between c.wk_strt and c.wk_end and c.wk_id='Week' and a.dept_no=d.dept_no and a.div_no=d.div_no and d.dply_seq is not null and d.div_no='Division' and a.dly_wage_dte=dy.day_dte and c.wk_id=dy.wk_id and a.actl_amt is NOT NULL and a.actl_amt!=0) and (b.zone_no,b.ar_no) NOT IN (select distinct b.zone_no,b.ar_no from ww_wlp.dly_wage a, loc b, dept d where a.loc_no=b.loc_no and a.div_no=b.div_no and b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and b.zone_no='Zone' and a.dept_no NOT IN (20,27,28) and a.dly_wage_dte in (select distinct max(a.dly_wage_dte) as ltst_dte from dly_wage a, wk c where dly_wage_dte between c.wk_strt and c.wk_end and c.wk_id='Week') and a.dept_no=d.dept_no and a.div_no=d.div_no and d.dply_seq is not null and d.div_no='Division') order by b.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,d.dply_seq,c.perd_desc,c.wk_id) e group by e.zone_no,e.ar_no order by e.zone_no,e.ar_no) i*/) j group by j.zone_no order by j.zone_no) wge on wge.zone_no=lc.zone_no order by lc.zone_no) den, (select lc.zone_no,NVL(ROUND(wge.PLN_WAGE_TOT_DPZ,0),0) as WTD from (select distinct b.zone_no from ww_wlp.loc b where b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and b.zone_no='Zone' order by b.zone_no) lc LEFT OUTER JOIN (select e.zone_no,(sum(e.ta_pln_wage_amt) + sum(e.wage_adj_amt)) as PLN_WAGE_TOT_DPZ, (sum(e.ta_pln_hrs) + sum(e.wage_adj_hrs)) as PLN_HOURS_TOT_DPZ from (select b.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,b.loc_nm,a.dept_no,d.dept_nm,d.dply_seq,c.perd_desc,c.wk_id, nvl(a.ta_pln_wage_amt,0) as ta_pln_wage_amt,nvl(a.wage_adj_amt,0) as wage_adj_amt,nvl(a.ta_pln_hrs,0) as ta_pln_hrs,nvl(a.wage_adj_hrs,0) as wage_adj_hrs from ww_wlp.wky_dept_pln a, loc b, wk c , dept d where a.loc_no=b.loc_no and a.div_no=b.div_no and b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and b.zone_no='Zone' and a.dept_no NOT IN (20,27,28) and a.wk_id=c.wk_id and c.wk_id='Week' and a.dept_no=d.dept_no and a.div_no=d.div_no and d.dply_seq is not null and d.div_no='Division' order by b.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,d.dply_seq,c.perd_desc,c.wk_id) e group by e.zone_no order by e.zone_no) wge on wge.zone_no=lc.zone_no order by lc.zone_no) nyu where nyu.zone_no = den.zone_no

TCName.name: WagesPercentageView
TCName.PlannedWagesPrcntColumn: select wge.ar_no,CASE WHEN NVL(wge.mon,0) = 0 AND NVL(sls.mon,0) = 0 THEN 0 WHEN NVL(wge.mon,0) = 0 THEN 0 WHEN NVL(sls.mon,0) = 0 THEN 0 ELSE NVL(ROUND((wge.mon / sls.mon)*100,2),0) END as Mon, CASE WHEN NVL(wge.tue,0) = 0 AND NVL(sls.tue,0) = 0 THEN 0 WHEN NVL(wge.tue,0) = 0 THEN 0 WHEN NVL(sls.tue,0) = 0 THEN 0 ELSE NVL(ROUND((wge.tue / sls.tue)*100,2),0) END as Tue, CASE WHEN NVL(wge.wed,0) = 0 AND NVL(sls.wed,0) = 0 THEN 0 WHEN NVL(wge.wed,0) = 0 THEN 0 WHEN NVL(sls.wed,0) = 0 THEN 0 ELSE NVL(ROUND((wge.wed / sls.wed)*100,2),0) END as Wed, CASE WHEN NVL(wge.thu,0) = 0 AND NVL(sls.thu,0) = 0 THEN 0 WHEN NVL(wge.thu,0) = 0 THEN 0 WHEN NVL(sls.thu,0) = 0 THEN 0 ELSE NVL(ROUND((wge.thu / sls.thu)*100,2),0) END as Thu, CASE WHEN NVL(wge.fri,0) = 0 AND NVL(sls.fri,0) = 0 THEN 0 WHEN NVL(wge.fri,0) = 0 THEN 0 WHEN NVL(sls.fri,0) = 0 THEN 0 ELSE NVL(ROUND((wge.fri / sls.fri)*100,2),0) END as Fri, CASE WHEN NVL(wge.sat,0) = 0 AND NVL(sls.sat,0) = 0 THEN 0 WHEN NVL(wge.sat,0) = 0 THEN 0 WHEN NVL(sls.sat,0) = 0 THEN 0 ELSE NVL(ROUND((wge.sat / sls.sat)*100,2),0) END as Sat, CASE WHEN NVL(wge.sun,0) = 0 AND NVL(sls.sun,0) = 0 THEN 0 WHEN NVL(wge.sun,0) = 0 THEN 0 WHEN NVL(sls.sun,0) = 0 THEN 0 ELSE NVL(ROUND((wge.sun / sls.sun)*100,2),0) END as Sun from (select lc.ar_no,wge.mon,wge.tue,wge.wed,wge.thu,wge.fri,wge.sat,wge.sun from (select distinct b.ar_no from ww_wlp.loc b where b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and b.zone_no='Zone' order by b.ar_no) lc LEFT OUTER JOIN (select z.ar_no,z.mon,z.tue,z.wed,z.thu,z.fri,z.sat,z.sun from (select x.*,(x.Mon + x.Tue + x.Wed + x.Thu + x.Fri + x.Sat + x.Sun) as WTD from (select b.ar_no, NVL(sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,00,b.PLN_WGE_DPZ)),0) Mon, NVL(sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,01,b.PLN_WGE_DPZ)),0) Tue, NVL(sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,02,b.PLN_WGE_DPZ)),0) Wed, NVL(sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,03,b.PLN_WGE_DPZ)),0) Thu, NVL(sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,04,b.PLN_WGE_DPZ)),0) Fri, NVL(sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,05,b.PLN_WGE_DPZ)),0) Sat, NVL(sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,06,b.PLN_WGE_DPZ)),0) Sun from (select h.ar_no,SUBSTR(h.day_of_wk,0,2) as dte_of_wk,ROUND(sum(h.PLN_WGE_DTS),0) as PLN_WGE_DPZ from (select e.ar_no,e.loc_nm,e.dply_seq,e.dept_nm,e.day_of_wk,sum(e.ta_pln_wage_amt) as PLN_WGE_DTS,sum(e.ta_pln_hrs) as PLN_HRS_DTS from (select b.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,b.loc_nm,a.dept_no,d.dept_nm,d.dply_seq,c.perd_desc,c.wk_id,a.dly_wage_dte,dy.day_of_wk, nvl(a.ta_pln_wage_amt,0) as ta_pln_wage_amt,nvl(a.ta_pln_hrs,0) as ta_pln_hrs from ww_wlp.krn_schd a, loc b, wk c , dept d, day dy where a.loc_no=b.loc_no and a.div_no=b.div_no and b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and b.zone_no='Zone' and a.dept_no NOT IN (20,27,28) and a.dly_wage_dte between c.wk_strt and c.wk_end /*and trunc(sysdate-1)*/ and c.wk_id='Week' and a.dept_no=d.dept_no and a.div_no=d.div_no and d.dply_seq is not null and d.div_no='Division' and a.dly_wage_dte=dy.day_dte and c.wk_id=dy.wk_id order by b.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,d.dply_seq,c.perd_desc,c.wk_id,a.dly_wage_dte,dy.day_of_wk) e group by e.ar_no,e.loc_nm,e.dply_seq,e.dept_nm,e.day_of_wk order by e.ar_no,e.loc_nm,e.dply_seq,e.day_of_wk) h group by h.ar_no,h.day_of_wk order by h.ar_no,h.day_of_wk) b group by b.ar_no order by b.ar_no) x ) z) wge on wge.ar_no=lc.ar_no order by lc.ar_no) wge, (select z.ar_no,y.Mon,y.Tue,y.Wed,y.Thu,y.Fri,y.Sat,y.Sun,y.wtd from (select distinct b.ar_no from ww_wlp.loc b where b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and b.zone_no='Zone' order by b.ar_no) z LEFT OUTER JOIN (select x.*,(x.Mon + x.Tue + x.Wed + x.Thu + x.Fri + x.Sat + x.Sun) as WTD from (select b.ar_no, NVL(sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,00,b.PLN_SLS_DPZ)),0) Mon, NVL(sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,01,b.PLN_SLS_DPZ)),0) Tue, NVL(sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,02,b.PLN_SLS_DPZ)),0) Wed, NVL(sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,03,b.PLN_SLS_DPZ)),0) Thu, NVL(sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,04,b.PLN_SLS_DPZ)),0) Fri, NVL(sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,05,b.PLN_SLS_DPZ)),0) Sat, NVL(sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,06,b.PLN_SLS_DPZ)),0) Sun from (select h.ar_no,SUBSTR(h.day_of_wk,0,2) as dte_of_wk,sum(h.PLN_SLS_DTS) as PLN_SLS_DPZ from (select * from (select e.ar_no,e.loc_nm,e.dply_seq,e.dept_nm,e.day_of_wk,sum(e.mgr_pln_sls) as PLN_SLS_DTS,sum(e.mgr_pln_itm_cnt) as PLN_ITM_DTS from (select b.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,b.loc_nm,a.dept_no,d.dept_nm,d.dply_seq,c.perd_desc,c.wk_id,a.mgr_pln_sls_dte,dy.day_of_wk, nvl(a.mgr_pln_sls,0) as mgr_pln_sls,nvl(a.mgr_pln_itm_cnt,0) as mgr_pln_itm_cnt,nvl(a.mgr_pln_cust_cnt,0) as mgr_pln_cust_cnt from ww_wlp.mgr_dly_pln a, loc b, wk c , dept d, day dy where a.loc_no=b.loc_no and a.div_no=b.div_no and b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and b.zone_no='Zone' and a.dept_no NOT IN (0,90,20) and a.mgr_pln_sls_dte between c.wk_strt and c.wk_end and c.wk_id='Week' and a.dept_no=d.dept_no and a.div_no=d.div_no and d.dply_seq is not null and d.div_no='Division' and a.mgr_pln_sls_dte=dy.day_dte and c.wk_id=dy.wk_id order by b.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,d.dply_seq,c.perd_desc,c.wk_id,a.mgr_pln_sls_dte,dy.day_of_wk) e group by e.ar_no,e.loc_nm,e.dply_seq,e.dept_nm,e.day_of_wk order by e.ar_no,e.loc_nm,e.dply_seq,e.day_of_wk) f UNION select * from (select e.ar_no,e.loc_nm,e.dply_seq,e.dept_nm,e.day_of_wk,sum(e.gnrt_sls) as GEN_SLS_DTS,sum(e.gnrt_itm) as GEN_ITM_DTS from (select b.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,b.loc_nm,a.dept_no,d.dept_nm,d.dply_seq,c.perd_desc,c.wk_id,a.fcst_dte,dy.day_of_wk, nvl(a.gnrt_sls,0) as gnrt_sls,nvl(a.gnrt_itm,0) as gnrt_itm,nvl(a.gnrt_cust,0) as gnrt_cust from ww_wlp.fcst a, loc b, wk c , dept d, day dy where a.loc_no=b.loc_no and a.div_no=b.div_no and b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and b.zone_no='Zone' and a.dept_no NOT IN (0,90,20) and a.fcst_dte between c.wk_strt and c.wk_end and c.wk_id='Week' and a.dept_no=d.dept_no and a.div_no=d.div_no and d.dply_seq is not null and d.div_no='Division' and (a.loc_no,a.dept_no,a.fcst_dte) NOT IN (select a.loc_no,a.dept_no,a.mgr_pln_sls_dte from mgr_dly_pln a, loc b, wk c where a.mgr_pln_sls_dte between c.wk_strt and c.wk_end and c.wk_id='Week' and a.loc_no=b.loc_no and a.div_no=b.div_no and b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and b.zone_no='Zone') and a.fcst_dte=dy.day_dte and c.wk_id=dy.wk_id order by b.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,d.dply_seq,c.perd_desc,c.wk_id,a.fcst_dte,dy.day_of_wk) e group by e.ar_no,e.loc_nm,e.dply_seq,e.dept_nm,e.day_of_wk order by e.ar_no,e.loc_nm,e.dply_seq,e.day_of_wk) g) h group by h.ar_no,h.day_of_wk order by h.ar_no,h.day_of_wk) b group by b.ar_no order by b.ar_no) x ) y on z.ar_no=y.ar_no order by z.ar_no) sls where wge.ar_no=sls.ar_no order by wge.ar_no
TCName.PlannedWagesPrcntTotal: select wge.zone_no,CASE WHEN NVL(wge.mon,0) = 0 AND NVL(sls.mon,0) = 0 THEN 0 WHEN NVL(wge.mon,0) = 0 THEN 0 WHEN NVL(sls.mon,0) = 0 THEN 0 ELSE NVL(ROUND((wge.mon / sls.mon)*100,2),0) END as Mon, CASE WHEN NVL(wge.tue,0) = 0 AND NVL(sls.tue,0) = 0 THEN 0 WHEN NVL(wge.tue,0) = 0 THEN 0 WHEN NVL(sls.tue,0) = 0 THEN 0 ELSE NVL(ROUND((wge.tue / sls.tue)*100,2),0) END as Tue, CASE WHEN NVL(wge.wed,0) = 0 AND NVL(sls.wed,0) = 0 THEN 0 WHEN NVL(wge.wed,0) = 0 THEN 0 WHEN NVL(sls.wed,0) = 0 THEN 0 ELSE NVL(ROUND((wge.wed / sls.wed)*100,2),0) END as Wed, CASE WHEN NVL(wge.thu,0) = 0 AND NVL(sls.thu,0) = 0 THEN 0 WHEN NVL(wge.thu,0) = 0 THEN 0 WHEN NVL(sls.thu,0) = 0 THEN 0 ELSE NVL(ROUND((wge.thu / sls.thu)*100,2),0) END as Thu, CASE WHEN NVL(wge.fri,0) = 0 AND NVL(sls.fri,0) = 0 THEN 0 WHEN NVL(wge.fri,0) = 0 THEN 0 WHEN NVL(sls.fri,0) = 0 THEN 0 ELSE NVL(ROUND((wge.fri / sls.fri)*100,2),0) END as Fri, CASE WHEN NVL(wge.sat,0) = 0 AND NVL(sls.sat,0) = 0 THEN 0 WHEN NVL(wge.sat,0) = 0 THEN 0 WHEN NVL(sls.sat,0) = 0 THEN 0 ELSE NVL(ROUND((wge.sat / sls.sat)*100,2),0) END as Sat, CASE WHEN NVL(wge.sun,0) = 0 AND NVL(sls.sun,0) = 0 THEN 0 WHEN NVL(wge.sun,0) = 0 THEN 0 WHEN NVL(sls.sun,0) = 0 THEN 0 ELSE NVL(ROUND((wge.sun / sls.sun)*100,2),0) END as Sun from (select lc.zone_no,wge.mon,wge.tue,wge.wed,wge.thu,wge.fri,wge.sat,wge.sun from (select distinct b.zone_no from ww_wlp.loc b where b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and b.zone_no='Zone' order by b.zone_no) lc LEFT OUTER JOIN (select z.zone_no,z.mon,z.tue,z.wed,z.thu,z.fri,z.sat,z.sun from (select x.*,(x.Mon + x.Tue + x.Wed + x.Thu + x.Fri + x.Sat + x.Sun) as WTD from (select b.zone_no, NVL(sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,00,b.PLN_WGE_TOT_DPZ)),0) Mon, NVL(sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,01,b.PLN_WGE_TOT_DPZ)),0) Tue, NVL(sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,02,b.PLN_WGE_TOT_DPZ)),0) Wed, NVL(sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,03,b.PLN_WGE_TOT_DPZ)),0) Thu, NVL(sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,04,b.PLN_WGE_TOT_DPZ)),0) Fri, NVL(sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,05,b.PLN_WGE_TOT_DPZ)),0) Sat, NVL(sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,06,b.PLN_WGE_TOT_DPZ)),0) Sun from (select h.zone_no,SUBSTR(h.day_of_wk,0,2) as dte_of_wk,ROUND(sum(h.PLN_WGE_DTS),0) as PLN_WGE_TOT_DPZ from (select e.zone_no,e.ar_no,e.loc_nm,e.dply_seq,e.dept_nm,e.day_of_wk,sum(e.ta_pln_wage_amt) as PLN_WGE_DTS,sum(e.ta_pln_hrs) as PLN_HRS_DTS from (select b.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,b.loc_nm,a.dept_no,d.dept_nm,d.dply_seq,c.perd_desc,c.wk_id,a.dly_wage_dte,dy.day_of_wk, nvl(a.ta_pln_wage_amt,0) as ta_pln_wage_amt,nvl(a.ta_pln_hrs,0) as ta_pln_hrs from ww_wlp.krn_schd a, loc b, wk c , dept d, day dy where a.loc_no=b.loc_no and a.div_no=b.div_no and b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and b.zone_no='Zone' and a.dept_no NOT IN (20,27,28) and a.dly_wage_dte between c.wk_strt and c.wk_end /*and trunc(sysdate-1)*/ and c.wk_id='Week' and a.dept_no=d.dept_no and a.div_no=d.div_no and d.dply_seq is not null and d.div_no='Division' and a.dly_wage_dte=dy.day_dte and c.wk_id=dy.wk_id order by b.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,d.dply_seq,c.perd_desc,c.wk_id,a.dly_wage_dte,dy.day_of_wk) e group by TCName.VarianceWagesPrcntColumn: select nyu.ar_no, case when den.Mon=0 or nyu.Mon=0 then 0 else ROUND((den.Mon - nyu.Mon),2) end as Mon, case when den.Tue=0 or nyu.Tue=0 then 0 else ROUND((den.Tue - nyu.Tue),2) end as Tue, case when den.Wed=0 or nyu.Wed=0 then 0 else ROUND((den.Wed - nyu.Wed),2) end as Wed, case when den.Thu=0 or nyu.Thu=0 then 0 else ROUND((den.Thu - nyu.Thu),2) end as Thu, case when den.Fri=0 or nyu.Fri=0 then 0 else ROUND((den.Fri - nyu.Fri),2) end as Fri, case when den.Sat=0 or nyu.Sat=0 then 0 else ROUND((den.Sat - nyu.Sat),2) end as Sat, case when den.Sun=0 or nyu.Sun=0 then 0 else ROUND((den.Sun - nyu.Sun),2) end as Sun from (select wge.ar_no,CASE WHEN NVL(wge.mon,0) = 0 AND NVL(sls.mon,0) = 0 THEN 0 WHEN NVL(wge.mon,0) = 0 THEN 0 WHEN NVL(sls.mon,0) = 0 THEN 0 ELSE NVL(ROUND((wge.mon / sls.mon)*100,2),0) END as Mon, CASE WHEN NVL(wge.tue,0) = 0 AND NVL(sls.tue,0) = 0 THEN 0 WHEN NVL(wge.tue,0) = 0 THEN 0 WHEN NVL(sls.tue,0) = 0 THEN 0 ELSE NVL(ROUND((wge.tue / as Wed, CASE WHEN NVL(wge.thu,0) = 0 AND NVL(sls.thu,0) = 0 THEN 0 WHEN NVL(wge.thu,0) = 0 THEN 0 WHEN NVL(sls.thu,0) = 0 THEN 0 ELSE NVL(ROUND((wge.thu / sls.thu)*100,2),0) END as Thu, CASE WHEN NVL(wge.fri,0) = 0 AND NVL(sls.fri,0) = 0 THEN 0 WHEN NVL(wge.fri,0) = 0 THEN 0 WHEN NVL(sls.fri,0) = 0 THEN 0 ELSE NVL(ROUND((wge.fri / sls.fri)*100,2),0) END as Fri, CASE WHEN NVL(wge.sat,0) = 0 AND e.zone_no,e.ar_no,e.dply_seq,e.day_of_wk) g) sec_prty) pln_sls where (pln_sls.zone_no,pln_sls.ar_no,pln_sls.day_of_wk) NOT IN (select distinct e.zone_no,e.ar_no,e.day_of_wk from (select b.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,a.dept_no,d.dept_nm,d.dply_seq,c.perd_desc,c.wk_id,a.txn_dte,dy.day_of_wk, nvl(a.actl_sls,0) as actl_sls,nvl(a.actl_itm_cnt,0) as actl_itm_cnt,nvl(a.actl_cust_cnt,0) as actl_cust_cnt from ww_wlp.dly_sls a, loc b, wk c , dept d, day dy where a.loc_no=b.loc_no and a.div_no=b.div_no and b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and b.zone_no='Zone' and a.dept_no NOT IN (0,90,20) and a.txn_dte between c.wk_strt and c.wk_end and c.wk_id='Week' and a.dept_no=d.dept_no and a.div_no=d.div_no and d.dply_seq is not null and d.div_no='Division' and a.txn_dte=dy.day_dte and c.wk_id=dy.wk_id and a.actl_sls is NOT NULL and a.actl_sls!=0) e ) */) h group by h.zone_no,h.day_of_wk order by h.zone_no,h.day_of_wk) b group by b.zone_no order by b.zone_no) x ) z) sls on lc.zone_no=sls.zone_no order by lc.zone_no) sls where wge.zone_no=sls.zone_no order by wge.zone_no) den, (select wge.zone_no,CASE WHEN NVL(wge.wtd,0) = 0 AND NVL(sls.wtd,0) = 0 THEN 0 WHEN NVL(wge.wtd,0) = 0 THEN 0 WHEN NVL(sls.wtd,0) = 0 THEN 0 ELSE NVL(ROUND((wge.wtd / sls.wtd)*100,2),0) END as WTD from (select lc.zone_no,wge.PLN_WAGE_TOT_DPZ as WTD from (select distinct b.zone_no from ww_wlp.loc b where b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and b.zone_no='Zone' order by b.zone_no) lc LEFT OUTER JOIN (select e.zone_no,(sum(e.ta_pln_wage_amt) + sum(e.wage_adj_amt)) as PLN_WAGE_TOT_DPZ, (sum(e.ta_pln_hrs) + sum(e.wage_adj_hrs)) as PLN_HOURS_TOT_DPZ from (select b.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,b.loc_nm,a.dept_no,d.dept_nm,d.dply_seq,c.perd_desc,c.wk_id, nvl(a.ta_pln_wage_amt,0) as ta_pln_wage_amt,nvl(a.wage_adj_amt,0) as wage_adj_amt,nvl(a.ta_pln_hrs,0) as ta_pln_hrs,nvl(a.wage_adj_hrs,0) as wage_adj_hrs from ww_wlp.wky_dept_pln a, loc b, wk c , dept d where a.loc_no=b.loc_no and a.div_no=b.div_no and b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and b.zone_no='Zone' and a.dept_no NOT IN (20,27,28) and a.wk_id=c.wk_id and c.wk_id='Week' and a.dept_no=d.dept_no and a.div_no=d.div_no and d.dply_seq is not null and d.div_no='Division' order by b.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,d.dply_seq,c.perd_desc,c.wk_id) e group by e.zone_no order by e.zone_no) wge on wge.zone_no=lc.zone_no) wge, (select z.zone_no,y.Mon,y.Tue,y.Wed,y.Thu,y.Fri,y.Sat,y.Sun,y.wtd from (select distinct b.zone_no from ww_wlp.loc b where b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and b.zone_no='Zone' order by b.zone_no) z LEFT OUTER JOIN (select x.*,(x.Mon + x.Tue + x.Wed + x.Thu + x.Fri + x.Sat + x.Sun) as WTD from (select b.zone_no, NVL(sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,00,b.PLN_SLS_TOT_DPZ)),0) Mon, NVL(sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,01,b.PLN_SLS_TOT_DPZ)),0) Tue, NVL(sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,02,b.PLN_SLS_TOT_DPZ)),0) Wed, NVL(sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,03,b.PLN_SLS_TOT_DPZ)),0) Thu, NVL(sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,04,b.PLN_SLS_TOT_DPZ)),0) Fri, NVL(sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,05,b.PLN_SLS_TOT_DPZ)),0) Sat, NVL(sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,06,b.PLN_SLS_TOT_DPZ)),0) Sun from (select h.zone_no,SUBSTR(h.day_of_wk,0,2) as dte_of_wk,sum(h.PLN_SLS_DTS) as PLN_SLS_TOT_DPZ from (select * from (select e.zone_no,e.ar_no,e.loc_nm,e.dply_seq,e.dept_nm,e.day_of_wk,sum(e.mgr_pln_sls) as PLN_SLS_DTS,sum(e.mgr_pln_itm_cnt) as PLN_ITM_DTS from (select b.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,b.loc_nm,a.dept_no,d.dept_nm,d.dply_seq,c.perd_desc,c.wk_id,a.mgr_pln_sls_dte,dy.day_of_wk, nvl(a.mgr_pln_sls,0) as mgr_pln_sls,nvl(a.mgr_pln_itm_cnt,0) as mgr_pln_itm_cnt,nvl(a.mgr_pln_cust_cnt,0) as mgr_pln_cust_cnt from ww_wlp.mgr_dly_pln a, loc b, wk c , dept d, day dy where a.loc_no=b.loc_no and a.div_no=b.div_no and b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and b.zone_no='Zone' and a.dept_no NOT IN (0,90,20) and a.mgr_pln_sls_dte between c.wk_strt and c.wk_end and c.wk_id='Week' and a.dept_no=d.dept_no and a.div_no=d.div_no and d.dply_seq is not null and d.div_no='Division' and a.mgr_pln_sls_dte=dy.day_dte and c.wk_id=dy.wk_id order by b.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,d.dply_seq,c.perd_desc,c.wk_id,a.mgr_pln_sls_dte,dy.day_of_wk) e group by e.zone_no,e.ar_no,e.loc_nm,e.dply_seq,e.dept_nm,e.day_of_wk order by e.zone_no,e.ar_no,e.loc_nm,e.dply_seq,e.day_of_wk) f UNION select * from (select e.zone_no,e.ar_no,e.loc_nm,e.dply_seq,e.dept_nm,e.day_of_wk,sum(e.gnrt_sls) as GEN_SLS_DTS,sum(e.gnrt_itm) as GEN_ITM_DTS from (select b.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,b.loc_nm,a.dept_no,d.dept_nm,d.dply_seq,c.perd_desc,c.wk_id,a.fcst_dte,dy.day_of_wk, nvl(a.gnrt_sls,0) as gnrt_sls,nvl(a.gnrt_itm,0) as gnrt_itm,nvl(a.gnrt_cust,0) as gnrt_cust from ww_wlp.fcst a, loc b, wk c , dept d, day dy where a.loc_no=b.loc_no and a.div_no=b.div_no and b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and b.zone_no='Zone' and a.dept_no NOT IN (0,90,20) and a.fcst_dte between c.wk_strt and c.wk_end and c.wk_id='Week' and a.dept_no=d.dept_no and a.div_no=d.div_no and d.dply_seq is not null and d.div_no='Division' and (a.loc_no,a.dept_no,a.fcst_dte) NOT IN (select a.loc_no,a.dept_no,a.mgr_pln_sls_dte from mgr_dly_pln a, loc b, wk c where a.mgr_pln_sls_dte between c.wk_strt and c.wk_end and c.wk_id='Week' and a.loc_no=b.loc_no and a.div_no=b.div_no and b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and b.zone_no='Zone') and a.fcst_dte=dy.day_dte and c.wk_id=dy.wk_id order by b.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,d.dply_seq,c.perd_desc,c.wk_id,a.fcst_dte,dy.day_of_wk) e group by e.zone_no,e.ar_no,e.loc_nm,e.dply_seq,e.dept_nm,e.day_of_wk order by e.zone_no,e.ar_no,e.loc_nm,e.dply_seq,e.day_of_wk) g) h group by h.zone_no,h.day_of_wk order by h.zone_no,h.day_of_wk) b group by b.zone_no order by b.zone_no) x ) y on z.zone_no=y.zone_no order by z.zone_no) sls where wge.zone_no=sls.zone_no order by wge.zone_no) nyu where nyu.zone_no = den.zone_no

TCName.name: ORPercentageView
TCName.PlannedORPrcntColumn: select sms_hrs.ar_no,CASE WHEN NVL(sms_hrs.mon,0) = 0 AND NVL(pln_hrs.mon,0) = 0 THEN 0 WHEN NVL(sms_hrs.mon,0) = 0 THEN 0 WHEN NVL(pln_hrs.mon,0) = 0 THEN 0 ELSE NVL(ROUND((sms_hrs.mon / pln_hrs.mon)*100,1),0) END as Mon, CASE WHEN NVL(sms_hrs.tue,0) = 0 AND NVL(pln_hrs.tue,0) = 0 THEN 0 WHEN NVL(sms_hrs.tue,0) = 0 THEN 0 WHEN NVL(pln_hrs.tue,0) = 0 THEN 0 ELSE NVL(ROUND((sms_hrs.tue / pln_hrs.tue)*100,1),0) END as Tue, CASE WHEN NVL(sms_hrs.wed,0) = 0 AND NVL(pln_hrs.wed,0) = 0 THEN 0 WHEN NVL(sms_hrs.wed,0) = 0 THEN 0 WHEN NVL(pln_hrs.wed,0) = 0 THEN 0 ELSE NVL(ROUND((sms_hrs.wed / pln_hrs.wed)*100,1),0) END as Wed, CASE WHEN NVL(sms_hrs.thu,0) = 0 AND NVL(pln_hrs.thu,0) = 0 THEN 0 WHEN NVL(sms_hrs.thu,0) = 0 THEN 0 WHEN NVL(pln_hrs.thu,0) = 0 THEN 0 ELSE NVL(ROUND((sms_hrs.thu / pln_hrs.thu)*100,1),0) END as Thu, CASE WHEN NVL(sms_hrs.fri,0) = 0 AND NVL(pln_hrs.fri,0) = 0 THEN 0 WHEN NVL(sms_hrs.fri,0) = 0 THEN 0 WHEN NVL(pln_hrs.fri,0) = 0 THEN 0 ELSE NVL(ROUND((sms_hrs.fri / pln_hrs.fri)*100,1),0) END as Fri, CASE WHEN NVL(sms_hrs.sat,0) = 0 AND NVL(pln_hrs.sat,0) = 0 THEN 0 WHEN NVL(sms_hrs.sat,0) = 0 THEN 0 WHEN NVL(pln_hrs.sat,0) = 0 THEN 0 ELSE NVL(ROUND((sms_hrs.sat / pln_hrs.sat)*100,1),0) END as Sat, CASE WHEN NVL(sms_hrs.sun,0) = 0 AND NVL(pln_hrs.sun,0) = 0 THEN 0 WHEN NVL(sms_hrs.sun,0) = 0 THEN 0 WHEN NVL(pln_hrs.sun,0) = 0 THEN 0 ELSE NVL(ROUND((sms_hrs.sun / pln_hrs.sun)*100,1),0) END as Sun from (select lc.ar_no,sms.mon,sms.tue,sms.wed,sms.thu,sms.fri,sms.sat,sms.sun from (select distinct b.ar_no from ww_wlp.loc b where b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and b.zone_no='Zone' order by b.ar_no) lc LEFT OUTER JOIN (select z.ar_no,z.mon,z.tue,z.wed,z.thu,z.fri,z.sat,z.sun from (select x.*,(x.Mon + x.Tue + x.Wed + x.Thu + x.Fri + x.Sat + x.Sun) as WTD from (select b.ar_no, sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,00,b.PLN_SMS_DPZ)) Mon, sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,01,b.PLN_SMS_DPZ)) Tue, sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,02,b.PLN_SMS_DPZ)) Wed, sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,03,b.PLN_SMS_DPZ)) Thu, sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,04,b.PLN_SMS_DPZ)) Fri, sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,05,b.PLN_SMS_DPZ)) Sat, sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,06,b.PLN_SMS_DPZ)) Sun from (select h.ar_no,SUBSTR(h.day_of_wk,0,2) as dte_of_wk,sum(h.PLN_SMS_DTS) as PLN_SMS_DPZ from (select e.ar_no,e.loc_nm,e.dply_seq,e.dept_nm,e.day_of_wk,(sum(e.fix_hrs) + sum(e.vol_hrs)) as PLN_SMS_DTS from (select b.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,b.loc_nm,d.dept_no,d.dept_nm,d.dply_seq,c.perd_desc,c.wk_id,a.day_of_wk,dy.day_dte, nvl(a.fix_hrs,0) as fix_hrs,nvl(a.vol_hrs,0) as vol_hrs from ww_wlp.lbr_std a, loc b, wk c , dept d, task tsk, day dy where a.loc_no=b.loc_no and b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and b.zone_no='Zone' and tsk.dept_no NOT IN (20,27,28) and a.wk_id=c.wk_id and c.wk_id='Week' and tsk.dept_no=d.dept_no and d.dply_seq is not null and d.div_no='Division' and a.task_no=tsk.task_no and a.wk_id=dy.wk_id and a.day_of_wk=dy.day_of_wk and c.wk_id=dy.wk_id order by b.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,d.dply_seq,c.perd_desc,c.wk_id,a.day_of_wk,dy.day_dte) e group by e.ar_no,e.loc_nm,e.dply_seq,e.dept_nm,e.day_of_wk order by e.ar_no,e.dply_seq,e.day_of_wk) h group by h.ar_no,h.day_of_wk order by h.ar_no,h.day_of_wk) b group by b.ar_no order by b.ar_no) x ) z ) sms on sms.ar_no=lc.ar_no) sms_hrs, (select lc.ar_no,wge.mon,wge.tue,wge.wed,wge.thu,wge.fri,wge.sat,wge.sun from (select distinct b.ar_no from ww_wlp.loc b where b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and b.zone_no='Zone' order by b.ar_no) lc LEFT OUTER JOIN (select z.ar_no,z.mon,z.tue,z.wed,z.thu,z.fri,z.sat,z.sun from (select x.*,(x.Mon + x.Tue + x.Wed + x.Thu + x.Fri + x.Sat + x.Sun) as WTD from (select b.ar_no, sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,00,b.PLN_HRS_DPZ)) Mon, sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,01,b.PLN_HRS_DPZ)) Tue, sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,02,b.PLN_HRS_DPZ)) Wed, sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,03,b.PLN_HRS_DPZ)) Thu, sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,04,b.PLN_HRS_DPZ)) Fri, sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,05,b.PLN_HRS_DPZ)) Sat, sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,06,b.PLN_HRS_DPZ)) Sun from (select h.ar_no,SUBSTR(h.day_of_wk,0,2) as dte_of_wk,sum(h.PLN_HRS_DTS) as PLN_HRS_DPZ from (select e.ar_no,e.loc_nm,e.dply_seq,e.dept_nm,e.day_of_wk,sum(e.ta_pln_wage_amt) as PLN_WGE_DTS,sum(e.ta_pln_hrs) as PLN_HRS_DTS from (select b.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,b.loc_nm,a.dept_no,d.dept_nm,d.dply_seq,c.perd_desc,c.wk_id,a.dly_wage_dte,dy.day_of_wk, a.ta_pln_wage_amt as ta_pln_wage_amt,a.ta_pln_hrs as ta_pln_hrs from ww_wlp.krn_schd a, loc b, wk c , dept d, day dy where a.loc_no=b.loc_no and a.div_no=b.div_no and b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and b.zone_no='Zone' and a.dept_no NOT IN (20,27,28) and a.dly_wage_dte between c.wk_strt and c.wk_end /*and trunc(sysdate-1)*/ and c.wk_id='Week' and a.dept_no=d.dept_no and a.div_no=d.div_no and d.dply_seq is not null and d.div_no='Division' and a.dly_wage_dte=dy.day_dte and c.wk_id=dy.wk_id order by b.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,d.dply_seq,c.perd_desc,c.wk_id,a.dly_wage_dte,dy.day_of_wk) e group by e.ar_no,e.loc_nm,e.dply_seq,e.dept_nm,e.day_of_wk order by e.ar_no,e.loc_nm,e.dply_seq,e.day_of_wk) h group by h.ar_no,h.day_of_wk order by h.ar_no,h.day_of_wk) b group by b.ar_no order by b.ar_no) x ) z) wge on wge.ar_no=lc.ar_no) pln_hrs where sms_hrs.ar_no=pln_hrs.ar_no order by sms_hrs.ar_no
TCName.PlannedORPrcntTotal: select sms_hrs.zone_no,CASE WHEN NVL(sms_hrs.mon,0) = 0 AND NVL(pln_hrs.mon,0) = 0 THEN 0 WHEN NVL(sms_hrs.mon,0) = 0 THEN 0 WHEN NVL(pln_hrs.mon,0) = 0 THEN 0 ELSE NVL(ROUND((sms_hrs.mon / pln_hrs.mon)*100,1),0) END as Mon, CASE WHEN NVL(sms_hrs.tue,0) = 0 AND NVL(pln_hrs.tue,0) = 0 THEN 0 WHEN NVL(sms_hrs.tue,0) = 0 THEN 0 WHEN NVL(pln_hrs.tue,0) = 0 THEN 0
