THEN 0 ELSE NVL(ROUND((sms_hrs.thu / pln_hrs.thu)*100,1),0) END as Thu, CASE WHEN NVL(sms_hrs.fri,0) = 0 AND NVL(pln_hrs.fri,0) = 0 THEN 0 WHEN NVL(sms_hrs.fri,0) = 0 THEN 0 WHEN NVL(pln_hrs.fri,0) = 0 THEN 0 ELSE NVL(ROUND((sms_hrs.fri / pln_hrs.fri)*100,1),0) END as Fri, CASE WHEN NVL(sms_hrs.sat,0) = 0 AND NVL(pln_hrs.sat,0) = 0 THEN 0 WHEN NVL(sms_hrs.sat,0) = 0 THEN 0 WHEN NVL(pln_hrs.sat,0) = 0 THEN 0 ELSE NVL(ROUND((sms_hrs.sat / pln_hrs.sat)*100,1),0) END as Sat, CASE WHEN NVL(sms_hrs.sun,0) = 0 AND NVL(pln_hrs.sun,0) = 0 THEN 0 WHEN NVL(sms_hrs.sun,0) = 0 THEN 0 WHEN NVL(pln_hrs.sun,0) = 0 THEN 0 ELSE NVL(ROUND((sms_hrs.sun / pln_hrs.sun)*100,1),0) END as Sun from (select lc.zone_no,sms.mon,sms.tue,sms.wed,sms.thu,sms.fri,sms.sat,sms.sun from (select distinct b.zone_no from ww_wlp.loc b where b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and b.zone_no='Zone' order by b.zone_no) lc LEFT OUTER JOIN (select z.zone_no,z.mon,z.tue,z.wed,z.thu,z.fri,z.sat,z.sun from (select x.*,(x.Mon + x.Tue + x.Wed + x.Thu + x.Fri + x.Sat + x.Sun) as WTD from (select b.zone_no, NVL(sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,00,b.PLN_SMS_TOT_DPZ)),0) Mon, NVL(sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,01,b.PLN_SMS_TOT_DPZ)),0) Tue, NVL(sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,02,b.PLN_SMS_TOT_DPZ)),0) Wed, NVL(sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,03,b.PLN_SMS_TOT_DPZ)),0) Thu, NVL(sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,04,b.PLN_SMS_TOT_DPZ)),0) Fri, NVL(sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,05,b.PLN_SMS_TOT_DPZ)),0) Sat, NVL(sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,06,b.PLN_SMS_TOT_DPZ)),0) Sun from (select h.zone_no,SUBSTR(h.day_of_wk,0,2) as dte_of_wk,sum(h.PLN_SMS_DTS) as PLN_SMS_TOT_DPZ from (select e.zone_no,e.ar_no,e.loc_nm,e.dply_seq,e.dept_nm,e.day_of_wk,(sum(e.fix_hrs) + sum(e.vol_hrs)) as PLN_SMS_DTS from (select b.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,b.loc_nm,d.dept_no,d.dept_nm,d.dply_seq,c.perd_desc,c.wk_id,a.day_of_wk,dy.day_dte, nvl(a.fix_hrs,0) as fix_hrs,nvl(a.vol_hrs,0) as vol_hrs from ww_wlp.lbr_std a, loc b, wk c , dept d, task tsk, day dy where a.loc_no=b.loc_no and b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and b.zone_no='Zone' and tsk.dept_no NOT IN (20,27,28) and a.wk_id=c.wk_id and c.wk_id='Week' and tsk.dept_no=d.dept_no and d.dply_seq is not null and d.div_no='Division' and a.task_no=tsk.task_no and a.wk_id=dy.wk_id and a.day_of_wk=dy.day_of_wk and c.wk_id=dy.wk_id order by b.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,d.dply_seq,c.perd_desc,c.wk_id,a.day_of_wk,dy.day_dte) e group by e.zone_no,e.ar_no,e.loc_nm,e.dply_seq,e.dept_nm,e.day_of_wk order by e.zone_no,e.ar_no,e.dply_seq,e.day_of_wk) h group by h.zone_no,h.day_of_wk order by h.zone_no,h.day_of_wk) b group by b.zone_no order by b.zone_no) x ) z ) sms on sms.zone_no=lc.zone_no) sms_hrs, (select lc.zone_no,wge.mon,wge.tue,wge.wed,wge.thu,wge.fri,wge.sat,wge.sun from (select distinct b.zone_no from ww_wlp.loc b where b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and b.zone_no='Zone' order by b.zone_no) lc LEFT OUTER JOIN (select z.zone_no,z.mon,z.tue,z.wed,z.thu,z.fri,z.sat,z.sun from (select x.*,(x.Mon + x.Tue + x.Wed + x.Thu + x.Fri + x.Sat + x.Sun) as WTD from (select b.zone_no, NVL(sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,00,b.PLN_HRS_TOT_DPZ)),0) Mon, NVL(sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,01,b.PLN_HRS_TOT_DPZ)),0) Tue, NVL(sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,02,b.PLN_HRS_TOT_DPZ)),0) Wed, NVL(sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,03,b.PLN_HRS_TOT_DPZ)),0) Thu, NVL(sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,04,b.PLN_HRS_TOT_DPZ)),0) Fri, NVL(sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,05,b.PLN_HRS_TOT_DPZ)),0) Sat, NVL(sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,06,b.PLN_HRS_TOT_DPZ)),0) Sun from (select h.zone_no,SUBSTR(h.day_of_wk,0,2) as dte_of_wk,sum(h.PLN_HRS_DTS) as PLN_HRS_TOT_DPZ from (select e.zone_no,e.ar_no,e.loc_nm,e.dply_seq,e.dept_nm,e.day_of_wk,sum(e.ta_pln_wage_amt) as PLN_WGE_DTS,sum(e.ta_pln_hrs) as PLN_HRS_DTS from (select b.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,b.loc_nm,a.dept_no,d.dept_nm,d.dply_seq,c.perd_desc,c.wk_id,a.dly_wage_dte,dy.day_of_wk, a.ta_pln_wage_amt as ta_pln_wage_amt,a.ta_pln_hrs as ta_pln_hrs from ww_wlp.krn_schd a, loc b, wk c , dept d, day dy where a.loc_no=b.loc_no and a.div_no=b.div_no and b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and b.zone_no='Zone' and a.dept_no NOT IN (20,27,28) and a.dly_wage_dte between c.wk_strt and c.wk_end /*and trunc(sysdate-1)*/ and c.wk_id='Week' and a.dept_no=d.dept_no and a.div_no=d.div_no and d.dply_seq is not null and d.div_no='Division' and a.dly_wage_dte=dy.day_dte and c.wk_id=dy.wk_id order by b.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,d.dply_seq,c.perd_desc,c.wk_id,a.dly_wage_dte,dy.day_of_wk) e group by e.zone_no,e.ar_no,e.loc_nm,e.dply_seq,e.dept_nm,e.day_of_wk order by e.zone_no,e.ar_no,e.loc_nm,e.dply_seq,e.day_of_wk) h group by h.zone_no,h.day_of_wk order by h.zone_no,h.day_of_wk) b group by b.zone_no order by b.zone_no) x ) z) wge on wge.zone_no=lc.zone_no) pln_hrs where sms_hrs.zone_no=pln_hrs.zone_no order by sms_hrs.zone_no
TCName.PlannedORPrcntWkToDt: select sms_hrs.ar_no,CASE WHEN NVL(sms_hrs.wtd,0) = 0 AND NVL(pln_hrs.wtd,0) = 0 THEN 0 WHEN NVL(sms_hrs.wtd,0) = 0 THEN 0 WHEN NVL(pln_hrs.wtd,0) = 0 THEN 0 ELSE NVL(ROUND((sms_hrs.wtd / pln_hrs.wtd)*100,1),0) END as WTD from (select lc.ar_no,sms.wtd from (select distinct b.ar_no from ww_wlp.loc b where b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and b.zone_no='Zone' order by b.ar_no) lc LEFT OUTER JOIN (select z.ar_no,z.wtd from (select x.*,(x.Mon + x.Tue + x.Wed + x.Thu + x.Fri + x.Sat + x.Sun) as WTD from (select b.ar_no, sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,00,b.PLN_SMS_DPZ)) Mon, sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,01,b.PLN_SMS_DPZ)) Tue, sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,02,b.PLN_SMS_DPZ)) Wed, sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,03,b.PLN_SMS_DPZ)) Thu, sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,04,b.PLN_SMS_DPZ)) Fri, sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,05,b.PLN_SMS_DPZ)) Sat, sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,06,b.PLN_SMS_DPZ)) Sun from (select h.ar_no,SUBSTR(h.day_of_wk,0,2) as dte_of_wk,sum(h.PLN_SMS_DTS) as PLN_SMS_DPZ from (select e.ar_no,e.loc_nm,e.dply_seq,e.dept_nm,e.day_of_wk,(sum(e.fix_hrs) + sum(e.vol_hrs)) as PLN_SMS_DTS from (select b.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,b.loc_nm,d.dept_no,d.dept_nm,d.dply_seq,c.perd_desc,c.wk_id,a.day_of_wk,dy.day_dte, nvl(a.fix_hrs,0) as fix_hrs,nvl(a.vol_hrs,0) as vol_hrs from ww_wlp.lbr_std a, loc b, wk c , dept d, task tsk, day dy where a.loc_no=b.loc_no and b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and b.zone_no='Zone' and tsk.dept_no NOT IN (20,27,28) and a.wk_id=c.wk_id and c.wk_id='Week' and dy.day_dte between c.wk_strt and c.wk_end and tsk.dept_no=d.dept_no and d.dply_seq is not null and d.div_no='Division' and a.task_no=tsk.task_no and a.wk_id=dy.wk_id and a.day_of_wk=dy.day_of_wk and c.wk_id=dy.wk_id order by b.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,d.dply_seq,c.perd_desc,c.wk_id,a.day_of_wk,dy.day_dte) e group by e.ar_no,e.loc_nm,e.dply_seq,e.dept_nm,e.day_of_wk order by e.ar_no,e.dply_seq,e.day_of_wk) h group by h.ar_no,h.day_of_wk order by h.ar_no,h.day_of_wk) b group by b.ar_no order by b.ar_no) x ) z ) sms on sms.ar_no=lc.ar_no) sms_hrs, (select lc.ar_no,sum(wge.PLN_HOURS_DPZ) as WTD from (select distinct b.ar_no from ww_wlp.loc b where b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and b.zone_no='Zone' order by b.ar_no) lc LEFT OUTER JOIN (select e.ar_no,e.loc_no,e.loc_nm,e.dply_seq,e.dept_nm,(sum(e.ta_pln_wage_amt) + sum(e.wage_adj_amt)) as PLN_WAGE_DPZ, (sum(e.ta_pln_hrs) + sum(e.wage_adj_hrs)) as PLN_HOURS_DPZ from (select b.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,b.loc_nm,a.dept_no,d.dept_nm,d.dply_seq,c.perd_desc,c.wk_id, a.ta_pln_wage_amt as ta_pln_wage_amt,a.wage_adj_amt as wage_adj_amt,a.ta_pln_hrs as ta_pln_hrs,a.wage_adj_hrs as wage_adj_hrs from ww_wlp.wky_dept_pln a, loc b, wk c , dept d where a.loc_no=b.loc_no and a.div_no=b.div_no and b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and b.zone_no='Zone' and a.dept_no NOT IN (20,85) and a.wk_id=c.wk_id and c.wk_id='Week' and a.dept_no=d.dept_no and a.div_no=d.div_no and d.dply_seq is not null and d.div_no='Division' order by b.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,d.dply_seq,c.perd_desc,c.wk_id) e group by e.ar_no,e.loc_no,e.loc_nm,e.dply_seq,e.dept_nm order by e.ar_no,e.loc_no,e.loc_nm,e.dply_seq) wge on wge.ar_no=lc.ar_no group by lc.ar_no order by lc.ar_no) pln_hrs where sms_hrs.ar_no=pln_hrs.ar_no order by pln_hrs.ar_no
TCName.PlannedORPrcntWkToDtTotal: select sms_hrs.zone_no,CASE WHEN NVL(sms_hrs.wtd,0) = 0 AND NVL(pln_hrs.wtd,0) = 0 THEN 0 WHEN NVL(sms_hrs.wtd,0) = 0 THEN 0 WHEN NVL(pln_hrs.wtd,0) = 0 THEN 0 ELSE NVL(ROUND((sms_hrs.wtd / pln_hrs.wtd)*100,1),0) END as WTD from (select lc.zone_no,sms.wtd from (select distinct b.zone_no from ww_wlp.loc b where b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and b.zone_no='Zone' order by b.zone_no) lc LEFT OUTER JOIN (select z.zone_no,z.wtd from (select x.*,(x.Mon + x.Tue + x.Wed + x.Thu + x.Fri + x.Sat + x.Sun) as WTD from (select b.zone_no, NVL(sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,00,b.PLN_SMS_TOT_DPZ)),0) Mon, NVL(sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,01,b.PLN_SMS_TOT_DPZ)),0) Tue, NVL(sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,02,b.PLN_SMS_TOT_DPZ)),0) Wed, NVL(sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,03,b.PLN_SMS_TOT_DPZ)),0) Thu, NVL(sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,04,b.PLN_SMS_TOT_DPZ)),0) Fri, NVL(sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,05,b.PLN_SMS_TOT_DPZ)),0) Sat, NVL(sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,06,b.PLN_SMS_TOT_DPZ)),0) Sun from (select h.zone_no,SUBSTR(h.day_of_wk,0,2) as dte_of_wk,sum(h.PLN_SMS_DTS) as PLN_SMS_TOT_DPZ from (select e.zone_no,e.ar_no,e.loc_nm,e.dply_seq,e.dept_nm,e.day_of_wk,(sum(e.fix_hrs) + sum(e.vol_hrs)) as PLN_SMS_DTS from (select b.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,b.loc_nm,d.dept_no,d.dept_nm,d.dply_seq,c.perd_desc,c.wk_id,a.day_of_wk,dy.day_dte, nvl(a.fix_hrs,0) as fix_hrs,nvl(a.vol_hrs,0) as vol_hrs from ww_wlp.lbr_std a, loc b, wk c , dept d, task tsk, day dy where a.loc_no=b.loc_no and b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and b.zone_no='Zone' and tsk.dept_no NOT IN (20,27,28) and a.wk_id=c.wk_id and c.wk_id='Week' and dy.day_dte between c.wk_strt and c.wk_end and tsk.dept_no=d.dept_no and d.dply_seq is not null and d.div_no='Division' and a.task_no=tsk.task_no and a.wk_id=dy.wk_id and a.day_of_wk=dy.day_of_wk and c.wk_id=dy.wk_id order by b.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,d.dply_seq,c.perd_desc,c.wk_id,a.day_of_wk,dy.day_dte) e group by e.zone_no,e.ar_no,e.loc_nm,e.dply_seq,e.dept_nm,e.day_of_wk order by e.zone_no,e.ar_no,e.dply_seq,e.day_of_wk) h group by h.zone_no,h.day_of_wk order by h.zone_no,h.day_of_wk) b group by b.zone_no order by b.zone_no) x ) z ) sms on sms.zone_no=lc.zone_no) sms_hrs, (select lc.zone_no,sum(wge.PLN_HOURS_TOT_DPZ) as WTD from (select distinct b.zone_no from ww_wlp.loc b where b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and b.zone_no='Zone' order by b.zone_no) lc LEFT OUTER JOIN (select e.zone_no,e.ar_no,e.loc_no,e.loc_nm,e.dply_seq,e.dept_nm,(sum(e.ta_pln_wage_amt) + sum(e.wage_adj_amt)) as PLN_WAGE_TOT_DPZ, (sum(e.ta_pln_hrs) + sum(e.wage_adj_hrs)) as PLN_HOURS_TOT_DPZ from (select b.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,b.loc_nm,a.dept_no,d.dept_nm,d.dply_seq,c.perd_desc,c.wk_id, a.ta_pln_wage_amt as ta_pln_wage_amt,a.wage_adj_amt as wage_adj_amt,a.ta_pln_hrs as ta_pln_hrs,a.wage_adj_hrs as wage_adj_hrs from ww_wlp.wky_dept_pln a, loc b, wk c , dept d where a.loc_no=b.loc_no and a.div_no=b.div_no and b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and b.zone_no='Zone' and a.dept_no NOT IN (20,27,28) and a.wk_id=c.wk_id and c.wk_id='Week' and a.dept_no=d.dept_no and a.div_no=d.div_no and d.dply_seq is not null and d.div_no='Division' order by b.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,d.dply_seq,c.perd_desc,c.wk_id) e group by e.zone_no,e.ar_no,e.loc_no,e.loc_nm,e.dply_seq,e.dept_nm order by e.zone_no,e.ar_no,e.loc_no,e.loc_nm,e.dply_seq) wge on wge.zone_no=lc.zone_no group by lc.zone_no order by lc.zone_no) pln_hrs where sms_hrs.zone_no=pln_hrs.zone_no
TCName.ActualORPrcntColumn: select actl_sms.ar_no, case when actl_sms.mon=0 and actl_hrs.mon=0 then 0 when actl_sms.mon=0 then 0 when actl_hrs.mon=0 then 0 else NVL(ROUND((actl_sms.mon / actl_hrs.mon)*100,1),0) end as Mon, case when actl_sms.tue=0 and actl_hrs.tue=0 then 0 when actl_sms.tue=0 then 0 when actl_hrs.tue=0 then 0 else NVL(ROUND((actl_sms.tue / actl_hrs.tue)*100,1),0) end as Tue, case when actl_sms.wed=0 and actl_hrs.wed=0 then 0 when actl_sms.wed=0 then 0 when actl_hrs.wed=0 then 0 else NVL(ROUND((actl_sms.wed / actl_hrs.wed)*100,1),0) end as Wed, case when actl_sms.thu=0 and actl_hrs.thu=0 then 0 when actl_sms.thu=0 then 0 when actl_hrs.thu=0 then 0 else NVL(ROUND((actl_sms.Thu / actl_hrs.Thu)*100,1),0) end as Thu, case when actl_sms.fri=0 and actl_hrs.fri=0 then 0 when actl_sms.fri=0 then 0 when actl_hrs.fri=0 then 0 else NVL(ROUND((actl_sms.fri / actl_hrs.fri)*100,1),0) end as Fri, case when actl_sms.sat=0 and actl_hrs.sat=0 then 0 when actl_sms.sat=0 then 0 when actl_hrs.sat=0 then 0 else NVL(ROUND((actl_sms.sat / actl_hrs.sat)*100,1),0) end as Sat, case when actl_sms.sun=0 and actl_hrs.sun=0 then 0 when actl_sms.sun=0 then 0 when actl_hrs.sun=0 then 0 else NVL(ROUND((actl_sms.sun / actl_hrs.sun)*100,1),0) end as Sun from (select e.ar_no,(sms_src.Monday) as Mon,(sms_src.Tuesday) as Tue,(sms_src.Wednesday) as Wed,(sms_src.Thursday) as Thu,(sms_src.Friday) as Fri,(sms_src.Saturday) as Sat,(sms_src.Sunday) as Sun from (select div_no,rgn_no,zone_no,ar_no from ww_wlp.loc where div_no='Division' and rgn_no='Region' and zone_no='Zone' and WLP_LIVE_IND IN ('Y','N') group by div_no,rgn_no,zone_no,ar_no order by div_no,rgn_no,zone_no,ar_no ) e LEFT OUTER JOIN (select ar_no , Sum(decode(day_of_wk, 0 , plan_sms_hrs )) Monday, sum(decode(day_of_wk, 1 , plan_sms_hrs )) Tuesday, sum(decode(day_of_wk, 2 , plan_sms_hrs )) Wednesday, sum(decode(day_of_wk, 3 , plan_sms_hrs )) Thursday, sum(decode(day_of_wk, 4 , plan_sms_hrs )) Friday, sum(decode(day_of_wk, 5 , plan_sms_hrs )) Saturday, sum(decode(day_of_wk, 6 , plan_sms_hrs )) Sunday from (select distinct src.*, (CASE when task_nm<>'Major Fill' and dept_no in (5,10,15) Then ((((src.var_per_mtrc_type_cd * NVL(src.itm_cnt,0))/1000))+src.fix_hrs) When task_nm='Major Fill' Then ((((((src.var_per_mtrc_type_cd * NVL(src.itm_cnt,0))/1000)) * src.fix_hrs_pct)/100) + src.fix_hrs) when task_nm<>'Major Fill' and dept_no not in (5,10,15) Then ((((src.var_per_mtrc_type_cd * NVL(src.itm_cnt,0))/1000))+src.fix_hrs) END) as plan_sms_hrs from (select LL.task_no,LL.task_nm,LL.loc_no,LL.div_no,LL.rgn_no,LL.zone_no,LL.ar_no,LL.dept_no,LL.dept_nm,LL.wk_id,LL.day_of_wk,LL.FIX_HRS,LL.VAR_PER_MTRC_TYPE_CD,LL.VOL_HRS,LL.FIX_HRS_PCT , LL.txn_dte, (case when LL.task_nm = 'Major Fill' then (select sum(actl_itm_cnt) from pln_actl_vw where loc_no=LL.loc_no and dept_no in (5,10,15) and txn_dte between (select wk_strt from wk where fin_yr='Year' and fin_wk_no='FinWk') and (select wk_end from wk where fin_yr='Year' and fin_wk_no='FinWk') ) When LL.task_nm <> 'Major Fill' and LL.dept_no in (5,10,15) then (select sum(actl_itm_cnt) from dly_sls where loc_no=LL.loc_no and dept_no in (5,10,15) and txn_dte = LL.txn_dte) When LL.task_nm <> 'Major Fill' and LL.dept_no not in (5,10,15) then (select actl_itm_cnt from dly_sls where loc_no=LL.loc_no and dept_no=LL.dept_no and txn_dte = LL.txn_dte) end ) as itm_cnt from (select Y.task_no,Y.task_nm,Y.loc_no,Y.div_no,Y.rgn_no,Y.zone_no,Y.ar_no,Y.dept_no,Y.dept_nm,Y.wk_id,Y.day_of_wk,Y.FIX_HRS,Y.VAR_PER_MTRC_TYPE_CD,Y.VOL_HRS,Y.FIX_HRS_PCT , ds.actl_itm_cnt as actl_itm_cnt,ds.txn_dte as txn_dte from (select distinct A.task_no,tk.task_nm,A.loc_no,lc.div_no,lc.rgn_no,lc.zone_no,lc.ar_no, dt.dept_nm,A.wk_id,A.day_of_wk,A.FIX_HRS,A.VAR_PER_MTRC_TYPE_CD,A.VOL_HRS,sg.FIX_HRS_PCT , w.wk_strt , w.wk_end ,tk.dept_no, decode(A.day_of_wk,0,w.wk_strt,1,w.wk_strt+1,2,w.wk_strt+2,3,w.wk_strt+3,4,w.wk_strt+4,5,w.wk_strt+5,6,w.WK_END) as X from ww_Wlp.lbr_Std A inner join ww_wlp.wk w on A.wk_id=w.wk_id inner join ww_wlp.task tk on A.task_No=tk.task_No inner join ww_wlp.loc lc on lc.loc_no=a.loc_no and lc.div_no='Division' left outer join ww_Wlp.fix_hrs_wky_sprd_gbl sg on A.loc_No=sg.loc_no and A.task_No=sg.task_no and A.day_of_Wk=sg.day_of_wk inner join dept dt on dt.dept_no=tk.dept_no and dt.div_no = 3 where w.fin_yr='Year' and w.fin_wk_no='FinWk' and A.loc_no in (select loc_no from loc where div_no='Division' and rgn_no='Region' and zone_no='Zone') --and tk.dept_no=25 and A.day_of_wk in (0,1,2,3,4,5,6) --and a.task_no='600062' order by A.task_no,tk.dept_no,dt.dept_nm ) Y left outer join ww_wlp.dly_sls ds on Y.loc_No=ds.loc_no and Y.dept_no=ds.dept_no and ds.txn_dte = X order by Y.task_no,Y.dept_no, y.X ) LL group by LL.task_no,LL.task_nm,LL.loc_no,LL.div_no,LL.rgn_no,LL.zone_no,LL.ar_no,LL.dept_no,LL.dept_nm,LL.wk_id,LL.day_of_wk,LL.FIX_HRS, LL.VAR_PER_MTRC_TYPE_CD,LL.VOL_HRS,LL.FIX_HRS_PCT , LL.txn_dte order by ll.day_of_wk) src where dept_no not in (20) order by src.ar_no,src.dept_no,src.task_no ) sto group by ar_no) sms_src on sms_src.ar_no=e.ar_no order by sms_src.ar_no)actl_sms LEFT OUTER JOIN (select lc.ar_no,NVL(wge.mon,0) as Mon,NVL(wge.tue,0) as Tue,NVL(wge.wed,0) as Wed,NVL(wge.thu,0) as Thu, NVL(wge.fri,0) as Fri,NVL(wge.sat,0) as Sat,NVL(wge.sun,0) as Sun from (select distinct b.ar_no from TCName.ActualORPrcntTotal: select 'TOTAL' as Total, case when actl_sms.mon=0 and actl_hrs.mon=0 then 0 when actl_sms.mon=0 then 0 when actl_hrs.mon=0 then 0 else NVL(ROUND((actl_sms.mon / actl_hrs.mon)*100,1),0) end as Mon, case when actl_sms.tue=0 and actl_hrs.tue=0 then 0 when actl_sms.tue=0 then 0 when actl_hrs.tue=0 then 0 else NVL(ROUND((actl_sms.tue / actl_hrs.tue)*100,1),0) end as Tue, case when actl_sms.wed=0 and actl_hrs.wed=0 then 0 when actl_sms.wed=0 then 0 when actl_hrs.wed=0 then 0 else NVL(ROUND((actl_sms.wed / actl_hrs.wed)*100,1),0) end as Wed, case when actl_sms.thu=0 and actl_hrs.thu=0 then 0 when actl_sms.thu=0 then 0 when actl_hrs.thu=0 then 0 else NVL(ROUND((actl_sms.Thu / actl_hrs.Thu)*100,1),0) end as Thu, case when actl_sms.fri=0 and actl_hrs.fri=0 then 0 when actl_sms.fri=0 then 0 when actl_hrs.fri=0 then 0 else NVL(ROUND((actl_sms.fri / actl_hrs.fri)*100,1),0) end as Fri, case when actl_sms.sat=0 and actl_hrs.sat=0 then 0 when actl_sms.sat=0 then 0 when actl_hrs.sat=0 then 0 else NVL(ROUND((actl_sms.sat / actl_hrs.sat)*100,1),0) end as Sat, case when actl_sms.sun=0 and actl_hrs.sun=0 then 0 when actl_sms.sun=0 then 0 when actl_hrs.sun=0 then 0 else NVL(ROUND((actl_sms.sun / actl_hrs.sun)*100,1),0) end as Sun from (select 'TOTAL' as Total,sum(Monday)as MON,sum(Tuesday) as TUE,sum(Wednesday)as WED,sum(Thursday)as THU,sum(Friday) as FRI,sum(Saturday) as SAT,sum(Sunday) as SUN from (select e.ar_no,sms_src.Monday,sms_src.Tuesday,sms_src.Wednesday,sms_src.Thursday,sms_src.Friday,sms_src.Saturday,sms_src.Sunday from (select div_no,rgn_no,zone_no,ar_no from ww_wlp.loc where div_no='Division' and rgn_no='Region' and zone_no='Zone' and WLP_LIVE_IND IN ('Y','N') group by div_no,rgn_no,zone_no,ar_no order by div_no,rgn_no,zone_no,ar_no ) e LEFT OUTER JOIN (select ar_no , Sum(decode(day_of_wk, 0 , plan_sms_hrs )) Monday, sum(decode(day_of_wk, 1 , plan_sms_hrs )) Tuesday, sum(decode(day_of_wk, 2 , plan_sms_hrs )) Wednesday, sum(decode(day_of_wk, 3 , plan_sms_hrs )) Thursday, sum(decode(day_of_wk, 4 , plan_sms_hrs )) Friday, sum(decode(day_of_wk, 5 , plan_sms_hrs )) Saturday, sum(decode(day_of_wk, 6 , plan_sms_hrs )) Sunday from (select distinct src.*, (CASE when task_nm<>'Major Fill' and dept_no in (5,10,15) Then ((((src.var_per_mtrc_type_cd * NVL(src.itm_cnt,0))/1000))+src.fix_hrs) When task_nm='Major Fill' Then ((((((src.var_per_mtrc_type_cd * NVL(src.itm_cnt,0))/1000)) * src.fix_hrs_pct)/100) + src.fix_hrs) when task_nm<>'Major Fill' and dept_no not in (5,10,15) Then ((((src.var_per_mtrc_type_cd * NVL(src.itm_cnt,0))/1000))+src.fix_hrs) END) as plan_sms_hrs from (select LL.task_no,LL.task_nm,LL.loc_no,LL.div_no,LL.rgn_no,LL.zone_no,LL.ar_no,LL.dept_no,LL.dept_nm,LL.wk_id,LL.day_of_wk,LL.FIX_HRS,LL.VAR_PER_MTRC_TYPE_CD,LL.VOL_HRS,LL.FIX_HRS_PCT , LL.txn_dte, (case fin_wk_no='FinWk') and (select wk_end from wk where fin_yr='Year' and fin_wk_no='FinWk') ) When LL.task_nm <> 'Major Fill' and LL.dept_no in (5,10,15) then (select sum(actl_itm_cnt) from dly_sls where when LL.task_nm = 'Major Fill' then (select sum(actl_itm_cnt) from pln_actl_vw where loc_no=LL.loc_no and dept_no in (5,10,15) and txn_dte between (select wk_strt from wk where fin_yr='Year' and loc_no=LL.loc_no and dept_no in (5,10,15) and txn_dte = LL.txn_dte) When LL.task_nm <> 'Major Fill' and LL.dept_no not in (5,10,15) then (select actl_itm_cnt from dly_sls where loc_no=LL.loc_no and dept_no=LL.dept_no and txn_dte = LL.txn_dte) end ) as itm_cnt from (select Y.task_no,Y.task_nm,Y.loc_no,Y.div_no,Y.rgn_no,Y.zone_no,Y.ar_no,Y.dept_no,Y.dept_nm,Y.wk_id,Y.day_of_wk,Y.FIX_HRS,Y.VAR_PER_MTRC_TYPE_CD,Y.VOL_HRS,Y.FIX_HRS_PCT , ds.actl_itm_cnt as actl_itm_cnt,ds.txn_dte as txn_dte from (select distinct A.task_no,tk.task_nm,A.loc_no,lc.div_no,lc.rgn_no,lc.zone_no,lc.ar_no, dt.dept_nm,A.wk_id,A.day_of_wk,A.FIX_HRS,A.VAR_PER_MTRC_TYPE_CD,A.VOL_HRS,sg.FIX_HRS_PCT , w.wk_strt , w.wk_end ,tk.dept_no, decode(A.day_of_wk,0,w.wk_strt,1,w.wk_strt+1,2,w.wk_strt+2,3,w.wk_strt+3,4,w.wk_strt+4,5,w.wk_strt+5,6,w.WK_END) as X from ww_Wlp.lbr_Std A inner join ww_wlp.wk w on A.wk_id=w.wk_id inner join ww_wlp.task tk on A.task_No=tk.task_No inner join ww_wlp.loc lc on lc.loc_no=a.loc_no and lc.div_no='Division' left outer join ww_Wlp.fix_hrs_wky_sprd_gbl sg on A.loc_No=sg.loc_no and A.task_No=sg.task_no and A.day_of_Wk=sg.day_of_wk inner join dept dt on dt.dept_no=tk.dept_no and dt.div_no = 3 where w.fin_yr='Year' and w.fin_wk_no='FinWk' and A.loc_no in (select loc_no from loc where div_no='Division' and rgn_no='Region' and zone_no='Zone') --and tk.dept_no=25 and A.day_of_wk in (0,1,2,3,4,5,6) --and a.task_no='600062' order by A.task_no,tk.dept_no,dt.dept_nm ) Y left outer join ww_wlp.dly_sls ds on Y.loc_No=ds.loc_no and Y.dept_no=ds.dept_no and ds.txn_dte = X order by Y.task_no,Y.dept_no, y.X ) LL group by LL.task_no,LL.task_nm,LL.loc_no,LL.div_no,LL.rgn_no,LL.zone_no,LL.ar_no,LL.dept_no,LL.dept_nm,LL.wk_id,LL.day_of_wk,LL.FIX_HRS, LL.VAR_PER_MTRC_TYPE_CD,LL.VOL_HRS,LL.FIX_HRS_PCT , LL.txn_dte order by ll.day_of_wk) src where dept_no not in (20) order by src.ar_no,src.dept_no,src.task_no ) sto group by ar_no) sms_src on sms_src.ar_no=e.ar_no order by sms_src.ar_no)actl_sms LEFT OUTER JOIN (select lc.ar_no,NVL(wge.ACTL_HOURS_DTSG,0) as WTD from (select distinct b.ar_no from ww_wlp.loc b where b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and b.zone_no='Zone' order by b.ar_no) lc LEFT OUTER JOIN (select * from (select h.zone_no,h.ar_no,sum(h.ACTL_WAGE_DTS) as ACTL_WAGE_DTSG,sum(h.ACTL_HOURS_DTS) as ACTL_HOURS_DTSG from (select e.zone_no,e.ar_no,e.dply_seq,sum(e.actl_amt) as ACTL_WAGE_DTS,sum(e.actl_hrs) as ACTL_HOURS_DTS from (select b.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,b.loc_nm,a.dept_no,d.dept_nm,d.dply_seq,c.perd_desc,c.wk_id,a.dly_wage_dte,dy.day_of_wk, nvl(a.actl_amt,0) as actl_amt,nvl(a.actl_wrk_hrs,0) as actl_hrs from ww_wlp.actl_dly_wage_krn a, loc b, wk c , dept d, day dy where a.loc_no=b.loc_no and a.div_no=b.div_no and b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and b.zone_no='Zone' and a.dept_no NOT IN (20,27,28) and a.dly_wage_dte between c.wk_strt and c.wk_end and c.wk_id='Week' and a.dept_no=d.dept_no and a.div_no=d.div_no and d.dply_seq is not null and d.div_no='Division' and a.dly_wage_dte=dy.day_dte and c.wk_id=dy.wk_id and a.actl_wrk_hrs is NOT NULL and a.actl_wrk_hrs!=0 order by b.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,d.dply_seq,c.perd_desc,c.wk_id,a.dly_wage_dte,dy.day_of_wk) e group by e.zone_no,e.ar_no,e.dply_seq order by e.zone_no,e.ar_no,e.dply_seq) h group by h.zone_no,h.ar_no order by h.zone_no,h.ar_no) f /*UNION select * from (select h.zone_no,h.ar_no,sum(h.ACTL_WAGE_DTS) as ACTL_WAGE_DTSG,sum(h.ACTL_HOURS_DTS) as ACTL_HOURS_DTSG from (select e.zone_no,e.ar_no,e.dply_seq,(sum(e.actl_wage_amt) + sum(e.actl_wage_adj_amt)) as ACTL_WAGE_DTS, (sum(e.actl_hrs) + sum(e.actl_wage_adj_hrs)) as ACTL_HOURS_DTS from (select b.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,a.dept_no,d.dept_nm,d.dply_seq,a.dly_wage_dte, nvl(a.actl_wage_amt,0) as actl_wage_amt,nvl(a.actl_wage_adj_amt,0) as actl_wage_adj_amt, nvl(a.actl_wrk_hrs,0) as actl_hrs,nvl(a.actl_wage_adj_hrs,0) as actl_wage_adj_hrs from ww_wlp.dly_wage a, loc b, dept d where a.loc_no=b.loc_no and a.div_no=b.div_no and b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and b.zone_no='Zone' and a.dept_no NOT IN (20,27,28) and a.dly_wage_dte in (select distinct max(a.dly_wage_dte) as ltst_dte from dly_wage a, wk c where dly_wage_dte between c.wk_strt and c.wk_end and c.wk_id='Week') and a.dept_no=d.dept_no and a.div_no=d.div_no and d.dply_seq is not null and d.div_no='Division' and (b.zone_no,b.ar_no) NOT IN (select distinct b.zone_no,b.ar_no from ww_wlp.actl_dly_wage_krn a, loc b, wk c , dept d, day dy where a.loc_no=b.loc_no and a.div_no=b.div_no and b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and b.zone_no='Zone' and a.dept_no NOT IN (20,27,28) and a.dly_wage_dte between c.wk_strt and c.wk_end and c.wk_id='Week' and a.dept_no=d.dept_no and a.div_no=d.div_no and d.dply_seq is not null and d.div_no='Division' and a.dly_wage_dte=dy.day_dte and c.wk_id=dy.wk_id and a.actl_wrk_hrs is NOT NULL and a.actl_wrk_hrs!=0) order by b.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,d.dply_seq,a.dly_wage_dte) e group by sum(e.wage_adj_amt)) as PLN_WAGE_DTSG, (sum(e.ta_pln_hrs) + sum(e.wage_adj_hrs)) as PLN_HOURS_DTSG from (select b.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,b.loc_nm,a.dept_no,d.dept_nm,d.dply_seq,c.perd_desc,c.wk_id, nvl(a.ta_pln_wage_amt,0) as ta_pln_wage_amt,nvl(a.wage_adj_amt,0) as wage_adj_amt,nvl(a.ta_pln_hrs,0) as ta_pln_hrs,nvl(a.wage_adj_hrs,0) as wage_adj_hrs from ww_wlp.wky_dept_pln a, loc b, wk c , dept d where a.loc_no=b.loc_no and a.div_no=b.div_no and not null and d.div_no='Division' and (b.zone_no,b.ar_no) NOT IN (select distinct b.zone_no,b.ar_no from ww_wlp.actl_dly_wage_krn a, loc b, wk c , dept d, day dy where a.loc_no=b.loc_no and a.div_no=b.div_no and b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and b.zone_no='Zone' and a.dept_no NOT IN (20,27,28) and a.dly_wage_dte between c.wk_strt and c.wk_end and c.wk_id='Week' and a.dept_no=d.dept_no and a.div_no=d.div_no and d.dply_seq is not null and d.div_no='Division' and a.dly_wage_dte=dy.day_dte and c.wk_id=dy.wk_id and a.actl_wrk_hrs is NOT NULL and a.actl_wrk_hrs!=0) b.zone_no='Zone' and a.dept_no NOT IN (20,27,28) and a.dly_wage_dte in (select distinct max(a.dly_wage_dte) as ltst_dte from dly_wage a, wk c where dly_wage_dte between c.wk_strt and c.wk_end and TCName.ActualORPrcntWkToDtTotal: select 'STORE TOTAL' as Totl,CASE WHEN NVL(actl_sms.Storetotal_wktodt,0) = 0 AND NVL(actl_hrs.wtd,0) = 0 THEN 0 WHEN NVL(actl_sms.Storetotal_wktodt,0) = 0 THEN 0 WHEN NVL(actl_hrs.wtd,0) = 0 THEN 0 ELSE NVL(ROUND((actl_sms.Storetotal_wktodt / actl_hrs.wtd)*100,1),0) END as WTD from (select 'STORE TOTAL' as Totl,sum(actl_sms_hrs_wk_to_dt) as Storetotal_wktodt from (select e.ar_no,actl_sms_hrs_wk_to_dt from (select div_no,rgn_no,zone_no,ar_no from ww_wlp.loc where div_no='Division' and rgn_no='Region' and zone_no='Zone' and WLP_LIVE_IND IN ('Y','N') group by div_no,rgn_no,zone_no,ar_no order by div_no,rgn_no,zone_no,ar_no ) e LEFT OUTER JOIN (select ar_no ,Sum(plan_sms_hrs) as actl_sms_hrs_wk_to_dt from (select distinct src.*, (CASE when task_nm<>'Major Fill' and dept_no in (5,10,15) Then ((((src.var_per_mtrc_type_cd * NVL(src.itm_cnt,0))/1000))+src.fix_hrs) When task_nm='Major Fill' Then ((((((src.var_per_mtrc_type_cd * NVL(src.itm_cnt,0))/1000)) * src.fix_hrs_pct)/100) + src.fix_hrs) when task_nm<>'Major Fill' and dept_no not in (5,10,15) Then ((((src.var_per_mtrc_type_cd * NVL(src.itm_cnt,0))/1000))+src.fix_hrs) END) as plan_sms_hrs from (select LL.task_no,LL.task_nm,LL.loc_no,LL.div_no,LL.rgn_no,LL.zone_no,LL.ar_no,LL.dept_no,LL.dept_nm,LL.wk_id,LL.day_of_wk,LL.FIX_HRS,LL.VAR_PER_MTRC_TYPE_CD,LL.VOL_HRS,LL.FIX_HRS_PCT , LL.txn_dte, (case when LL.task_nm = 'Major Fill' then (select sum(actl_itm_cnt) from pln_actl_vw where loc_no=LL.loc_no and dept_no in (5,10,15) and txn_dte between (select wk_strt from wk where fin_yr='Year' and fin_wk_no='FinWk') and (select wk_end from wk where fin_yr='Year' and fin_wk_no='FinWk') ) When LL.task_nm <> 'Major Fill' and LL.dept_no in (5,10,15) then (select sum(actl_itm_cnt) from dly_sls where loc_no=LL.loc_no and dept_no in (5,10,15) and txn_dte = LL.txn_dte) When LL.task_nm <> 'Major Fill' and LL.dept_no not in (5,10,15) then (select actl_itm_cnt from dly_sls where loc_no=LL.loc_no and dept_no=LL.dept_no and txn_dte = LL.txn_dte) end ) as itm_cnt from (select Y.task_no,Y.task_nm,Y.loc_no,Y.div_no,Y.rgn_no,Y.zone_no,Y.ar_no,Y.dept_no,Y.dept_nm,Y.wk_id,Y.day_of_wk,Y.FIX_HRS,Y.VAR_PER_MTRC_TYPE_CD,Y.VOL_HRS,Y.FIX_HRS_PCT , ds.actl_itm_cnt as actl_itm_cnt,ds.txn_dte as txn_dte from (select distinct A.task_no,tk.task_nm,A.loc_no,lc.div_no,lc.rgn_no,lc.zone_no,lc.ar_no, dt.dept_nm,A.wk_id,A.day_of_wk,A.FIX_HRS,A.VAR_PER_MTRC_TYPE_CD,A.VOL_HRS,sg.FIX_HRS_PCT , w.wk_strt , w.wk_end ,tk.dept_no, decode(A.day_of_wk,0,w.wk_strt,1,w.wk_strt+1,2,w.wk_strt+2,3,w.wk_strt+3,4,w.wk_strt+4,5,w.wk_strt+5,6,w.WK_END) as X from ww_Wlp.lbr_Std A inner join ww_wlp.wk w on A.wk_id=w.wk_id inner join ww_wlp.task tk on A.task_No=tk.task_No inner join ww_wlp.loc lc on lc.loc_no=a.loc_no and lc.div_no='Division' left outer join ww_Wlp.fix_hrs_wky_sprd_gbl sg on A.loc_No=sg.loc_no and A.task_No=sg.task_no and A.day_of_Wk=sg.day_of_wk inner join dept dt on dt.dept_no=tk.dept_no and dt.div_no = 3 where w.fin_yr='Year' and w.fin_wk_no='FinWk' and A.loc_no in (select loc_no from loc where div_no='Division' and rgn_no='Region' and zone_no='Zone') --and tk.dept_no=25 and A.day_of_wk in (0,1,2,3,4,5,6) --and a.task_no='600062' order by A.task_no,tk.dept_no,dt.dept_nm ) Y left outer join ww_wlp.dly_sls ds on Y.loc_No=ds.loc_no and Y.dept_no=ds.dept_no and ds.txn_dte = X order by Y.task_no,Y.dept_no, y.X ) LL group by LL.task_no,LL.task_nm,LL.loc_no,LL.div_no,LL.rgn_no,LL.zone_no,LL.ar_no,LL.dept_no,LL.dept_nm,LL.wk_id,LL.day_of_wk,LL.FIX_HRS, LL.VAR_PER_MTRC_TYPE_CD,LL.VOL_HRS,LL.FIX_HRS_PCT , LL.txn_dte order by ll.day_of_wk) src where dept_no not in (20) order by src.ar_no,src.dept_no,src.task_no ) sto group by ar_no) sms_src on sms_src.ar_no=e.ar_no order by sms_src.ar_no))actl_sms, (select lc.zone_no,NVL(wge.ACTL_HRS_TOT_DTSG,0) as WTD from (select distinct b.zone_no from ww_wlp.loc b where b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and b.zone_no='Zone' order by b.zone_no) lc LEFT OUTER JOIN (select j.zone_no,sum(j.ACTL_WAGE_DTSG) as ACTL_WGE_TOT_DTSG,sum(j.ACTL_HOURS_DTSG) as ACTL_HRS_TOT_DTSG from (select * from (select h.zone_no,h.loc_no,sum(h.ACTL_WAGE_DTS) as from ww_wlp.actl_dly_wage_krn a, loc b, wk c , dept d, day dy where a.loc_no=b.loc_no and a.div_no=b.div_no and b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and b.zone_no='Zone' and a.dept_no NOT IN NVL(sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,02,b.PLN_SMS_TOT_DPZ)),0) Wed, NVL(sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,03,b.PLN_SMS_TOT_DPZ)),0) Thu, NVL(sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,04,b.PLN_SMS_TOT_DPZ)),0) Fri, NVL(sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,05,b.PLN_SMS_TOT_DPZ)),0) Sat, NVL(sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,06,b.PLN_SMS_TOT_DPZ)),0) Sun from (select h.zone_no,SUBSTR(h.day_of_wk,0,2) as dte_of_wk,sum(h.PLN_SMS_DTS) as PLN_SMS_TOT_DPZ from (select e.zone_no,e.ar_no,e.loc_nm,e.dply_seq,e.dept_nm,e.day_of_wk,(sum(e.fix_hrs) + sum(e.vol_hrs)) as PLN_SMS_DTS from (select b.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,b.loc_nm,d.dept_no,d.dept_nm,d.dply_seq,c.perd_desc,c.wk_id,a.day_of_wk,dy.day_dte, nvl(a.fix_hrs,0) as fix_hrs,nvl(a.vol_hrs,0) as vol_hrs from ww_wlp.lbr_std a, loc b, wk c , dept d, task tsk, day dy where a.loc_no=b.loc_no and b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and b.zone_no='Zone' and tsk.dept_no NOT IN (20,27,28) and a.wk_id=c.wk_id and c.wk_id='Week' and dy.day_dte between c.wk_strt and c.wk_end and tsk.dept_no=d.dept_no and d.dply_seq is not null and d.div_no='Division' and a.task_no=tsk.task_no and a.wk_id=dy.wk_id and a.day_of_wk=dy.day_of_wk and c.wk_id=dy.wk_id order by b.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,d.dply_seq,c.perd_desc,c.wk_id,a.day_of_wk,dy.day_dte) e group by e.zone_no,e.ar_no,e.loc_nm,e.dply_seq,e.dept_nm,e.day_of_wk order by e.zone_no,e.ar_no,e.dply_seq,e.day_of_wk) h group by h.zone_no,h.day_of_wk order by h.zone_no,h.day_of_wk) b group by b.zone_no order by b.zone_no) x ) z ) sms on sms.zone_no=lc.zone_no) sms_hrs, (select lc.zone_no,sum(wge.PLN_HOURS_TOT_DPZ) as WTD from (select distinct b.zone_no from ww_wlp.loc b where b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and b.zone_no='Zone' order by b.zone_no) lc LEFT OUTER JOIN (select e.zone_no,e.ar_no,e.loc_no,e.loc_nm,e.dply_seq,e.dept_nm,(sum(e.ta_pln_wage_amt) + sum(e.wage_adj_amt)) as PLN_WAGE_TOT_DPZ, (sum(e.ta_pln_hrs) + sum(e.wage_adj_hrs)) as PLN_HOURS_TOT_DPZ from (select b.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,b.loc_nm,a.dept_no,d.dept_nm,d.dply_seq,c.perd_desc,c.wk_id, a.ta_pln_wage_amt as ta_pln_wage_amt,a.wage_adj_amt as wage_adj_amt,a.ta_pln_adj_hrs as ta_pln_hrs,a.wage_adj_hrs as wage_adj_hrs from ww_wlp.wky_dept_pln a, loc b, wk c , dept d where a.loc_no=b.loc_no and a.div_no=b.div_no and b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and b.zone_no='Zone' and a.dept_no NOT IN (20,27,28) and a.wk_id=c.wk_id and c.wk_id='Week' and a.dept_no=d.dept_no and a.div_no=d.div_no and d.dply_seq is not null and d.div_no='Division' order by b.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,d.dply_seq,c.perd_desc,c.wk_id) e group by e.zone_no,e.ar_no,e.loc_no,e.loc_nm,e.dply_seq,e.dept_nm order by e.zone_no,e.ar_no,e.loc_no,e.loc_nm,e.dply_seq) wge on wge.zone_no=lc.zone_no group by lc.zone_no order by lc.zone_no) pln_hrs where sms_hrs.zone_no=pln_hrs.zone_no
TCName.ActualORPrcntColumnPayPlan: select actl_sms.ar_no, case when actl_sms.mon=0 and actl_hrs.mon=0 then 0 when actl_sms.mon=0 then 0 when actl_hrs.mon=0 then 0 else NVL(ROUND((actl_sms.mon / actl_hrs.mon)*100,1),0) end as Mon, case when actl_sms.tue=0 and actl_hrs.tue=0 then 0 when actl_sms.tue=0 then 0 when actl_hrs.tue=0 then 0 else NVL(ROUND((actl_sms.tue / actl_hrs.tue)*100,1),0) end as Tue, case when actl_sms.wed=0 and actl_hrs.wed=0 then 0 when actl_sms.wed=0 then 0 when actl_hrs.wed=0 then 0 else NVL(ROUND((actl_sms.wed / actl_hrs.wed)*100,1),0) end as Wed, case when actl_sms.thu=0 and actl_hrs.thu=0 then 0 when actl_sms.thu=0 then 0 when actl_hrs.thu=0 then 0 else NVL(ROUND((actl_sms.Thu / actl_hrs.Thu)*100,1),0) end as Thu, case when actl_sms.fri=0 and actl_hrs.fri=0 then 0 when actl_sms.fri=0 then 0 when actl_hrs.fri=0 then 0 else NVL(ROUND((actl_sms.fri / actl_hrs.fri)*100,1),0) end as Fri, case when actl_sms.sat=0 and actl_hrs.sat=0 then 0 when actl_sms.sat=0 then 0 when actl_hrs.sat=0 then 0 else NVL(ROUND((actl_sms.sat / actl_hrs.sat)*100,1),0) end as Sat, case when actl_sms.sun=0 and actl_hrs.sun=0 then 0 when actl_sms.sun=0 then 0 when actl_hrs.sun=0 then 0 else NVL(ROUND((actl_sms.sun / actl_hrs.sun)*100,1),0) end as Sun from (select e.ar_no,(sms_src.Monday) as Mon,(sms_src.Tuesday) as Tue,(sms_src.Wednesday) as Wed,(sms_src.Thursday) as Thu,(sms_src.Friday) as Fri,(sms_src.Saturday) as Sat,(sms_src.Sunday) as Sun from (select div_no,rgn_no,zone_no,ar_no from ww_wlp.loc where div_no='Division' and rgn_no='Region' and zone_no='Zone' and WLP_LIVE_IND IN ('Y','N') group by div_no,rgn_no,zone_no,ar_no order by div_no,rgn_no,zone_no,ar_no ) e LEFT OUTER JOIN (select ar_no , Sum(decode(day_of_wk, 0 , plan_sms_hrs )) Monday, sum(decode(day_of_wk, 1 , plan_sms_hrs )) Tuesday, sum(decode(day_of_wk, 2 , plan_sms_hrs )) Wednesday, sum(decode(day_of_wk, 3 , plan_sms_hrs )) Thursday, sum(decode(day_of_wk, 4 , plan_sms_hrs )) Friday, sum(decode(day_of_wk, 5 , plan_sms_hrs )) Saturday, sum(decode(day_of_wk, 6 , plan_sms_hrs )) Sunday from (select distinct src.*, (CASE when task_nm<>'Major Fill' and dept_no in (5,10,15) Then ((((src.var_per_mtrc_type_cd * NVL(src.itm_cnt,0))/1000))+src.fix_hrs) When task_nm='Major Fill' Then ((((((src.var_per_mtrc_type_cd * NVL(src.itm_cnt,0))/1000)) * src.fix_hrs_pct)/100) + src.fix_hrs) when task_nm<>'Major Fill' and dept_no not in (5,10,15) Then ((((src.var_per_mtrc_type_cd * NVL(src.itm_cnt,0))/1000))+src.fix_hrs) END) as plan_sms_hrs from (select LL.task_no,LL.task_nm,LL.loc_no,LL.div_no,LL.rgn_no,LL.zone_no,LL.ar_no,LL.dept_no,LL.dept_nm,LL.wk_id,LL.day_of_wk,LL.FIX_HRS,LL.VAR_PER_MTRC_TYPE_CD,LL.VOL_HRS,LL.FIX_HRS_PCT , LL.txn_dte, (case join ww_wlp.dly_sls ds on Y.loc_No=ds.loc_no and Y.dept_no=ds.dept_no and ds.txn_dte = X order by Y.task_no,Y.dept_no, y.X ) LL group by when LL.task_nm = 'Major Fill' then (select sum(actl_itm_cnt) from pln_actl_vw where loc_no=LL.loc_no and dept_no in (5,10,15) and txn_dte between (select wk_strt from wk where fin_yr='Year' and loc_no=LL.loc_no and dept_no in (5,10,15) and txn_dte = LL.txn_dte) When LL.task_nm <> 'Major Fill' and LL.dept_no not in (5,10,15) then (select actl_itm_cnt from dly_sls where loc_no=LL.loc_no and actl_itm_cnt,ds.txn_dte as txn_dte from (select distinct A.task_no,tk.task_nm,A.loc_no,lc.div_no,lc.rgn_no,lc.zone_no,lc.ar_no, ww_wlp.task tk on A.task_No=tk.task_No inner join ww_wlp.loc lc on lc.loc_no=a.loc_no and lc.div_no='Division' left outer join ww_Wlp.fix_hrs_wky_sprd_gbl sg on A.loc_No=sg.loc_no and A.task_No=sg.task_no and A.day_of_Wk=sg.day_of_wk inner join dept dt on dt.dept_no=tk.dept_no and dt.div_no = 3 where w.fin_yr='Year' and w.fin_wk_no='FinWk' and A.loc_no in (select loc_no from loc where div_no='Division' and rgn_no='Region' and zone_no='Zone') --and tk.dept_no=25 and A.day_of_wk in (0,1,2,3,4,5,6) --and a.task_no='600062' order by A.task_no,tk.dept_no,dt.dept_nm ) Y left outer join ww_wlp.dly_sls ds on Y.loc_No=ds.loc_no and Y.dept_no=ds.dept_no and ds.txn_dte = X order by Y.task_no,Y.dept_no, y.X ) LL group by LL.task_no,LL.task_nm,LL.loc_no,LL.div_no,LL.rgn_no,LL.zone_no,LL.ar_no,LL.dept_no,LL.dept_nm,LL.wk_id,LL.day_of_wk,LL.FIX_HRS, LL.VAR_PER_MTRC_TYPE_CD,LL.VOL_HRS,LL.FIX_HRS_PCT , LL.txn_dte order by ll.day_of_wk) src where dept_no not in (20) order by src.ar_no,src.dept_no,src.task_no ) sto group by ar_no) sms_src on sms_src.ar_no=e.ar_no order by sms_src.ar_no))actl_sms, (select lc.zone_no,NVL(wge.mon,0) as Mon,NVL(wge.tue,0) as Tue,NVL(wge.wed,0) as Wed,NVL(wge.thu,0) as Thu, NVL(wge.fri,0) as Fri,NVL(wge.sat,0) as Sat,NVL(wge.sun,0) as Sun from (select distinct b.zone_no NVL(sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,01,b.ACTL_HRS_DTSG)),0) Tue, NVL(sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,02,b.ACTL_HRS_DTSG)),0) Wed, NVL(sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,03,b.ACTL_HRS_DTSG)),0) Thu, b.zone_no='Zone' and a.dept_no NOT IN (20,27,28) and a.dly_wage_dte between c.wk_strt and c.wk_end and c.wk_id='Week' and a.dept_no=d.dept_no and a.div_no=d.div_no and d.dply_seq is not null and and b.zone_no='Zone' and a.dept_no NOT IN (20,27,28) and a.dly_wage_dte between c.wk_strt /*and c.wk_end and sysdate-1 and c.wk_id='Week' and a.dept_no=d.dept_no and a.div_no=d.div_no and d.dply_seq (20,27,28) and a.dly_wage_dte between c.wk_strt and c.wk_end and c.wk_id='Week' and a.dept_no=d.dept_no and a.div_no=d.div_no and d.dply_seq is not null and d.div_no='Division' and TCName.ActualORPrcntWkToDtPayPlan: select actl_sms.ar_no,CASE WHEN NVL(actl_sms.actl_actl_sms_wk_to_dt,0) = 0 AND NVL(actl_hrs.wtd,0) = 0 THEN 0 WHEN NVL(actl_sms.actl_actl_sms_wk_to_dt,0) = 0 THEN 0 WHEN NVL(actl_hrs.wtd,0) = 0 THEN 0 ELSE NVL(ROUND((actl_sms.actl_actl_sms_wk_to_dt / actl_hrs.wtd)*100,1),0) END as WTD from (select e.ar_no,actl_sms_hrs_wk_to_dt from (select div_no,rgn_no,zone_no,ar_no from ww_wlp.loc where div_no='Division' and rgn_no='Region' and zone_no='Zone' and WLP_LIVE_IND IN ('Y','N') group by div_no,rgn_no,zone_no,ar_no order by div_no,rgn_no,zone_no,ar_no ) e LEFT OUTER JOIN (select ar_no ,Sum(plan_sms_hrs) as actl_sms_hrs_wk_to_dt from (select distinct src.*, (CASE when task_nm<>'Major Fill' and dept_no in (5,10,15) Then ((((src.var_per_mtrc_type_cd * NVL(src.itm_cnt,0))/1000))+src.fix_hrs) When task_nm='Major Fill' Then ((((((src.var_per_mtrc_type_cd * NVL(src.itm_cnt,0))/1000)) * src.fix_hrs_pct)/100) + src.fix_hrs) when task_nm<>'Major Fill' and dept_no not in (5,10,15) Then ((((src.var_per_mtrc_type_cd * NVL(src.itm_cnt,0))/1000))+src.fix_hrs) END) as plan_sms_hrs from (select fin_wk_no='FinWk') and (select wk_end from wk where fin_yr='Year' and fin_wk_no='FinWk') ) When LL.task_nm <> 'Major Fill' and LL.dept_no in (5,10,15) then (select sum(actl_itm_cnt) from dly_sls where A.task_No=sg.task_no and A.day_of_Wk=sg.day_of_wk inner join dept dt on dt.dept_no=tk.dept_no and dt.div_no = 3 where w.fin_yr='Year' and w.fin_wk_no='FinWk' and A.loc_no in (select loc_no from loc TCName.ActualORPrcntWkToDtTotalPayPlan: select 'STORE TOTAL' as Totl, CASE WHEN NVL(actl_sms.Storetotal_wktodt,0) = 0 AND NVL(actl_hrs.wtd,0) = 0 THEN 0 WHEN NVL(actl_sms.Storetotal_wktodt,0) = 0 THEN task_nm<>'Major Fill' and dept_no in (5,10,15) Then ((((src.var_per_mtrc_type_cd * NVL(src.itm_cnt,0))/1000))+src.fix_hrs) When task_nm='Major Fill' Then ((((((src.var_per_mtrc_type_cd * NVL(src.itm_cnt,0))/1000)) * src.fix_hrs_pct)/100) + src.fix_hrs) when task_nm<>'Major Fill' and dept_no not in (5,10,15) Then ((((src.var_per_mtrc_type_cd * NVL(src.itm_cnt,0))/1000))+src.fix_hrs) ww_wlp.task tk on A.task_No=tk.task_No inner join ww_wlp.loc lc on lc.loc_no=a.loc_no and lc.div_no='Division' left outer join ww_Wlp.fix_hrs_wky_sprd_gbl sg on A.loc_No=sg.loc_no and join ww_wlp.dly_sls ds on Y.loc_No=ds.loc_no and Y.dept_no=ds.dept_no and ds.txn_dte = X order by Y.task_no,Y.dept_no, y.X ) LL group by ll.day_of_wk) src where dept_no not in (20) order by src.ar_no,src.dept_no,src.task_no ) sto group by ar_no) sms_src on sms_src.ar_no=e.ar_no order by sms_src.ar_no))actl_sms, (select TCName.VarianceORPrcntColumn: select nyu.ar_no, case when den.Mon=0 or nyu.Mon=0 then 0 else ROUND((den.Mon - nyu.Mon),2) end as Mon, case when den.Tue=0 or nyu.Tue=0 then 0 else ROUND((den.Tue - nyu.Tue),2) end as Tue, case when den.Wed=0 or nyu.Wed=0 then 0 else ROUND((den.Wed - nyu.Wed),2) end as Wed, case when den.Thu=0 or nyu.Thu=0 then 0 else ROUND((den.Thu - nyu.Thu),2) end as Thu, case when den.Fri=0 or nyu.Fri=0 then 0 else ROUND((den.Fri - nyu.Fri),2) end as Fri, case when den.Sat=0 or nyu.Sat=0 then 0 else ROUND((den.Sat - nyu.Sat),2) end as Sat, case when den.Sun=0 or nyu.Sun=0 then 0 else ROUND((den.Sun - nyu.Sun),2) end as Sun from (select actl_sms.ar_no, case when actl_sms.mon=0 and actl_hrs.mon=0 then 0 when actl_sms.mon=0 then 0 when actl_hrs.mon=0 then 0 else NVL(ROUND((actl_sms.mon / actl_hrs.mon)*100,1),0) end as Mon, case when actl_sms.tue=0 and actl_hrs.tue=0 then 0 when actl_sms.tue=0 then 0 when actl_hrs.tue=0 then 0 else NVL(ROUND((actl_sms.tue / actl_hrs.tue)*100,1),0) end as Tue, case when actl_sms.wed=0 and actl_hrs.wed=0 then 0 when actl_sms.wed=0 then 0 when actl_hrs.wed=0 then 0 else NVL(ROUND((actl_sms.wed / actl_hrs.wed)*100,1),0) end as Wed, case when actl_sms.thu=0 and actl_hrs.thu=0 then 0 when actl_sms.thu=0 then 0 when actl_hrs.thu=0 then 0 else NVL(ROUND((actl_sms.Thu / actl_hrs.Thu)*100,1),0) end as Thu, case when actl_sms.fri=0 and actl_hrs.fri=0 then 0 when actl_sms.fri=0 then 0 when actl_hrs.fri=0 then 0 else NVL(ROUND((actl_sms.fri / actl_hrs.fri)*100,1),0) end as Fri, case when actl_sms.sat=0 and actl_hrs.sat=0 then 0 when actl_sms.sat=0 then 0 when actl_hrs.sat=0 then 0 else NVL(ROUND((actl_sms.sat / actl_hrs.sat)*100,1),0) end as Sat, case when actl_sms.sun=0 and actl_hrs.sun=0 then 0 when actl_sms.sun=0 then 0 when actl_hrs.sun=0 then 0 else NVL(ROUND((actl_sms.sun / actl_hrs.sun)*100,1),0) end as Sun from (select e.ar_no,(sms_src.Monday) as Mon,(sms_src.Tuesday) as Tue,(sms_src.Wednesday) as Wed,(sms_src.Thursday) as Thu,(sms_src.Friday) as Fri,(sms_src.Saturday) as Sat,(sms_src.Sunday) as Sun from (select div_no,rgn_no,zone_no,ar_no from ww_wlp.loc where Sum(decode(day_of_wk, 0 , plan_sms_hrs )) Monday, sum(decode(day_of_wk, 1 , plan_sms_hrs )) Tuesday, sum(decode(day_of_wk, 2 , plan_sms_hrs )) Wednesday, sum(decode(day_of_wk, 3 , plan_sms_hrs )) task_nm<>'Major Fill' and dept_no in (5,10,15) Then ((((src.var_per_mtrc_type_cd * NVL(src.itm_cnt,0))/1000))+src.fix_hrs) When task_nm='Major Fill' Then ((((((src.var_per_mtrc_type_cd * NVL(src.itm_cnt,0))/1000)) * src.fix_hrs_pct)/100) + src.fix_hrs) when task_nm<>'Major Fill' and dept_no not in (5,10,15) Then ((((src.var_per_mtrc_type_cd * NVL(src.itm_cnt,0))/1000))+src.fix_hrs) END) as plan_sms_hrs from (select LL.task_no,LL.task_nm,LL.loc_no,LL.div_no,LL.rgn_no,LL.zone_no,LL.ar_no,LL.dept_no,LL.dept_nm,LL.wk_id,LL.day_of_wk,LL.FIX_HRS,LL.VAR_PER_MTRC_TYPE_CD,LL.VOL_HRS,LL.FIX_HRS_PCT , LL.txn_dte, (case when LL.task_nm = 'Major Fill' then (select sum(actl_itm_cnt) from pln_actl_vw where loc_no=LL.loc_no and dept_no in (5,10,15) and txn_dte between (select wk_strt from wk where fin_yr='Year' and fin_wk_no='FinWk') and (select wk_end from wk where fin_yr='Year' and fin_wk_no='FinWk') ) When LL.task_nm <> 'Major Fill' and LL.dept_no in (5,10,15) then (select sum(actl_itm_cnt) from dly_sls where dept_no=LL.dept_no and txn_dte = LL.txn_dte) end ) as itm_cnt from (select Y.task_no,Y.task_nm,Y.loc_no,Y.div_no,Y.rgn_no,Y.zone_no,Y.ar_no,Y.dept_no,Y.dept_nm,Y.wk_id,Y.day_of_wk,Y.FIX_HRS,Y.VAR_PER_MTRC_TYPE_CD,Y.VOL_HRS,Y.FIX_HRS_PCT , ds.actl_itm_cnt as actl_itm_cnt,ds.txn_dte as txn_dte from (select distinct A.task_no,tk.task_nm,A.loc_no,lc.div_no,lc.rgn_no,lc.zone_no,lc.ar_no, dt.dept_nm,A.wk_id,A.day_of_wk,A.FIX_HRS,A.VAR_PER_MTRC_TYPE_CD,A.VOL_HRS,sg.FIX_HRS_PCT , w.wk_strt , w.wk_end ,tk.dept_no, decode(A.day_of_wk,0,w.wk_strt,1,w.wk_strt+1,2,w.wk_strt+2,3,w.wk_strt+3,4,w.wk_strt+4,5,w.wk_strt+5,6,w.WK_END) as X from ww_Wlp.lbr_Std A inner join ww_wlp.wk w on A.wk_id=w.wk_id inner join ww_wlp.task tk on A.task_No=tk.task_No inner join ww_wlp.loc lc on lc.loc_no=a.loc_no and lc.div_no='Division' left outer join ww_Wlp.fix_hrs_wky_sprd_gbl sg on A.loc_No=sg.loc_no and A.task_No=sg.task_no and A.day_of_Wk=sg.day_of_wk inner join dept dt on dt.dept_no=tk.dept_no and dt.div_no = 3 where w.fin_yr='Year' and w.fin_wk_no='FinWk' and A.loc_no in (select loc_no from loc where div_no='Division' and rgn_no='Region' and zone_no='Zone') --and tk.dept_no=25 and A.day_of_wk in (0,1,2,3,4,5,6) --and a.task_no='600062' order by A.task_no,tk.dept_no,dt.dept_nm ) Y left outer join ww_wlp.dly_sls ds on Y.loc_No=ds.loc_no and Y.dept_no=ds.dept_no and ds.txn_dte = X order by Y.task_no,Y.dept_no, y.X ) LL group by LL.task_no,LL.task_nm,LL.loc_no,LL.div_no,LL.rgn_no,LL.zone_no,LL.ar_no,LL.dept_no,LL.dept_nm,LL.wk_id,LL.day_of_wk,LL.FIX_HRS, LL.VAR_PER_MTRC_TYPE_CD,LL.VOL_HRS,LL.FIX_HRS_PCT , LL.txn_dte order by ll.day_of_wk) src where dept_no not in (20) order by src.ar_no,src.dept_no,src.task_no ) sto group by ar_no) sms_src on sms_src.ar_no=e.ar_no order by sms_src.ar_no)actl_sms LEFT OUTER JOIN (select TCName.VarianceORPrcntTotal: select nyu.Total, case when den.Mon=0 or nyu.Mon=0 then 0 else ROUND((den.Mon - nyu.Mon),2) end as Mon, case when den.Tue=0 or nyu.Tue=0 then 0 else ROUND((den.Tue - nyu.Tue),2) end as Tue, case when den.Wed=0 or nyu.Wed=0 then 0 else ROUND((den.Wed - nyu.Wed),2) end as Wed, case when den.Thu=0 or nyu.Thu=0 then 0 else ROUND((den.Thu - nyu.Thu),2) end as Thu, case when den.Fri=0 or nyu.Fri=0 then 0 else ROUND((den.Fri - nyu.Fri),2) end as Fri, case when den.Sat=0 or nyu.Sat=0 then 0 else ROUND((den.Sat - nyu.Sat),2) end as Sat, case when den.Sun=0 or nyu.Sun=0 then 0 else ROUND((den.Sun - nyu.Sun),2) end as Sun from (select 'TOTAL' as Total, case when actl_sms.mon=0 and actl_hrs.mon=0 then 0 when actl_sms.mon=0 then 0 when actl_hrs.mon=0 then 0 else NVL(ROUND((actl_sms.mon / actl_hrs.mon)*100,1),0) end as Mon, case when actl_sms.tue=0 and actl_hrs.tue=0 then 0 when actl_sms.tue=0 then 0 when actl_hrs.tue=0 then 0 else NVL(ROUND((actl_sms.tue / actl_hrs.tue)*100,1),0) end as Tue, case when actl_sms.wed=0 and actl_hrs.wed=0 then 0 when actl_sms.wed=0 then 0 when actl_hrs.wed=0 then 0 else NVL(ROUND((actl_sms.wed / actl_hrs.wed)*100,1),0) end as Wed, case when actl_sms.thu=0 and actl_hrs.thu=0 then 0 when actl_sms.thu=0 then 0 when actl_hrs.thu=0 then 0 else NVL(ROUND((actl_sms.Thu / actl_hrs.Thu)*100,1),0) end as Thu, case when actl_sms.fri=0 and actl_hrs.fri=0 then 0 when actl_sms.fri=0 then 0 when actl_hrs.fri=0 then 0 else NVL(ROUND((actl_sms.fri / actl_hrs.fri)*100,1),0) end as Fri, case when actl_sms.sat=0 and actl_hrs.sat=0 then 0 when actl_sms.sat=0 then 0 when actl_hrs.sat=0 then 0 else NVL(ROUND((actl_sms.sat / actl_hrs.sat)*100,1),0) end as Sat, case when actl_sms.sun=0 and actl_hrs.sun=0 then 0 when actl_sms.sun=0 then 0 when actl_hrs.sun=0 then 0 else NVL(ROUND((actl_sms.sun / actl_hrs.sun)*100,1),0) end as Sun from (select 'TOTAL' as Total,sum(Monday)as MON,sum(Tuesday) as TUE,sum(Wednesday)as WED,sum(Thursday)as THU,sum(Friday) as FRI,sum(Saturday) as SAT,sum(Sunday) as SUN from (select e.ar_no,sms_src.Monday,sms_src.Tuesday,sms_src.Wednesday,sms_src.Thursday,sms_src.Friday,sms_src.Saturday,sms_src.Sunday from (select div_no,rgn_no,zone_no,ar_no from ww_wlp.loc where div_no='Division' and rgn_no='Region' and zone_no='Zone' and WLP_LIVE_IND IN ('Y','N') group by div_no,rgn_no,zone_no,ar_no order by div_no,rgn_no,zone_no,ar_no ) e LEFT OUTER JOIN (select ar_no , Sum(decode(day_of_wk, 0 , plan_sms_hrs )) Monday, sum(decode(day_of_wk, 1 , plan_sms_hrs )) Tuesday, sum(decode(day_of_wk, 2 , plan_sms_hrs )) Wednesday, sum(decode(day_of_wk, 3 , plan_sms_hrs )) Thursday, sum(decode(day_of_wk, 4 , plan_sms_hrs )) Friday, sum(decode(day_of_wk, 5 , plan_sms_hrs )) Saturday, sum(decode(day_of_wk, 6 , plan_sms_hrs )) Sunday from (select distinct src.*, (CASE when task_nm<>'Major Fill' and dept_no in (5,10,15) Then ((((src.var_per_mtrc_type_cd * NVL(src.itm_cnt,0))/1000))+src.fix_hrs) When task_nm='Major Fill' Then ((((((src.var_per_mtrc_type_cd * NVL(src.itm_cnt,0))/1000)) * src.fix_hrs_pct)/100) + src.fix_hrs) when task_nm<>'Major Fill' and dept_no not in (5,10,15) Then ((((src.var_per_mtrc_type_cd * NVL(src.itm_cnt,0))/1000))+src.fix_hrs) END) as plan_sms_hrs from (select LL.task_no,LL.task_nm,LL.loc_no,LL.div_no,LL.rgn_no,LL.zone_no,LL.ar_no,LL.dept_no,LL.dept_nm,LL.wk_id,LL.day_of_wk,LL.FIX_HRS,LL.VAR_PER_MTRC_TYPE_CD,LL.VOL_HRS,LL.FIX_HRS_PCT , LL.txn_dte, (case when LL.task_nm = 'Major Fill' then (select sum(actl_itm_cnt) from pln_actl_vw where loc_no=LL.loc_no and dept_no in (5,10,15) and txn_dte between (select wk_strt from wk where fin_yr='Year' and fin_wk_no='FinWk') and (select wk_end from wk where fin_yr='Year' and fin_wk_no='FinWk') ) When LL.task_nm <> 'Major Fill' and LL.dept_no in (5,10,15) then (select sum(actl_itm_cnt) from dly_sls where loc_no=LL.loc_no and dept_no in (5,10,15) and txn_dte = LL.txn_dte) When LL.task_nm <> 'Major Fill' and LL.dept_no not in (5,10,15) then (select actl_itm_cnt from dly_sls where loc_no=LL.loc_no and dept_no=LL.dept_no and txn_dte = LL.txn_dte) end ) as itm_cnt from (select Y.task_no,Y.task_nm,Y.loc_no,Y.div_no,Y.rgn_no,Y.zone_no,Y.ar_no,Y.dept_no,Y.dept_nm,Y.wk_id,Y.day_of_wk,Y.FIX_HRS,Y.VAR_PER_MTRC_TYPE_CD,Y.VOL_HRS,Y.FIX_HRS_PCT , ds.actl_itm_cnt as actl_itm_cnt,ds.txn_dte as txn_dte from (select distinct A.task_no,tk.task_nm,A.loc_no,lc.div_no,lc.rgn_no,lc.zone_no,lc.ar_no, dt.dept_nm,A.wk_id,A.day_of_wk,A.FIX_HRS,A.VAR_PER_MTRC_TYPE_CD,A.VOL_HRS,sg.FIX_HRS_PCT , w.wk_strt , w.wk_end ,tk.dept_no, decode(A.day_of_wk,0,w.wk_strt,1,w.wk_strt+1,2,w.wk_strt+2,3,w.wk_strt+3,4,w.wk_strt+4,5,w.wk_strt+5,6,w.WK_END) as X from ww_Wlp.lbr_Std A inner join ww_wlp.wk w on A.wk_id=w.wk_id inner join ww_wlp.task tk on A.task_No=tk.task_No inner join ww_wlp.loc lc on lc.loc_no=a.loc_no and lc.div_no='Division' left outer join ww_Wlp.fix_hrs_wky_sprd_gbl sg on A.loc_No=sg.loc_no and A.task_No=sg.task_no and A.day_of_Wk=sg.day_of_wk inner join dept dt on dt.dept_no=tk.dept_no and dt.div_no = 3 where w.fin_yr='Year' and w.fin_wk_no='FinWk' and A.loc_no in (select loc_no from loc where div_no='Division' and rgn_no='Region' and zone_no='Zone') --and tk.dept_no=25 and A.day_of_wk in (0,1,2,3,4,5,6) --and a.task_no='600062' order by A.task_no,tk.dept_no,dt.dept_nm ) Y left outer join ww_wlp.dly_sls ds on Y.loc_No=ds.loc_no and Y.dept_no=ds.dept_no and ds.txn_dte = X order by Y.task_no,Y.dept_no, y.X ) LL group by LL.task_no,LL.task_nm,LL.loc_no,LL.div_no,LL.rgn_no,LL.zone_no,LL.ar_no,LL.dept_no,LL.dept_nm,LL.wk_id,LL.day_of_wk,LL.FIX_HRS, LL.VAR_PER_MTRC_TYPE_CD,LL.VOL_HRS,LL.FIX_HRS_PCT , LL.txn_dte order by ll.day_of_wk) src where dept_no not in (20) order by src.ar_no,src.dept_no,src.task_no ) sto group by ar_no) sms_src on sms_src.ar_no=e.ar_no order by sms_src.ar_no))actl_sms, (select ww_wlp.lbr_std a, loc b, wk c , dept d, task tsk, day dy where a.loc_no=b.loc_no and b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and b.zone_no='Zone' and tsk.dept_no NOT IN (20,27,28) and and a.dly_wage_dte between c.wk_strt and c.wk_end /*and trunc(sysdate-1)*/ and c.wk_id='Week' and a.dept_no=d.dept_no and a.div_no=d.div_no and d.dply_seq is not null and d.div_no='Division' and TCName.VarianceORPrcntWkToDt: select nyu.ar_no, case when den.WTD=0 or nyu.WTD=0 then 0 else ROUND((den.WTD - nyu.WTD),2) end as WTD from (select actl_sms.ar_no,NVL(ROUND((actl_sms.actl_sms_hrs_wk_to_dt / actl_hrs.wtd)*100,1),0) as WTD from (select e.ar_no,actl_sms_hrs_wk_to_dt from (select div_no,rgn_no,zone_no,ar_no from ww_wlp.loc where div_no='Division' and rgn_no='Region' and zone_no='Zone' and WLP_LIVE_IND IN ('Y','N') group by div_no,rgn_no,zone_no,ar_no order by div_no,rgn_no,zone_no,ar_no ) e LEFT OUTER JOIN (select ar_no ,Sum(plan_sms_hrs) as actl_sms_hrs_wk_to_dt from (select distinct src.*, (CASE when task_nm<>'Major Fill' and dept_no in (5,10,15) Then ((((src.var_per_mtrc_type_cd * NVL(src.itm_cnt,0))/1000))+src.fix_hrs) When task_nm='Major Fill' Then ((((((src.var_per_mtrc_type_cd * NVL(src.itm_cnt,0))/1000)) * src.fix_hrs_pct)/100) + src.fix_hrs) when task_nm<>'Major Fill' and dept_no not in (5,10,15) Then ((((src.var_per_mtrc_type_cd * NVL(src.itm_cnt,0))/1000))+src.fix_hrs) END) as plan_sms_hrs from (select LL.task_no,LL.task_nm,LL.loc_no,LL.div_no,LL.rgn_no,LL.zone_no,LL.ar_no,LL.dept_no,LL.dept_nm,LL.wk_id,LL.day_of_wk,LL.FIX_HRS,LL.VAR_PER_MTRC_TYPE_CD,LL.VOL_HRS,LL.FIX_HRS_PCT , LL.txn_dte, (case when LL.task_nm = 'Major Fill' then (select sum(actl_itm_cnt) from pln_actl_vw where loc_no=LL.loc_no and dept_no in (5,10,15) and txn_dte between (select wk_strt from wk where fin_yr='Year' and fin_wk_no='FinWk') and (select wk_end from wk where fin_yr='Year' and fin_wk_no='FinWk') ) When LL.task_nm <> 'Major Fill' and LL.dept_no in (5,10,15) then (select sum(actl_itm_cnt) from dly_sls where loc_no=LL.loc_no and dept_no in (5,10,15) and txn_dte = LL.txn_dte) When LL.task_nm <> 'Major Fill' and LL.dept_no not in (5,10,15) then (select actl_itm_cnt from dly_sls where loc_no=LL.loc_no and dept_no=LL.dept_no and txn_dte = LL.txn_dte) end ) as itm_cnt from (select Y.task_no,Y.task_nm,Y.loc_no,Y.div_no,Y.rgn_no,Y.zone_no,Y.ar_no,Y.dept_no,Y.dept_nm,Y.wk_id,Y.day_of_wk,Y.FIX_HRS,Y.VAR_PER_MTRC_TYPE_CD,Y.VOL_HRS,Y.FIX_HRS_PCT , ds.actl_itm_cnt as actl_itm_cnt,ds.txn_dte as txn_dte from (select distinct A.task_no,tk.task_nm,A.loc_no,lc.div_no,lc.rgn_no,lc.zone_no,lc.ar_no, dt.dept_nm,A.wk_id,A.day_of_wk,A.FIX_HRS,A.VAR_PER_MTRC_TYPE_CD,A.VOL_HRS,sg.FIX_HRS_PCT , w.wk_strt , w.wk_end ,tk.dept_no, decode(A.day_of_wk,0,w.wk_strt,1,w.wk_strt+1,2,w.wk_strt+2,3,w.wk_strt+3,4,w.wk_strt+4,5,w.wk_strt+5,6,w.WK_END) as X from ww_Wlp.lbr_Std A inner join ww_wlp.wk w on A.wk_id=w.wk_id inner join ww_wlp.task tk on A.task_No=tk.task_No inner join ww_wlp.loc lc on lc.loc_no=a.loc_no and lc.div_no='Division' left outer join ww_Wlp.fix_hrs_wky_sprd_gbl sg on A.loc_No=sg.loc_no and A.task_No=sg.task_no and A.day_of_Wk=sg.day_of_wk inner join dept dt on dt.dept_no=tk.dept_no and dt.div_no = 3 where w.fin_yr='Year' and w.fin_wk_no='FinWk' and A.loc_no in (select loc_no from loc where div_no='Division' and rgn_no='Region' and zone_no='Zone') --and tk.dept_no=25 and A.day_of_wk in (0,1,2,3,4,5,6) --and a.task_no='600062' order by A.task_no,tk.dept_no,dt.dept_nm ) Y left outer join ww_wlp.dly_sls ds on Y.loc_No=ds.loc_no and Y.dept_no=ds.dept_no and ds.txn_dte = X order by Y.task_no,Y.dept_no, y.X ) LL group by LL.task_no,LL.task_nm,LL.loc_no,LL.div_no,LL.rgn_no,LL.zone_no,LL.ar_no,LL.dept_no,LL.dept_nm,LL.wk_id,LL.day_of_wk,LL.FIX_HRS, LL.VAR_PER_MTRC_TYPE_CD,LL.VOL_HRS,LL.FIX_HRS_PCT , LL.txn_dte order by ll.day_of_wk) src where dept_no not in (20) order by src.ar_no,src.dept_no,src.task_no ) sto group by ar_no) sms_src on sms_src.ar_no=e.ar_no order by sms_src.ar_no)actl_sms LEFT OUTER JOIN (select lc.ar_no,NVL(wge.ACTL_HOURS_DTSG,0) as WTD from (select distinct b.ar_no from ww_wlp.loc b where b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and b.zone_no='Zone' order by b.ar_no) lc LEFT OUTER JOIN ACTL_WAGE_DTS,sum(e.actl_hrs) as ACTL_HOURS_DTS from (select b.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,b.loc_nm,a.dept_no,d.dept_nm,d.dply_seq,c.perd_desc,c.wk_id,a.dly_wage_dte,dy.day_of_wk, nvl(a.actl_amt,0) as actl_amt,nvl(a.actl_wrk_hrs,0) as actl_hrs from ww_wlp.actl_dly_wage_krn a, loc b, wk c , dept d, day dy where a.loc_no=b.loc_no and a.div_no=b.div_no and b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and b.zone_no='Zone' and a.dept_no NOT IN (20,27,28) and a.dly_wage_dte between c.wk_strt and c.wk_end and c.wk_id='Week' and a.dept_no=d.dept_no and a.div_no=d.div_no and d.dply_seq is not null and d.div_no='Division' and a.dly_wage_dte=dy.day_dte and c.wk_id=dy.wk_id and a.actl_wrk_hrs is NOT NULL and a.actl_wrk_hrs!=0 order by TCName.VarianceORPrcntWkToDtTotal: select nyu.Total, case when den.WTD=0 or nyu.WTD=0 then 0 else ROUND((den.WTD - nyu.WTD),2) end as WTD from (select 'STORE TOTAL' as Total,NVL(ROUND((actl_sms.Storetotal_wktodt / actl_hrs.wtd)*100,1),0) as WTD from (select 'STORE TOTAL' as Totl,sum(actl_sms_hrs_wk_to_dt) as Storetotal_wktodt from (select e.ar_no,actl_sms_hrs_wk_to_dt from (select div_no,rgn_no,zone_no,ar_no from ww_wlp.loc where div_no='Division' and rgn_no='Region' and zone_no='Zone' and WLP_LIVE_IND IN ('Y','N') group by div_no,rgn_no,zone_no,ar_no order by div_no,rgn_no,zone_no,ar_no ) e LEFT OUTER JOIN (select ar_no ,Sum(plan_sms_hrs) as actl_sms_hrs_wk_to_dt from (select distinct src.*, (CASE when task_nm<>'Major Fill' and dept_no in (5,10,15) Then ((((src.var_per_mtrc_type_cd * NVL(src.itm_cnt,0))/1000))+src.fix_hrs) When task_nm='Major Fill' Then ((((((src.var_per_mtrc_type_cd * NVL(src.itm_cnt,0))/1000)) * src.fix_hrs_pct)/100) + src.fix_hrs) when task_nm<>'Major Fill' and dept_no not in (5,10,15) Then ((((src.var_per_mtrc_type_cd * NVL(src.itm_cnt,0))/1000))+src.fix_hrs) END) as plan_sms_hrs from (select LL.task_no,LL.task_nm,LL.loc_no,LL.div_no,LL.rgn_no,LL.zone_no,LL.ar_no,LL.dept_no,LL.dept_nm,LL.wk_id,LL.day_of_wk,LL.FIX_HRS,LL.VAR_PER_MTRC_TYPE_CD,LL.VOL_HRS,LL.FIX_HRS_PCT , LL.txn_dte, loc_no=LL.loc_no and dept_no in (5,10,15) and txn_dte = LL.txn_dte) When LL.task_nm <> 'Major Fill' and LL.dept_no not in (5,10,15) then (select actl_itm_cnt from dly_sls where loc_no=LL.loc_no and A.task_No=sg.task_no and A.day_of_Wk=sg.day_of_wk inner join dept dt on dt.dept_no=tk.dept_no and dt.div_no = 3 where w.fin_yr='Year' and w.fin_wk_no='FinWk' and A.loc_no in (select loc_no from loc where div_no='Division' and rgn_no='Region' and zone_no='Zone') --and tk.dept_no=25 and A.day_of_wk in (0,1,2,3,4,5,6) --and a.task_no='600062' order by A.task_no,tk.dept_no,dt.dept_nm ) Y left outer join ww_wlp.dly_sls ds on Y.loc_No=ds.loc_no and Y.dept_no=ds.dept_no and ds.txn_dte = X order by Y.task_no,Y.dept_no, y.X ) LL group by LL.task_no,LL.task_nm,LL.loc_no,LL.div_no,LL.rgn_no,LL.zone_no,LL.ar_no,LL.dept_no,LL.dept_nm,LL.wk_id,LL.day_of_wk,LL.FIX_HRS, LL.VAR_PER_MTRC_TYPE_CD,LL.VOL_HRS,LL.FIX_HRS_PCT , LL.txn_dte order by ll.day_of_wk) src where dept_no not in (20) order by src.ar_no,src.dept_no,src.task_no ) sto group by ar_no) sms_src on sms_src.ar_no=e.ar_no order by sms_src.ar_no))actl_sms, (select sum(e.wage_adj_amt)) as PLN_WAGE_DTSG, (sum(e.ta_pln_hrs) + sum(e.wage_adj_hrs)) as PLN_HOURS_DTSG from (select b.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,b.loc_nm,a.dept_no,d.dept_nm,d.dply_seq,c.perd_desc,c.wk_id, nvl(a.ta_pln_wage_amt,0) as ta_pln_wage_amt,nvl(a.wage_adj_amt,0) as wage_adj_amt,nvl(a.ta_pln_hrs,0) as ta_pln_hrs,nvl(a.wage_adj_hrs,0) as wage_adj_hrs from ww_wlp.wky_dept_pln a, loc b, wk c , dept d where a.loc_no=b.loc_no and a.div_no=b.div_no and b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and b.zone_no='Zone' and a.dept_no NOT IN (20,27,28) and a.wk_id=c.wk_id and c.wk_id='Week' and a.dept_no=d.dept_no and a.div_no=d.div_no and d.dply_seq is not null and d.div_no='Division' and (b.zone_no,b.ar_no) NOT IN (select distinct b.zone_no,b.ar_no from ww_wlp.actl_dly_wage_krn a, loc b, wk c , dept d, day dy where a.loc_no=b.loc_no and a.div_no=b.div_no and b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and b.zone_no='Zone' and a.dept_no NOT IN (20,27,28) and a.dly_wage_dte between c.wk_strt and c.wk_end and c.wk_id='Week' and a.dept_no=d.dept_no and a.div_no=d.div_no and d.dply_seq is not null and d.div_no='Division' and a.dly_wage_dte=dy.day_dte and c.wk_id=dy.wk_id and a.actl_wrk_hrs is NOT NULL and a.actl_wrk_hrs!=0) and (b.zone_no,b.ar_no) NOT IN (select distinct b.zone_no,b.ar_no from ww_wlp.dly_wage a, loc b, dept d where a.loc_no=b.loc_no and a.div_no=b.div_no and b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and b.zone_no='Zone' and a.dept_no NOT IN (20,27,28) and a.dly_wage_dte in (select distinct max(a.dly_wage_dte) as ltst_dte from dly_wage a, wk c where dly_wage_dte between c.wk_strt and c.wk_end and c.wk_id='Week') and a.dept_no=d.dept_no and a.div_no=d.div_no and d.dply_seq is not null and d.div_no='Division') order by b.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,d.dply_seq,c.perd_desc,c.wk_id) e group by e.zone_no,e.ar_no order by e.zone_no,e.ar_no) i*/) j group by j.zone_no order by j.zone_no) wge on wge.zone_no=lc.zone_no order by lc.zone_no)actl_hrs) den, (select 'STORE TOTAL' as Total,CASE WHEN NVL(sms_hrs.wtd,0) = 0 AND NVL(pln_hrs.wtd,0) = 0 THEN 0 WHEN NVL(sms_hrs.wtd,0) = 0 THEN 0 WHEN NVL(pln_hrs.wtd,0) = 0 THEN 0 ELSE NVL(ROUND((sms_hrs.wtd / pln_hrs.wtd)*100,1),0) END as WTD from (select lc.zone_no,sms.wtd from (select distinct b.zone_no from ww_wlp.loc b where b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and b.zone_no='Zone' order by b.zone_no) lc LEFT OUTER JOIN (select z.zone_no,z.wtd from (select x.*,(x.Mon + x.Tue + x.Wed + x.Thu + x.Fri + x.Sat + x.Sun) as WTD from (select b.zone_no, NVL(sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,00,b.PLN_SMS_TOT_DPZ)),0) Mon, NVL(sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,01,b.PLN_SMS_TOT_DPZ)),0) Tue, NVL(sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,02,b.PLN_SMS_TOT_DPZ)),0) Wed, NVL(sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,03,b.PLN_SMS_TOT_DPZ)),0) Thu, NVL(sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,04,b.PLN_SMS_TOT_DPZ)),0) Fri, NVL(sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,05,b.PLN_SMS_TOT_DPZ)),0) Sat, NVL(sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,06,b.PLN_SMS_TOT_DPZ)),0) Sun from (select h.zone_no,SUBSTR(h.day_of_wk,0,2) as dte_of_wk,sum(h.PLN_SMS_DTS) as PLN_SMS_TOT_DPZ from (select e.zone_no,e.ar_no,e.loc_nm,e.dply_seq,e.dept_nm,e.day_of_wk,(sum(e.fix_hrs) + sum(e.vol_hrs)) as PLN_SMS_DTS from (select b.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,b.loc_nm,d.dept_no,d.dept_nm,d.dply_seq,c.perd_desc,c.wk_id,a.day_of_wk,dy.day_dte, nvl(a.fix_hrs,0) as fix_hrs,nvl(a.vol_hrs,0) as vol_hrs from ww_wlp.lbr_std a, loc b, wk c , dept d, task tsk, day dy where a.loc_no=b.loc_no and b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and b.zone_no='Zone' and tsk.dept_no NOT IN (20,27,28) and a.wk_id=c.wk_id and c.wk_id='Week' and dy.day_dte between c.wk_strt and c.wk_end and tsk.dept_no=d.dept_no and d.dply_seq is not null and d.div_no='Division' and a.task_no=tsk.task_no and a.wk_id=dy.wk_id and a.day_of_wk=dy.day_of_wk and c.wk_id=dy.wk_id order by b.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,d.dply_seq,c.perd_desc,c.wk_id,a.day_of_wk,dy.day_dte) e group by e.zone_no,e.ar_no,e.loc_nm,e.dply_seq,e.dept_nm,e.day_of_wk order by e.zone_no,e.ar_no,e.dply_seq,e.day_of_wk) h group by h.zone_no,h.day_of_wk order by h.zone_no,h.day_of_wk) b group by b.zone_no order by b.zone_no) x ) z ) sms on sms.zone_no=lc.zone_no) sms_hrs, (select lc.zone_no,sum(wge.PLN_HOURS_TOT_DPZ) as WTD from (select distinct b.zone_no from ww_wlp.loc b where b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and b.zone_no='Zone' order by b.zone_no) lc LEFT OUTER JOIN (select e.zone_no,e.ar_no,e.loc_no,e.loc_nm,e.dply_seq,e.dept_nm,(sum(e.ta_pln_wage_amt) + sum(e.wage_adj_amt)) as PLN_WAGE_TOT_DPZ, (sum(e.ta_pln_hrs) + sum(e.wage_adj_hrs)) as PLN_HOURS_TOT_DPZ from (select b.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,b.loc_nm,a.dept_no,d.dept_nm,d.dply_seq,c.perd_desc,c.wk_id, a.ta_pln_wage_amt as ta_pln_wage_amt,a.wage_adj_amt as wage_adj_amt,a.ta_pln_hrs as ta_pln_hrs,a.wage_adj_hrs as wage_adj_hrs from ww_wlp.wky_dept_pln a, loc b, wk c , dept d where a.loc_no=b.loc_no and a.div_no=b.div_no and b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and b.zone_no='Zone' and a.dept_no NOT IN (20,27,28) and a.wk_id=c.wk_id and c.wk_id='Week' and a.dept_no=d.dept_no and a.div_no=d.div_no and d.dply_seq is not null and d.div_no='Division' order by b.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,d.dply_seq,c.perd_desc,c.wk_id) e group by e.zone_no,e.ar_no,e.loc_no,e.loc_nm,e.dply_seq,e.dept_nm order by e.zone_no,e.ar_no,e.loc_no,e.loc_nm,e.dply_seq) wge on wge.zone_no=lc.zone_no group by lc.zone_no order by lc.zone_no) pln_hrs where sms_hrs.zone_no=pln_hrs.zone_no) nyu where nyu.Total = den.Total

TCName.name: ItemsView
TCName.PlannedItemsColumn: select z.ar_no,NVL(y.Mon_itm,0) as Mon,NVL(y.Tue_itm,0) as Tue,NVL(y.Wed_itm,0) as Wed,NVL(y.Thu_itm,0) as Thu, NVL(y.Fri_itm,0) as Fri,NVL(y.Sat_itm,0) as Sat,NVL(y.Sun_itm,0) as Sun from (select distinct b.ar_no from ww_wlp.loc b where b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and b.zone_no='Zone' order by b.ar_no) z LEFT OUTER JOIN (select x.*,(x.Mon_sls + x.Tue_sls + x.Wed_sls + x.Thu_sls + x.Fri_sls + x.Sat_sls + x.Sun_sls) as WTD_SLS, (x.Mon_itm + x.Tue_itm + x.Wed_itm + x.Thu_itm + x.Fri_itm + x.Sat_itm + x.Sun_itm) as WTD_ITM from (select b.ar_no, NVL(sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,00,b.PLN_SLS_DPZ)),0) Mon_sls, NVL(sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,01,b.PLN_SLS_DPZ)),0) Tue_sls, NVL(sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,02,b.PLN_SLS_DPZ)),0) Wed_sls, NVL(sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,03,b.PLN_SLS_DPZ)),0) Thu_sls, NVL(sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,04,b.PLN_SLS_DPZ)),0) Fri_sls, NVL(sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,05,b.PLN_SLS_DPZ)),0) Sat_sls, NVL(sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,06,b.PLN_SLS_DPZ)),0) Sun_sls, NVL(sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,00,b.PLN_ITM_DPZ)),0) Mon_itm, NVL(sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,01,b.PLN_ITM_DPZ)),0) Tue_itm, NVL(sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,02,b.PLN_ITM_DPZ)),0) Wed_itm, NVL(sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,03,b.PLN_ITM_DPZ)),0) Thu_itm, NVL(sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,04,b.PLN_ITM_DPZ)),0) Fri_itm, NVL(sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,05,b.PLN_ITM_DPZ)),0) Sat_itm, NVL(sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,06,b.PLN_ITM_DPZ)),0) Sun_itm from (select h.ar_no,SUBSTR(h.day_of_wk,0,2) as dte_of_wk,ROUND(sum(h.PLN_SLS_DTS),0) as PLN_SLS_DPZ,ROUND(sum(h.PLN_ITM_DTS),0) as PLN_ITM_DPZ from (select * from (select e.ar_no,e.loc_nm,e.dply_seq,e.dept_nm,e.day_of_wk,sum(e.mgr_pln_sls) as PLN_SLS_DTS,sum(e.mgr_pln_itm_cnt) as PLN_ITM_DTS from (select b.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,b.loc_nm,a.dept_no,d.dept_nm,d.dply_seq,c.perd_desc,c.wk_id,a.mgr_pln_sls_dte,dy.day_of_wk, nvl(a.mgr_pln_sls,0) as mgr_pln_sls,nvl(a.mgr_pln_itm_cnt,0) as mgr_pln_itm_cnt,nvl(a.mgr_pln_cust_cnt,0) as mgr_pln_cust_cnt from ww_wlp.mgr_dly_pln a, loc b, wk c , dept d, day dy where a.loc_no=b.loc_no and a.div_no=b.div_no and b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and b.zone_no='Zone' and a.dept_no NOT IN (0,90,20) and a.mgr_pln_sls_dte between c.wk_strt and c.wk_end and c.wk_id='Week' and a.dept_no=d.dept_no and a.div_no=d.div_no and d.dply_seq is not null and d.div_no='Division' and a.mgr_pln_sls_dte=dy.day_dte and c.wk_id=dy.wk_id order by b.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,d.dply_seq,c.perd_desc,c.wk_id,a.mgr_pln_sls_dte,dy.day_of_wk) e group by e.ar_no,e.loc_nm,e.dply_seq,e.dept_nm,e.day_of_wk order by e.ar_no,e.loc_nm,e.dply_seq,e.day_of_wk) f UNION select * from (select e.ar_no,e.loc_nm,e.dply_seq,e.dept_nm,e.day_of_wk,sum(e.gnrt_sls) as GEN_SLS_DTS,sum(e.gnrt_itm) as GEN_ITM_DTS from (select b.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,b.loc_nm,a.dept_no,d.dept_nm,d.dply_seq,c.perd_desc,c.wk_id,a.fcst_dte,dy.day_of_wk, nvl(a.gnrt_sls,0) as gnrt_sls,nvl(a.gnrt_itm,0) as gnrt_itm,nvl(a.gnrt_cust,0) as gnrt_cust from ww_wlp.fcst a, loc b, wk c , dept d, day dy where a.loc_no=b.loc_no and a.div_no=b.div_no and b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and b.zone_no='Zone' and a.dept_no NOT IN (0,90,20) and a.fcst_dte between c.wk_strt and c.wk_end and c.wk_id='Week' and a.dept_no=d.dept_no and a.div_no=d.div_no and d.dply_seq is not null and d.div_no='Division' and (a.loc_no,a.dept_no,a.fcst_dte) NOT IN (select a.loc_no,a.dept_no,a.mgr_pln_sls_dte from mgr_dly_pln a, loc b, wk c where a.mgr_pln_sls_dte between c.wk_strt and c.wk_end and c.wk_id='Week' and a.loc_no=b.loc_no and a.div_no=b.div_no and b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and b.zone_no='Zone') and a.fcst_dte=dy.day_dte and c.wk_id=dy.wk_id order by b.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,d.dply_seq,c.perd_desc,c.wk_id,a.fcst_dte,dy.day_of_wk) e group by e.ar_no,e.loc_nm,e.dply_seq,e.dept_nm,e.day_of_wk order by e.ar_no,e.loc_nm,e.dply_seq,e.day_of_wk) g) h group by h.ar_no,h.day_of_wk order by h.ar_no,h.day_of_wk) b group by b.ar_no order by b.ar_no) x ) y on z.ar_no=y.ar_no order by z.ar_no
TCName.PlannedItemsTotal: select z.zone_no,NVL(y.Mon_itm,0) as Mon,NVL(y.Tue_itm,0) as Tue,NVL(y.Wed_itm,0) as Wed,NVL(y.Thu_itm,0) as Thu,NVL(y.Fri_itm,0) as Fri, NVL(y.Sat_itm,0) as Sat,NVL(y.Sun_itm,0) as Sun from (select distinct b.zone_no from ww_wlp.loc b where b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and b.zone_no='Zone' order by b.zone_no) z LEFT OUTER JOIN (select x.*,(x.Mon_sls + x.Tue_sls + x.Wed_sls + x.Thu_sls + x.Fri_sls + x.Sat_sls + x.Sun_sls) as WTD_SLS, (x.Mon_itm + x.Tue_itm + x.Wed_itm + x.Thu_itm + x.Fri_itm + x.Sat_itm + x.Sun_itm) as WTD_ITM from (select b.zone_no, NVL(sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,00,b.PLN_SLS_TOT_DPZ)),0) Mon_sls, NVL(sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,01,b.PLN_SLS_TOT_DPZ)),0) Tue_sls, NVL(sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,02,b.PLN_SLS_TOT_DPZ)),0) Wed_sls, NVL(sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,03,b.PLN_SLS_TOT_DPZ)),0) Thu_sls, NVL(sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,04,b.PLN_SLS_TOT_DPZ)),0) Fri_sls, NVL(sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,05,b.PLN_SLS_TOT_DPZ)),0) Sat_sls, NVL(sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,06,b.PLN_SLS_TOT_DPZ)),0) Sun_sls, NVL(sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,00,b.PLN_ITM_TOT_DPZ)),0) Mon_itm, NVL(sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,01,b.PLN_ITM_TOT_DPZ)),0) Tue_itm, NVL(sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,02,b.PLN_ITM_TOT_DPZ)),0) Wed_itm, NVL(sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,03,b.PLN_ITM_TOT_DPZ)),0) Thu_itm, NVL(sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,04,b.PLN_ITM_TOT_DPZ)),0) Fri_itm, NVL(sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,05,b.PLN_ITM_TOT_DPZ)),0) Sat_itm, NVL(sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,06,b.PLN_ITM_TOT_DPZ)),0) Sun_itm from (select h.zone_no,SUBSTR(h.day_of_wk,0,2) as dte_of_wk,ROUND(sum(h.PLN_SLS_DTS),0) as PLN_SLS_TOT_DPZ,ROUND(sum(h.PLN_ITM_DTS),0) as PLN_ITM_TOT_DPZ from (select * from (select e.zone_no,e.ar_no,e.loc_nm,e.dply_seq,e.dept_nm,e.day_of_wk,sum(e.mgr_pln_sls) as PLN_SLS_DTS,sum(e.mgr_pln_itm_cnt) as PLN_ITM_DTS from (select b.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,b.loc_nm,a.dept_no,d.dept_nm,d.dply_seq,c.perd_desc,c.wk_id,a.mgr_pln_sls_dte,dy.day_of_wk, nvl(a.mgr_pln_sls,0) as mgr_pln_sls,nvl(a.mgr_pln_itm_cnt,0) as mgr_pln_itm_cnt,nvl(a.mgr_pln_cust_cnt,0) as mgr_pln_cust_cnt from ww_wlp.mgr_dly_pln a, loc b, wk c , dept d, day dy where a.loc_no=b.loc_no and a.div_no=b.div_no and b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and b.zone_no='Zone' and a.dept_no NOT IN (0,90,20) and a.mgr_pln_sls_dte between c.wk_strt and c.wk_end and c.wk_id='Week' and a.dept_no=d.dept_no and a.div_no=d.div_no and d.dply_seq is not null and d.div_no='Division' and a.mgr_pln_sls_dte=dy.day_dte and c.wk_id=dy.wk_id order by b.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,d.dply_seq,c.perd_desc,c.wk_id,a.mgr_pln_sls_dte,dy.day_of_wk) e group by e.zone_no,e.ar_no,e.loc_nm,e.dply_seq,e.dept_nm,e.day_of_wk order by e.zone_no,e.ar_no,e.loc_nm,e.dply_seq,e.day_of_wk) f UNION select * from (select e.zone_no,e.ar_no,e.loc_nm,e.dply_seq,e.dept_nm,e.day_of_wk,sum(e.gnrt_sls) as GEN_SLS_DTS,sum(e.gnrt_itm) as GEN_ITM_DTS from (select b.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,b.loc_nm,a.dept_no,d.dept_nm,d.dply_seq,c.perd_desc,c.wk_id,a.fcst_dte,dy.day_of_wk, nvl(a.gnrt_sls,0) as gnrt_sls,nvl(a.gnrt_itm,0) as gnrt_itm,nvl(a.gnrt_cust,0) as gnrt_cust from ww_wlp.fcst a, loc b, wk c , dept d, day dy where a.loc_no=b.loc_no and a.div_no=b.div_no and b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and b.zone_no='Zone' and a.dept_no NOT IN (0,90,20) and a.fcst_dte between c.wk_strt and c.wk_end and c.wk_id='Week' and a.dept_no=d.dept_no and a.div_no=d.div_no and d.dply_seq is not null and d.div_no='Division' and (a.loc_no,a.dept_no,a.fcst_dte) NOT IN (select a.loc_no,a.dept_no,a.mgr_pln_sls_dte from mgr_dly_pln a, loc b, wk c where a.mgr_pln_sls_dte between c.wk_strt and c.wk_end and c.wk_id='Week' and a.loc_no=b.loc_no and a.div_no=b.div_no and b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and b.zone_no='Zone') and a.fcst_dte=dy.day_dte and c.wk_id=dy.wk_id order by b.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,d.dply_seq,c.perd_desc,c.wk_id,a.fcst_dte,dy.day_of_wk) e group by e.zone_no,e.ar_no,e.loc_nm,e.dply_seq,e.dept_nm,e.day_of_wk order by e.zone_no,e.ar_no,e.loc_nm,e.dply_seq,e.day_of_wk) g) h group by h.zone_no,h.day_of_wk order by h.zone_no,h.day_of_wk) b group by b.zone_no order by b.zone_no) x ) y on z.zone_no=y.zone_no order by z.zone_no
TCName.PlannedItemsWkToDt: select z.ar_no,NVL(ROUND(y.wtd_itm,0),0) as WTD from (select distinct b.ar_no from ww_wlp.loc b where b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and b.zone_no='Zone' order by b.ar_no) z LEFT OUTER JOIN (select x.*,(x.Mon_sls + x.Tue_sls + x.Wed_sls + x.Thu_sls + x.Fri_sls + x.Sat_sls + x.Sun_sls) as WTD_SLS, (x.Mon_itm + x.Tue_itm + x.Wed_itm + x.Thu_itm + x.Fri_itm + x.Sat_itm + x.Sun_itm) as WTD_ITM from (select b.ar_no, NVL(sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,00,b.PLN_SLS_DPZ)),0) Mon_sls, NVL(sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,01,b.PLN_SLS_DPZ)),0) Tue_sls, mgr_pln_itm_cnt,nvl(a.mgr_pln_cust_cnt,0) as mgr_pln_cust_cnt from ww_wlp.mgr_dly_pln a, loc b, wk c , dept d, day dy where a.loc_no=b.loc_no and a.div_no=b.div_no and b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and b.zone_no='Zone' and a.dept_no NOT IN (0,90,20) and a.mgr_pln_sls_dte between c.wk_strt and c.wk_end and c.wk_id='Week' and a.dept_no=d.dept_no and a.div_no=d.div_no and nyu.Tue),2) end as Tue, case when den.Wed=0 or nyu.Wed=0 then 0 else ROUND((den.Wed - nyu.Wed),2) end as Wed, case when den.Thu=0 or nyu.Thu=0 then 0 else ROUND((den.Thu - nyu.Thu),2) end as Thu, case when den.Fri=0 or nyu.Fri=0 then 0 else ROUND((den.Fri - nyu.Fri),2) end as Fri, case when den.Sat=0 or nyu.Sat=0 then 0 else ROUND((den.Sat - nyu.Sat),2) end as Sat, case when den.Sun=0 or nyu.Sun=0 mgr_pln_itm_cnt,nvl(a.mgr_pln_cust_cnt,0) as mgr_pln_cust_cnt from ww_wlp.mgr_dly_pln a, loc b, wk c , dept d, day dy where a.loc_no=b.loc_no and a.div_no=b.div_no and b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and b.zone_no='Zone' and a.dept_no NOT IN (0,90,20) and a.mgr_pln_sls_dte between c.wk_strt and c.wk_end and c.wk_id='Week' and a.dept_no=d.dept_no and a.div_no=d.div_no and d.dply_seq is not null and d.div_no='Division' and a.mgr_pln_sls_dte=dy.day_dte and c.wk_id=dy.wk_id order by b.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,d.dply_seq,c.perd_desc,c.wk_id,a.mgr_pln_sls_dte,dy.day_of_wk) e group by e.zone_no,e.ar_no,e.loc_nm,e.dply_seq,e.dept_nm,e.day_of_wk order by e.zone_no,e.ar_no,e.loc_nm,e.dply_seq,e.day_of_wk) f UNION select * from (select e.zone_no,e.ar_no,e.loc_nm,e.dply_seq,e.dept_nm,e.day_of_wk,sum(e.gnrt_sls) as GEN_SLS_DTS,sum(e.gnrt_itm) as GEN_ITM_DTS from (select b.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,b.loc_nm,a.dept_no,d.dept_nm,d.dply_seq,c.perd_desc,c.wk_id,a.fcst_dte,dy.day_of_wk, nvl(a.gnrt_sls,0) as gnrt_sls,nvl(a.gnrt_itm,0) as gnrt_itm,nvl(a.gnrt_cust,0) as gnrt_cust from ww_wlp.fcst a, loc b, wk c , dept d, day dy where a.loc_no=b.loc_no and a.div_no=b.div_no and b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and b.zone_no='Zone' and a.dept_no NOT IN (0,90,20) and a.fcst_dte between c.wk_strt and c.wk_end and c.wk_id='Week' and a.dept_no=d.dept_no and a.div_no=d.div_no and d.dply_seq is not null and d.div_no='Division' and (a.loc_no,a.dept_no,a.fcst_dte) NOT IN (select a.loc_no,a.dept_no,a.mgr_pln_sls_dte from mgr_dly_pln a, loc b, wk c where a.mgr_pln_sls_dte between c.wk_strt and c.wk_end and c.wk_id='Week' and a.loc_no=b.loc_no and a.div_no=b.div_no and b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and b.zone_no='Zone') and a.fcst_dte=dy.day_dte and c.wk_id=dy.wk_id order by b.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,d.dply_seq,c.perd_desc,c.wk_id,a.fcst_dte,dy.day_of_wk) e group by e.zone_no,e.ar_no,e.loc_nm,e.dply_seq,e.dept_nm,e.day_of_wk order by e.zone_no,e.ar_no,e.loc_nm,e.dply_seq,e.day_of_wk) g) h group by h.zone_no,h.day_of_wk order by h.zone_no,h.day_of_wk) b group by b.zone_no order by b.zone_no) x ) y on z.zone_no=y.zone_no order by z.zone_no) nyu where nyu.zone_no = den.zone_no
TCName.VarianceItemsWkToDt: select nyu.ar_no, case when den.WTD=0 or nyu.WTD=0 then 0 else ROUND((den.WTD - nyu.WTD),2) end as WTD from (select lc.ar_no,NVL(sls.wtd,0) as WTD from (select distinct b.ar_no from ww_wlp.loc b where b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and b.zone_no='Zone' order by b.ar_no) lc LEFT OUTER JOIN (select z.ar_no,z.mon,z.tue,z.wed,z.thu,z.fri,z.sat,z.sun,z.wtd from (select x.*,ROUND((x.Mon + x.Tue + x.Wed + x.Thu + x.Fri + x.Sat + x.Sun),0) as WTD from (select b.ar_no, NVL(sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,00,b.ACTL_ITM_DTSG)),0) Mon, NVL(sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,04,b.ACTL_ITM_DTSG)),0) Fri, NVL(sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,05,b.ACTL_ITM_DTSG)),0) Sat, NVL(sum(DECODE(b.dte_of_wk,06,b.ACTL_ITM_DTSG)),0) Sun from (select h.ar_no,SUBSTR(h.day_of_wk,0,2) as dte_of_wk,sum(h.ACTL_ITM_DTS) as ACTL_ITM_DTSG from (select * from (select e.ar_no,e.dply_seq,e.day_of_wk,sum(e.actl_sls) as ACTL_SLS_DTS,sum(e.actl_itm_cnt) as b.zone_no='Zone' and a.dept_no NOT IN (0,90,20) and a.fcst_dte between c.wk_strt and c.wk_end and c.wk_id='Week' and a.dept_no=d.dept_no and a.div_no=d.div_no and d.dply_seq is not null and b.div_no='Division' and b.rgn_no='Region' and b.zone_no='Zone' order by b.ar_no) z LEFT OUTER JOIN (select x.*,(x.Mon_sls + x.Tue_sls + x.Wed_sls + x.Thu_sls + x.Fri_sls + x.Sat_sls + x.Sun_sls) as
